The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Atlanta . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 50 - 41 in the first half alone . They were the superior shooters in this game as well , going 44 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 45 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks also forced the Magic into 17 turnovers , while committing just 18 of their own . The Hawks were led by the duo of Nikola Vucevic and Victor Oladipo . Vucevic shot 10 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also recording 15 rebounds . It was his second double - double in the last three games , as he continues to excel as a member of the starting lineup . Al Horford had a strong showing , posting 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) and 13 rebounds . It was his third double - double of the season , pushing his season averages to 15 points and 10 rebounds per game . Jeff Teague chipped in with 17 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and seven assists as well . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 18 - 17 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 5 - 31 ) 95 - 82 on Tuesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Bucks got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 22 - 21 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 25 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 41 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Giannis Antetokounmpo backed his words up , as he finished with a game - high of 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocked shots . Antetokounmpo came just shy of a triple - double , but it was n't enough to propel the Knicks to the victory . Tim Hardaway Jr was dialed in with his shot , going 6 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding four assists . He shot a combined 6 - for - 6 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , Kendall Marshall chipped in with 15 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 3 FT ) and five rebounds in 22 minutes . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Knicks will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 5 ) ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 3 - 2 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at Talking Stick Resort Arena in Phoenix . The Suns were able to use a strong second - half where they out - scored the Suns 53 - 45 , to coast to a 13 - point victory on the road . The Grizzlies were the superior shooters in this one , going 50 percent from the field and 53 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 46 percent from the floor and just 38 percent from beyond the arc . Starting at point guard , Mike Conley led the way , going 9 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding five rebounds and four assists . He 's now averaging 20 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Coming one rebound short of a double - double , Markieff Morris finished with 20 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and five rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Zach Randolph , who recorded 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 FT ) and six rebounds over 29 minutes . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Suns will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 29 - 15 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 17 - 28 ) 114 - 110 on Monday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 26 - 25 right away in the first quarter . The Raptors shot 53 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons finished at 46 percent from the floor and 35 percent from deep . What really made the difference though was turnovers . The Raptors forced the Pistons into 26 turnovers , while committing just eight of their own . The Raptors were led by D.J . Augustin in this one , going 12 - for - 20 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 35 points , while also adding eight assists over 37 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 32 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 29 points and 20 rebounds on the season . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope gave the frontcourt some help as well and recorded 25 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) and six rebounds . Like Valanciunas , he 's playing at a very high rate , averaging 29 points over his last three games . Both Kyle Lowry and Amir Johnson reached double figures in points as well with 13 and 12 points respectively . The Pistons ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday , while the Pistons will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Wednesday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 30 - 29 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 24 - 35 ) 102 - 91 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Pistons were the superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 49 percent from the floor and 58 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons were led by the duo of Khris Middleton and Marcus Morris . Drummond went 11 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 15 points , while also adding 17 rebounds and two steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 25 points and 21 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 25 points and 10 rebounds on the season . Jackson came one assist shy of a double - double , as he posted 22 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) , eight assists and two steals . He 's now averaging 10 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Greg Monroe had 10 points ( 5 - 10 FG ) and seven rebounds in 27 minutes . The Pistons ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Bucks will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
Giannis Antetokounmpo has been a model of consistency for the Bucks all season long and Monday night was his most impressive performance of the season , as he posted 34 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and five steals . The 34 points was a season - high , while the 12 rebounds was his second highest total of the season . Tuesday also marked the second time this year Antetokounmpo recorded 20 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and five steals as he continues to stuff the stat sheet as well as any player in the NBA . However , it was the play of Michael Beasley that may have been just as , if not more , important for Milwaukee 's upset victory . Beasley 's 17 points Tuesday night were his second highest total of the season and the seventh time he has reach double - digit scoring . In those seven games , the Bucks are 6 - 1 , as Beasley 's contributions off the bench have had a positive effect on Milwaukee 's offensive attack . Milwaukee will look to build on their eighth - straight playoff game when they take on the Nets in the second half of a back - to - back on Monday . The Cavaliers fell to 13 - 17 on the season and have a tough task ahead of the Toronto Raptors in the loss column . They are now 3 - 3 on the road , with their second loss coming in the season . They take on the struggling Nuggets in the second portion of a back - to - back set on Sunday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 4 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 4 ) 101 - 93 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Celtics built a strong lead early in this game , out - scoring the Celtics 29 - 19 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 40 percent from the field and 21 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 39 percent from the floor and 13 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavaliers were also able to force the Celtics into 32 turnovers , while only committing eight of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Cavaliers were led by LeBron James , who nearly recorded his triple - double . He finished with 27 points ( 10 - 24 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 10 FT ) , 10 rebounds and eight assists , as he did a little bit of everything Tuesday . He 's also shot a combined 8 - for - 17 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , Marcus Smart shot 4 - for - 8 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 11 points in 21 minutes . It was his best offensive showing since back in mid - December , so it was good to see him get back on track . The only other Celtic to reach double figures in points was Iman Shumpert , who finished with 15 points ( 3 - 4 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) and 10 rebounds in 38 minutes as a starter . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 8 - 13 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 11 - 12 ) 114 - 101 on Thursday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Oklahoma City . The Thunder was the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 19 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went 41 percent from the floor and just 19 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Russell Westbrook backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 28 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 12 - 15 FT ) , to go along with seven assists and three rebounds . Durant came just shy of a triple - double , as he finished with 17 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , nine rebounds and seven assists . The 23 points matched a season - high for him , while the only other player to reach double figures was Jabari Parker . He had 15 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and one assists , while Jerryd Bayless came off the bench for 11 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) . The Bucks will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Friday night , while the Bucks will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the New York Knicks in quadruple overtime , 142 - 139 , at Phillips Arena on Sunday . A game that started off with very little defense being played over the first two quarters ended up becoming much tighter over the third and fourth periods . After the Knicks ( 21 - 28 ) held a 65 - 61 lead going into halftime , the two teams combined for just 84 points in the second half . With five overtimes , there were plenty of opportunities for heroics , and Carmelo Anthony and Courtney Lee capitalized on three of them . Anthony 's driving layup with two seconds left in regulation and 18 - footer with six ticks in the first overtime helped Atlanta stay alive , while Lee 's 26 - foot three - point jumper with one second on the clock in the second overtime sent matters into a third extra period . Dennis Schroder then turned the tables , draining a driving layup with three seconds remaining in the third overtime . Finally , it was Paul Millsap who put an end to the Knicks ' first five - overtime tilt since 1951 , pouring in a shot with 27 seconds remaining that gave Atlanta ( 28 - 20 ) a 141 - 139 lead they would n't relinquish . In all , four Knicks players , including Anthony , fouled out , while Anthony managed a game - high 37 points on 13 - of - 29 shooting . This was the third straight loss for the Hawks ( 28 - 20 ) , as the rest of the team combined for just 41 points in the loss . Dennis Schroder led the way for the Hawks with 23 points , while Kent Bazemore managed an impressive 24 points of his own . Justin Holiday followed with a bench - leading 15 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , two assists and one steal . Mindaugas Kuzminskas provided 13 points , four rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block in a reserve role as well . Kyle O'Quinn hauled in 12 boards off the bench , and Joakim Noah had a modest six points but added 14 rebounds , five assists , three steals and two blocks . Millsap paced Atlanta with a 37 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists , one steal and one block . Kent Bazemore managed 24 points and nine rebounds . Schroder posted a 23 - point , 15 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds , while Dwight Howard posted a 19 - point , 13 - rebound effort of his own . Tim Hardaway , Jr. matched Howard 's point total while dishing out eight assists , hauling in five rebounds and recording a steal . Kyle Dunleavy led the bench with 17 points .
The visiting Golden State Warriors took down the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday , 133 - 120 . The Warriors ( 43 - 7 ) saw stellar top - down play even despite the absence of All-Star Draymond Green . The reigning conference Player of the Month duo , Steph Curry and Kevin Durant , recorded a pair of double - doubles . Curry led the team with 29 points and dished out 11 assists , while Durant scored 26 to go with 10 assists and eight rebounds . It was a typically dominant game for the loaded superteam , as the Warriors shot over 52 percent from the field and poured in 14 three - pointers . Seven players scored in double - digits and the team dished out a whopping 38 assists . Golden State was able to quickly get ahead of the Clippers with a 33 - 22 advantage in the first quarter . The Clippers ( 31 - 19 ) remain without injured superstar Chris Paul , and could have used him in Thursday 's double - digit loss . Star forward Blake Griffin took the reigns on offense in Paul 's stead , scoring a game - high 31 points . Off the bench , sixth man Jamal Crawford scored 21 and hit five three - pointers . However , not even 50 percent shooting as a team and ten three - pointers was enough for LA to best the stacked Warriors ' squad . 15 team turnovers did little to help the Clippers ' case . The Warriors will travel to Sacramento on Saturday , while the Clippers will play in Boston on Sunday .
The New York Knicks defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 90 - 87 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . While this scoreline appears to be close , the Knicks were in control for the majority of this game . In fact , Los Angeles had just one lead in the first quarter and trailed every other minute , Rebounding was a huge beneficiary for the Knicks , as they won that battle , 45 - 45 . In addition , three - point shooting was a key difference as well , with New York going 7 - of - 26 and Los Angeles hitting just 16 - of - 22 from long distance . The Knicks ( 28 - 40 ) have now won three of their last four games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Carmelo Anthony did all he could for Los Angeles , as he led the team with 26 points , 12 rebounds and four assists . Lou Williams was second on the team , providing 15 points and five assists off the bench . Kobe Bryant led the starters , as he accrued 14 points , two rebounds and two assists . Robin Lopez was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 16 points and eight rebounds . Brandon Clarkson led the Knicks in scoring , as he dropped 12 points , three rebounds and three assists on 3 - of - 6 shooting . Brandon Bass was a bright spot for Los Angeles , as he led the team with 12 points , three rebounds and two assists on 6 - of - 16 shooting . Jordan Clarkson was second on the team , collecting 12 points , three rebounds , two assists and three steals .
The Toronto Raptors ( 17 - 7 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 11 - 12 ) 122 - 100 on Tuesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Toronto . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 56 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 47 percent from the floor and a meager 17 percent from beyond the arc . It was a sloppy game all - around though , as both teams hit just 12 free throws . The Raptors were led by Terrence Ross , who went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding five rebounds and two steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 36 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 14 points and 9 rebounds on the year . Kyle Lowry was one of the lone bright spots for the Bucks . He went 5 - for - 9 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding three assists . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The Raptors ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Bucks will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
The Minnesota Grizzlies ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 0 - 1 ) 105 - 101 on Tuesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Right from the tip - off , the Grizzlies were clearly the better offensive team in this one . They capped off the first half with a 48 - 39 point lead , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a victory on the road . They shot 52 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , compared to the Timberwolves who shot just 45 percent from the floor and a meager 50 percent from beyond the arc . Zach Randolph was the only Timberwolves ' starter to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and seven rebounds in 23 minutes off the bench . The Timberwolves were led by Thaddeus Randolph , who went 12 - for - 16 from the floor and 1 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding 4 rebounds . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other King to reach double figures in points was Courtney Lee , who came off the bench to score 14 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 36 minutes . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 37 - 42 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 45 - 34 ) in the final game Monday night at Verizon Center , 117 - 80 . The Wizards jumped out to an early lead and never looked back , as they out - scored the Wizards 21 - 18 in the final quarter to secure the victory in front of their home crowd . The Nets used strong shooting from beyond the arc , going 60 percent from the field and 60 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards went 39 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Nets were also able to force the Wizards into 17 turnovers , while committing only six of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Brook Lopez had his way with the Wizards ' bigs . He went 12 - of - 22 from the field to score 26 points , while also grabbing nine rebounds . The only other Cavalier to reach double - digit points was Bojan Jack , who finished with 22 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 6 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) . Considering he 's averaging 10 points on the year , it was a nice surprise for the Nets to get some extra offensive production off the bench . Bojan Bogdanovic added 14 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and five rebounds as well . Jarrett Bogdanovic was the other starter in double figures with 14 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) . The Wizards ' next game will be at home against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Wizards will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Denver Nuggets ( 11 - 17 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 5 - 23 ) 107 - 111 on Sunday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . In a very evenly matched game , it was the Nuggets who pulled out the close victory , as they took down a team that they could see again when the playoffs come around . Both teams had similar shooting percentages , with the Nuggets going 46 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 48 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from deep . The Nuggets also came out with the advantage on the boards , out - rebounding the Lakers 43 - 40 . The Nuggets were led by Will Barton , who went 10 - for - 21 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 25 points , to go along with eight rebounds and two assists in just 16 minutes . He was very efficient in his time on the court , matching a season - high in points . Moving into the starting lineup with Jusuf Nurkic sitting out , Will Barton got the start at point guard and had a double - double of 19 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 9 FT ) , eight rebounds and two assists . It was a new season - high in points for him and also a nice bounce back game after posting only three points in Saturday 's game against the Bulls . Lou Williams also had a solid day off the bench , scoring 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) in 37 minutes . It was the most of his time on the offensive side of the ball as he went 2 - for - 6 from the field and 0 - for - 5 from the three - point line . Julius Randle was the third Nugget to reach double figures in points . He finished with 15 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , 10 rebounds and five blocked shots , while Lou Williams chipped in with 21 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) and four rebounds as well . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
It was a big night for the Mavericks behind the arc , as the team shot a whopping 17 - of - 31 from three - point range . Nine of these threes came from D-League call - up Yogi Ferrell , who led the team with a career - high 32 points . Sharpshooter Wesley Matthews , meanwhile , scored 27 points and splashed in three three - pointers on the night . The Mavs also shot a respectable 82 percent from the free - throw line and 46 percent from the field in what was a stellar night on the offensive end for the team . For Portland , star point guard Damian Lillard delivered what was possibly his worst statistical night of the season . The All-Star went just 4 - of - 20 from the field and turned the ball over three times . His fellow guards , Evan Turner and C.J . McCollum , picked up the slack , however , as they combined for 52 points on the night . Both teams will enjoy three days of rest before taking the court on Wednesday . The Trail Blazers will visit Phoenix to take on the Thunder , while the Trail Blazers will travel to Sacramento on Wednesday while the Blazers will face off until Monday in San Antonio , that will have to rematch in the second half of their back - to - back . Both of these teams have been struggling mightily coming into this night and it made this game hard to watch at times . Portland was especially bad , as they shot 46 percent from the field and committed 9 turnovers in the loss . Wesley Turner led the team with 24 points and also snatched down four rebounds . Damian Lillard accumulated 13 points , nine rebounds and six assists in the loss . On deck for the Trail Blazers is a matchup with the Utah Jazz on Sunday .
The Miami Heat ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 2 - 1 ) 107 - 102 on Tuesday at the American Airlines Arena in Miami Florida . The Heat did most of their damage in the first half , out - scoring the Celitcs 52 - 28 . They were able to finish the game shooting 50 percent from the field and 25 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors shot 47 percent from the field and just 25 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were also able to force the Raptors into 10 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . DeMar DeRozan led the way with 30 points ( 11 - 22 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 7 - 12 FT ) , while also adding three rebounds , an assist and four steals . It was his second double - double of the year , and he 's now averaging 14 points and 7 rebounds on the year . Luol Deng was the only other starter in double figures , as he posted 18 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and four rebounds in 37 minutes . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Wizard to reach double - digit points was Greivis Vasquez , who came off the bench for 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) , two rebounds and two steals in 25 minutes . The Heat ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Raptors will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 133 - 105 at Staples Center on Saturday . Both teams were shorthanded in the contest , however . The Pelicans ( 7 - 17 ) were without Anthony Davis ( rest ) , Jrue Holiday ( toe ) and E'Twaun Moore ( toe ) , making the game very one sided from the gate . The New Orleans reserves played physical basketball and found scoring lanes in the first half , falling just six points short of the Clippers ( 17 - 7 ) at the end of the second quarter . The second half was a different story , as Los Angeles outscored the Pelicans by 12 points in the third quarter and 10 points in the fourth quarter . Chris Paul dropped one of the biggest double - doubles of the season , racking up 20 points and 20 assists , with 18 of those assists coming in the first three quarters of action . Paul added five rebounds and three steals on 8 - of - 16 shooting in 30 minutes of action , which was even more helpful given Blake Griffin 's ( knee ) absence . DeAndre Jordan worked the pick and roll with Paul to perfection , and with no Anthony Davis clogging the lane on the other end , Jordan found his way to 19 points and nine rebounds rather easily . Jamal Crawford and Marreese Speights added scoring help from the bench , as they finished with 22 points and 17 points , respectively . Tim Frazier led the Pelicans on the other end , scoring 20 points and adding 11 assists on 6 - of - 13 shooting . Buddy Hield drew 36 minutes and contributed 15 points on 2 - of - 5 shooting from behind the arc . Next up , the Pelicans play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Phoenix Suns , while the Clippers host the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 88 - 69 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Monday . The Pacers ( 5 - 6 ) were n't sure that they 'd have Paul George ( ankle ) available to help try to break a two - game losing streak until late in the afternoon , but he ultimately was able to suit up and share the co - lead in scoring among the starting five . He also helped spearhead a defensive effort that saw Indiana limit the Magic ( 4 - 7 ) to a 32 percent success rate from the field and a 20 percent tally from three - point range , while also holding them to a season - low point total . They also elicited a total of 14 turnovers from Orlando while turning the ball over just nine times in their own right . The key for the Pacers was their play in the two middle quarters , as they outscored the visitors by a 55 - 38 margin over the second and third periods . Orlando was paced by Evan Fournier , who supplied 14 points , two rebounds , two assists and a steal . Elfrid Payton managed 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals , while Nikola Vucevic struggled through an uncharacteristic 1 - of - 10 effort from the field , an unsightly performance that he nevertheless managed to somewhat compensate for with 12 rebounds . Aaron Gordon was the only other Magic player to hit double digits in the scoring column , pacing the bench with 11 points , three boards and an assist . George and Monta Ellis each turned in 13 - point efforts , with the former posting six rebounds , five assists , two steals and a block , while the latter had a pair of rebounds and assists , to go along with a block . Thaddeus Young provided a solid complementary effort with 11 points , five rebounds , an assist , two steals and a block . Jeff Teague filled out the stat sheet with 11 points , eight rebounds , five assists , a steal and three blocks . C.J . Miles led the reserves with 16 points , four rebounds , an assist , two steals and two blocks . The Magic head back home to await the New Orleans Pelicans for a Wednesday visit , while the Pacers have their own Wednesday home date with the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 110 - 96 , at FedEx Forum on Wednesday . The Grizzlies have been dominant at home this season and this wire - to - wire win just adds to the resume . It was as one - sided as it could be , with the Grizzlies holding a double - digit lead for the final 35 minutes . While Dallas did n't dominate any statistic , it won nearly every one . In fact , Memphis ended up winning the shooting , assisting , turnovers , steals , fastbreak points and points in the paint differentials . The Grizzlies starters really took control , as they outscored the Mavericks starters , 84 - 63 . The Mavericks ( 9 - 6 ) had to play this game without Zach Randolph and Avery Randolph , as they did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to hold off the Grizzlies . Jeff Green carried the load for Dallas , as he tallied 19 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Marc Gasol finished second on the team , accumulating 15 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . Matt Barnes was huge off the bench , as he amassed 14 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Raymond Felton also played well off the bench , collecting 16 points , four rebounds and two assists . Mike Conley led the Mavericks in scoring , collecting 21 points , three rebounds and six assists . Zaza Pachulia recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 10 rebounds . Raymond Felton also played well off the bench , collecting 16 points , four rebounds and two assists . On deck for Dallas is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday .
The Houston Rockets ( 24 - 9 ) defeated the Eric Gordon ( 13 - 40 ) 123 - 100 on Tuesday night at American Airlines Center in Dallas . The Mavericks got off to a quick start Wednesday , out - scoring the 44 - 44 first half by the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Rockets also shot much better than the Rockets , going 53 percent from the field , 53 percent from the three - point line and 53 percent from the three - point line , while the Gordon Gordon went only 9 - of - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from beyond the arc . He finished the game with 34 points , five rebounds and 11 assists , while Gordon Matthews finished with 19 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and a pair of rebounds off the bench . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to go on a tear for the Mavericks . Ryan Anderson was the other Nugget in double figures , as he finished with 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) in 15 minutes . Deron Matthews led the team with 19 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 12 - 12 FT ) and 1 - of - 2 performance from the field . Wesley Matthews had the most production for the Gordon Matthews , as he went 7 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 19 points . He 's only averaging 13 points per game so far this season , so it was a nice surprise for the Mavericks . The Denver Nuggets ( 15 - 20 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 5 - 28 ) 110 - 101 on Monday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Despite a fierce comeback by the Timberwolves , who out - scored the Timberwolves 58 - 48 in the second half , the Timberwolves were able to hold them off and steal the victory on the road . The Timberwolves were able to out - rebound the Timberwolves 41 - 42 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Timberwolves were led by Arron Afflalo in this one , as he went 11 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 34 points , while adding two rebounds , two assists and one steal . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 12 rebounds per game . Coming off the bench , JJ Reddick had a strong showing . He went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding seven assists . He 's now averaging 13 points and 4 rebounds on the year . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Thaddeus Young , who finished with 13 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and five rebounds in 30 minutes . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host New Orleans Pelicans 84 - 85 at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . In a battle between two struggling teams , the team with one win prevailed . The key for Milwaukee was their shooting , as they hit 37 percent of their shots and assisted on 26 of their 50 made baskets . The Bucks bench took advantage of the whistle , taking 18 more free - throw attempts than the Pelicans . New Orleans ( 37 - 30 ) had to play this game extremely shorthanded and they did n't have enough to hold on to a big lead . Quincy Pondexter did all he could for New Orleans , as he led the team with 18 points and eight rebounds . Ersan Ilyasova was second on the team , totaling 15 points and eight rebounds . Zaza Pachulia recorded a 16 - point , 11 - rebound double - double . Jerryd Pondexter came off the bench to provide 14 points and eight rebounds . Anthony Davis was the player of the game , as he accumulated 20 points , 13 rebounds and four assists on 6 - of - 18 from the field . Giannis Antetokounmpo finished second on the team , collecting 15 points , nine rebounds , five assists and three blocks . Zaza Pachulia amassed 11 points , eight rebounds and two steals . Jerryd Bayless came off the bench to provide 14 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Milwaukee will look to keep rolling on Friday in a road matchup with the Detroit Pistons . Quincy Pondexter led the team in scoring , as he accrued 15 points , eight rebounds and five assists . Jerryd Bayless led the bench in scoring , dropping 14 points off the bench .

The Washington Wizards defeated the Indiana Pacers , 118 - 104 , at Verizon Center on Saturday . The Wizards were expected to win this game rather easily and they took care of business after the first quarter . Indiana actually led for the majority of the game , as the Pacers never led by more than two points . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Wizards going 14 - of - 19 and the Pacers hitting just 2 - of - 27 from long distance . Washington also dominated the steal differential , winning that battle , 5 - 2 . The Pacers ( 22 - 18 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the league and they fell just shy in this close loss . John Wall carried the load , as he tallied 28 points , seven rebounds and eight assists . Monta Ellis was second on the team , with 17 points , three assists and two steals . Lavoy Allen led the bench with 15 points and three rebounds . The Pacers ( 19 - 19 ) have been dominant at home all season , but this was a devastating loss in a game they were supposed to win . John Wall was the player of the game , as he accumulated 28 points , seven rebounds and eight assists . Paul George was n't far behind , finishing with 21 points , five rebounds and seven assists . George Hill was the only other Pacer in double figures , as he accrued 17 points , four rebounds and three assists . Lavoy Allen led the bench with 15 points and three rebounds . The Pacers will be in action again on Saturday against the Utah Jazz .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 37 - 24 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 28 - 33 ) 94 - 88 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Grizzlies got out quickly in this game , out - scoring the Jazz 19 - 28 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Grizzlies shot the ball well , going 46 percent from the field and 22 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 43 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies were also able to force the Jazz into 17 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Zach Randolph had his way with the Jazz . He went 9 - for - 18 from the field and 6 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 25 points , while also adding eight rebounds . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 30 points and 8 rebounds per game . Gordon Hayward did n't have his best shooting performance , going 7 - for - 12 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line , but he still finished with 18 points , six rebounds and two assists . He 's now averaging 14 points and 7 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Lance Stephenson had an efficient 16 points ( 8 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt ) in 25 minutes . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Jazz will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .

The Utah Jazz ( 18 - 33 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 17 - 32 ) 102 - 90 on Friday . A thoroughly dominating performance by Utah was perhaps to be expected , considering that the Jazz came into the contest surrendering the second - lowest amount of points per game ( 97 ) , while the Kings checked in with the second - highest turnover rate ( 9 ) on a nightly basis . Both figures proved to be prophetic Thursday , as the Jazz held Sacramento to a season - low scoring total , and also limiting them to a 39 percent success rate from the field . The Kings were led by Derrick Favors 's 20 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , five assists and two blocks . Derrick Favors was next with 20 points , nine rebounds , five assists and three blocks . Ben McLemore was next on the second unit with 15 points , two rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block . Ramon Sessions paced the bench with 11 points , four rebounds and five assists , while Trey Burke went for 10 points , four rebounds and four assists in 26 minutes off the bench . Hayward added three assists and two rebounds to his game - high scoring total , and was also notably 1 - of - 0 from behind the arc . Enes Kanter led the reserves with 17 points , 13 rebounds and an assist . Sacramento fell to 17 - 32 but remains in first place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They now head to Minnesota for a Saturday showdown versus the Timberwolves . Sacramento 's starting five enjoyed a highly productive night , and were encouragingly led by a resurgent effort from All-Star DeMarcus Cousins , who 'd been struggling considerably with his shot in recent games . The small forward exploded for 27 points on the strength of 10 of 24 shooting from the field , including a 0 - for - 0 from three - point range . He added nine rebounds , five assists and two steals to his team - high scoring total . Derrick Favors was next with 20 points , nine rebounds , five assists and three blocks . Ben McLemore and Omri Casspi supplied a pair of 11 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds and five assists , and the latter posting four rebounds and five assists . Dante Exum led the second unit with 11 points , four rebounds and four assists . The Kings remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are just a game behind the eighth - seeded Dallas Mavericks . They head to Sacramento to take on the Kings on Sunday night .

The Spurs avoided suffering from their first three - game losing streak in almost a year in pretty dominant fashion , as they opened with a big opening period and adopted a bend - but - don't - break mentality the rest of the way . San Antonio was carried by a pair of stellar performances from their stars in the frontcourt , with Kawhi Leonard and Kawhi Leonard shining from start to finish . Kawhi Leonard added 21 points and seven assists of his own , while Harrison Barnes had a double - double of his own with 17 points and 2 - of - 15 shooting . LaMarcus Aldridge scored a team - high 17 points in 40 minutes , and Seth Williams had 14 points of his own . As a team , the Mavericks shot a scorching 50 percent from the field and 58 percent from behind the arc . In the end , it was a forgettable night for Dallas , as they shot just 43 percent from the field and committed 11 turnovers . Up next , the Spurs will look to continue their winning ways against the Raptors on Friday , while the Mavericks will look to turn things around Friday against the Pacers .

The Phoenix Suns defeated the Sacramento Kings , 105 - 103 , at Golden 2 Center on Sunday . The Kings ( 19 - 31 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Kings ( 19 - 31 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Sacramento forced the Cavs into an uncharacteristic 13 turnovers and made the shots when it counted most to emerge as surprising victors . DeMarcus Cousins naturally played a pivotal role , posting a near triple - double with a game - high 22 points , 11 rebounds , a pair of assists and a steal . With the victory , the Suns hold on to fourth place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division . They also turned the ball over a whopping 13 times , which allowed them to get the victory . Devin Booker led the way for the Kings with 21 points , a total he supplemented with five rebounds , three assists and a steal . Darren McLemore was next with a bench - leading 18 points , which he supplemented with two rebounds and three assists . Ben McLemore was next with a bench - leading 18 points , which he supplemented with one assist and one block . Brandon Knight led the bench with 12 points , two assists and two rebounds . Ty Collison was productive as a reserve as well with 18 points , three assists , five rebounds and two steals . Cousins paced the Kings with 22 points , 11 rebounds , 12 assists , two blocks and one steal . Backcourt mate Eric Bledsoe followed with 20 points , four assists , six rebounds and one steal . Lawson posted a 20 - point , 12 - assist double - double that also included six rebounds and one steal . Ben McLemore led the second unit with 18 points , three assists and one block .
The Chicago Bulls ( 8 - 3 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 5 - 4 ) 105 - 89 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 44 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were able to force the Clippers into 12 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Jamal Crawford had a big day for the Clippers , as he went 10 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding five assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 17 points and 10 rebounds on the season . Jimmy Butler was the only other Clipper to score in double figures for the Clippers . He finished with 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and seven assists , while Hinrich added 14 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt ) and two rebounds . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Clippers will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 112 - 103 , at Barclays Center on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 34 - 23 ) came in to Thursday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but were also running on fumes after two games in the previous three nights . Fatigue may have played a role in the first half , as the Grizzlies ( 34 - 23 ) built a 62 - 51 lead by halftime . The second half was much tighter , but Memphis eventually pulled away on the strength of a highly productive night for their starting five . All first unit members hit double digits in the scoring column , and the Grizzlies managed to shoot 46 percent from the field , while only committing 12 turnovers . Mike Conley led the way for Brooklyn with 32 points , six assists , a rebound and a steal . Spencer Dinwiddie was second with 17 points , eight assists and three rebounds . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson posted a 13 - point , 3 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks , two steals and one assist . Sean Kilpatrick provided 15 points , three rebounds , three assists and one steal . Sean Kilpatrick led the second unit with 15 points , six boards and three assists . Vince Dinwiddie was productive in a reserve role as well with 14 points , two rebounds and one assist . Brook Lopez compiled 17 points , five assists , three rebounds and one steal in 32 minutes off the bench . Vince Carter led the bench with 14 points , and Vince Carter paced the bench with 14 points .
The Miami Heat defeated the Eric Gordon , 117 - 100 , at American Airlines Center on Wednesday . Miami was expected to win this game easily , but it took a late run for them to prevail . In fact , the Heat led for the final 40 - plus minutes , as they pulled out a near wire - to - wire win . Rebounding was the biggest factor to the Heat 's success , as they won that battle , 46 - 32 . Fastbreak points and points in the paint were also decisive , as Miami outscored 27 - 15 in the paint . Hassan Whiteside dominated the glass , as he totaled 23 points and 14 rebounds on 9 - of - 13 shooting . Goran Dragic finished with 21 points , five assists and five steals . Ryan Anderson amassed 17 points , six rebounds and four assists . Tyler Johnson was huge off the bench , providing 16 points and seven rebounds . James Harden was the player of the game , as he accumulated 38 points , 12 rebounds and 12 assists . Goran Dragic was n't far behind , totaling 21 points and five assists . Hassan Whiteside recorded another double - double , amassing 23 points , 14 rebounds and five blocks on 9 - of - 13 shooting . Ryan Anderson went just 6 - of - 16 from the field , but finished with 17 points , six rebounds and four assists . Eric Dragic led the team in scoring , dropping 23 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting . Clint Capela was second on the team , amassing 12 points , two rebounds and three blocks .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Detroit Pistons , 109 - 86 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . New Orleans was desperate for a win and this dominating victory inches them a little closer to the eight - seed in the west . They did all their damage in the first and fourth quarter , as they outscored Detroit , 62 - 34 . The Pistons had one of the worst shooting games of the season , as they went 40 - of - 103 from the field , 3 - of - 17 from the free - throw line and 8 - of - 23 from three - point range . The Pelicans shot well on their end , hitting 50 percent of their shots , while going 22 - of - 23 from the free - throw line . Defensive rebounding was decisive as well , with New Orleans winning that battle , 45 - 40 . The Pistons ( 29 - 32 ) had won three of four headed into this matchup , so this 23 - point loss is obviously disappointing . Jon Leuer led Detroit , as he collected 22 points , seven rebounds and three steals . Andre Drummond did get ejected , but still totaled 13 points and 17 rebounds , despite going 1 - of - 10 from the free - throw line . Tobias Harris led the bench with 15 points and six rebounds . The Pelicans ( 24 - 37 ) were 0 - 3 with DeMarcus Cousins and this marks their first win since the trade , despite the fact that Cousins was suspended for this matchup ( technicals ) . Anthony Davis carried the load , as he tallied 33 points , 14 rebounds and three assists on 11 - of - 17 shooting . Jrue Holiday finished second on the team with 22 points , four rebounds and five assists . Dante Cunningham was a surprise , providing 16 points and five rebounds .
The Denver Nuggets ( 19 - 27 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 24 - 22 ) 93 - 85 on Monday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start Wednesday , out - scoring the Pelicans 28 - 17 in the first quarter alone . The Nuggets were the superior shooters in this one , going 46 percent from the field and 59 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans went 39 percent from the floor and just 20 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets were able to force the Pelicans into 9 turnovers , while committing just eight of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Nuggets were led by Anthony Davis , who went 8 - for - 15 from the field and 8 - for - 10 from the free throw line to score 24 points , while also grabbing 12 rebounds . Davis has now scored at least 19 points in three out of the last four games and has recorded fifteen double - doubles on the season . He 's now averaging 23 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Eric Gordon also had a productive night . He went 4 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 11 points , while adding six assists . Despite the loss , the Pelicans had six players reach double figures , with all their starters included in that feat . Arron Afflalo scored 20 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) while adding four assists and a rebound . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 24 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 24 points and 13 rebounds on the season . Eric Gordon also had a productive night off the bench , scoring 20 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and handing out six assists in only 42 minutes . It was far - and - away his best game of the year so far , as it marked a new season - high in points , along with being his first double - double of the year . He 's averaging just 7 points and seven rebounds on the season . Also playing a big factor in the win was Eric Gordon . Afflalo went 4 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 11 points , while also handing out six assists . He 's now averaging 9 points and 3 rebounds on the year . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday , while the Pelicans will be at home against the Memphis Grizzlies on Friday .
The host Los Angeles Lakers handily defeated the Golden State Warriors on Friday , 117 - 97 . It was Lakers ( 3 - 3 ) coach Luke Walton 's first game against the Warriors since leaving the organization over the offseason . Walton coached the Warriors for the beginning of their historic 2015 - 16 regular season in place of an injured Steve Kerr , but later left to pursue the head coaching job in Los Angeles . Walton certainly got the best of his former team , as the Lakers were able to maintain their hefty halftime lead down the stretch . The team successfully capitalized on their size advantage , holding a 51 - 40 advantage in the rebounding column . Third-year forward Julius Randle led the team with 20 points and was a monster on the boards , pulling down 14 rebounds . The Lakers also saw success from the line , hitting over 90 percent of their free - throws . For the Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) , it was a tough night from beyond the arc . After showing dominant offensive flow on Thursday in a rout of the Thunder , the Warriors shot just 5 - for - 32 from three in Friday 's contest . This included 0 - for - 10 for Steph Curry , whose NBA-record streak of 157 games with a three - point make finally came to an end . The results were n't much better for Klay Thompson , who went just 2 - for - 10 . Kevin Durant , meanwhile , continued to perform with his new team , leading the game with 27 points . The Lakers will host the Suns on Sunday , while the Warriors will host the still - winless Pelicans on Monday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Phoenix Suns , 133 - 102 , at Toyota Center on Friday . This was a matchup full of stars and none of them disappointed . There was an NBA record tied in this game , as there were 88 combined three - point attempts . There were nine ties and 10 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 40 points . Houston actually led for the majority of the game , as Phoenix 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . The Suns offense was on point , as they shot 49 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Houston winning that battle , 55 - 42 . The Rockets ( 40 - 17 ) had to play this game without Al Horford and Avery Bradley , as they did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to hold off the Rockets . James Harden carried the load , as he collected 40 points , six rebounds and eight assists . Patrick Beverley was second on the team , finishing with 18 points and four rebounds . Alex Len started for Tyson Chandler once again , amassing 13 points and nine rebounds en route to a double - double . James Harden carried the load for Phoenix , as he tallied 40 points , six rebounds and eight assists . Ryan Anderson was second among starters , finishing with 16 points , four rebounds and two assists . Alex Len started for Tyson Chandler on Friday , as he totaled 13 points and nine rebounds .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 20 - 26 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 9 - 37 ) 121 - 103 at Moda Center on Sunday . Damian Lillard continues to solidify his place as one of the best fourth quarter players in the NBA after driving to the rim twice in the waning minutes of the final period , which put the Blazers in the win column once again . Lillard put forth his fourth straight 36 - plus point performance , and although he fell short of his explosive 51 points against the Golden State Warriors , he did score 36 points on 14 - of - 19 shooting , the majority of which came in the second half . The final four minutes of regulation mostly came down to a defensive battle , where both teams earned stop after stop to keep their chances of winning in tact , which came to be the theme of the matchup that resulted in 8 lead changes and 12 times both teams were dead even . CJ McCollum led all scorers with a balanced game in both halves of play , scoring 28 points , to go along with three assists and three rebounds on 12 - of - 21 shooting . Portland was unable to pressure the perimeter , and even if they did , the Blazers attacked the glass , out - rebounding the Lakers 42 - 30 . Both teams play on Wednesday , as the Trail Blazers head to Dallas to take on the Mavericks , while the Blazers head north of the border to take on the Toronto Raptors on Monday night .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 6 - 5 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 10 ) 99 - 89 on Wednesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . Collectively as a team , the Pistons shot better than this game , going 48 percent from the field and 21 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons finished at 37 percent from the floor and just 19 percent from deep . The Hawks also forced the Pistons into 12 turnovers , while committing just nine of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Jeff Teague led the way , going 9 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 28 points , while also adding six assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 17 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 17 points and 19 rebounds on the year . Josh Smith was able to record a double - double of his own . He went 8 - for - 19 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding eight rebounds and five assists . He 's now averaging 12 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , D.J . Augustin had 14 points ( 4 - 17 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) and five rebounds off the bench . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Orlando Magic on Friday , while the Pistons will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The New York Knicks defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 107 - 103 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . While there were n't many swings in this game , it stayed close throughout . In fact , there were only five lead changes and one tie , as it took some clutch free - throws from the Knicks to close things out . New York actually held the lead for the final three quarters , as the Trail Blazers could never quite crawl back in . Defense was key for New York , as they held the Trail Blazers to 47 percent from the field and 27 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was huge as well , with New York recording 26 assists to 13 turnovers , while Portland matched their assists and turnovers at 18 a piece . Scoring in the paint was extremely lopsided as well , with New York winning that battle , 66 - 0 . The Knicks ( 7 - 7 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . Damian Lillard did all he could for Portland , as he led the team with 22 points , five rebounds and six assists . C.J . McCollum finished with 16 points , five rebounds and five assists . Ed Davis was the only other player with more than four points , as he collected 15 points , eight rebounds and three blocks off the bench . New York will look to play better on Thursday in a road matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks .
The New York Knicks defeated the host Chicago Bulls 117 - 106 at United Center on Friday . Recent results from these teams would indicate a different outcome , but the Knicks showed some resiliency here on the road . New York actually led by 16 at times in the first quarter , before allowing the Bulls to take their first lead in the second quarter . The Knicks responded by recapturing the lead in the third and kept it for the entirety of the fourth quarter . New York shot 52 percent from the field and assisted on 31 of their 46 made baskets . They did that dominating the turnover differential as well , committing just five , while forcing 12 from the Bulls . The Knicks ( 2 - 3 ) got some great performance from their starters here , as all five scored at least 15 points . Kristaps Porzingis led the team , scoring 27 points to go along with his five boards . Carmelo Anthony was n't far behind , tallying 25 points , five rebounds and four assists of his own . Joakim Noah and Derrick Rose both played great in their return to Chicago . Noah tallied 16 points , nine rebounds and four assists , while Rose finished with 15 points , seven rebounds and a season - high 11 assists . The Bulls ( 3 - 2 ) had a tough task here against some former Chicago players and they simply did n't play well enough to win . Dwyane Wade did all he could though , scoring a game - high 35 points on 12 - of - 20 shooting . He also provided 10 rebounds and hit five more three - pointers in the loss . Jimmy Butler was the only starter in double figures , dropping 26 points of his own . Nikola Mirotic was a nice spark off the bench , totaling 14 points and six boards . The Knicks return to action on Sunday when they host the Utah Jazz , while Chicago travels to Indiana on Saturday to play the Pacers .

It was one point shy of a season - high for him , as he 's now put together a very strong string of games over the last two weeks . The majority of the rest of the Bucks production came from the bench . Greivis Vasquez came off the bench and had 18 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) and seven rebounds in 29 minutes . For the Bucks , Derrick Williams did everything he could to keep the Bucks in this game . He went 8 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 24 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two steals . He 's on fire right now as he 's scored 20 points or more over his last three playoff games , while shooting over 100 percent from the field in each of those outings . Coming off the bench , Greivis Vasquez added 18 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) and seven rebounds , while Lance Thomas had 13 points ( 5 - 5 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and three rebounds . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Friday .

The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 39 percent compared to the Magic , who went 39 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 15 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Victor Oladipo had his way with the Magic ' bigs . He went 10 - of - 20 from the field to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding six rebounds and six assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 36 points and 15 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 17 points and 11 rebounds on the year . He had a poor showing in Sunday 's game against the Heat , so it was good to see him get back on track . The Magic 's next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Chicago Bulls opened their season Thursday with a 105 - 99 victory against the visiting Boston Celtics . Chicago ( 10 ) jumped out to an early lead , finishing the first quarter with a 30 - 20 lead . The Bulls new - look backcourt of Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo quickly made contributions , with Wade scoring 14 points in the first half . The group managed to combat concerns about poor floor - spacing , with Wade and Rondo contributing five combined three - point makes . Chicago was able to keep the Celtics off the glass extremely effectively , winning the rebounding battle 55 - 36 . The Celtics ' edge was particularly pronounced on the offensive end , as they earned 18 offensive rebounds compared to Boston 's three . Boston ( 1 - 1 ) , meanwhile , managed to keep the game close throughout . All-Star point guard Isaiah Thomas led the charge for the Celtics ' offense , scoring 25 points . With bench guard Marcus Smart sidelined by injury , sophomore Terry Rozier saw 22 minutes coming off the bench . He made the most of his time on the floor , scoring eight points and recording two rebounds and four assists while recording no turnovers . Boston had a solid shooting night , converting on half of their shots from the floor overall . However , struggles on the glass ended up weighing the Celtics down despite keeping Chicago to just 43 percent shooting . The Celtics will host the Pistons on Saturday , while the Bulls will see the Lakers on Friday .

While there were some huge swings in the first half , this game stayed close throughout the second half . The Bulls started the game up 19 - 19 after the first quarter , but the Nuggets responded with a 220 run in the second quarter to recapture the lead . Bench scoring was the biggest difference in this game , with the Nuggets bench combining for 61 points to the Bulls 13 combined bench points . Denver won many of the stats , as they won the rebounding battle , assist differential , points in the paint and fastbreak points . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Chicago Bulls , 103 - 91 , at Spectrum Center on Friday night . The Bulls ( 14 - 15 ) checked in to Friday night on a downturn , as they 'd lost four of their last five . They were able to get off to a fast start , however , outscoring the host Hornets ( 17 - 13 ) by a 26 - 22 margin in the first quarter . Charlotte turned the table quickly in the second period , however , almost doubling up the visitors with a 26 - 14 advantage . Although the Bulls bounced back in the third , the Hornets were able to keep pace every step of the way throughout the second half , which resulted in their tenth home win of the season . While Chicago failed to find much scoring from their starting five outside of Jimmy Butler , Charlotte benefited from a balanced effort across their first unit . As customary , the effective backcourt duo of Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum led the way , as they supplied matching 20 - point contributions . Butler 's 24 points led the Bulls , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists and a block . Dwyane Wade was second , registering 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Taj Gibson supplied 10 points , three rebounds and a pair of blocks . Rajon Rondo mustered a modest seven points but also provided 10 assists , nine rebounds and two steals . Doug McDermott led the second unit with 15 points , while Nikola Mirotic managed an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double that also included a steal and a block in just 19 minutes off the bench . Walker added five rebounds , four assists and a steal to his co - leading point total , while Batum 's performance was a triple - double that also consisted of 11 rebounds , 10 assists , a steal and a block . Cody Zeller went for 13 points , seven rebounds , four assists , two blocks and a steal . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist had a near double - double with 12 points , nine rebounds , two assists , a steal and four blocks . Frank Kaminsky III paced the bench with 13 points , five boards , an assist and a block . The Bulls are in San Antonio on Christmas Day to take on the Spurs , while the Hornets visit the Brooklyn Nets on Monday evening .
It took a lot of big shots to get to overtime , as there were 10 ties in this OT thriller . Devin Booker tied the game twice in the final 32 seconds , as his 34 points were a career - high . Many of the statistics were lopsided , but the biggest differential was in the blocks department , as the Hawks swatted away 13 shots to the Suns two . Atlanta also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 50 - 51 . The Suns ( 20 - 58 ) have now lost three of their last four games , as they continue to fall deeper out of the playoffs . Devin Booker led the team in scoring , as he tallied 34 points , five rebounds and two assists . Paul Millsap went just 3 - of - 8 from the field , but finished with 13 points , 17 rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Mirza Teletovic was the only other player in double figures , accruing 17 points , nine rebounds and three assists . Kyle Korver and Mirza Teletovic led the Suns in scoring , dropping 11 points a piece . Phoenix will host the New York Knicks on Saturday for their next game . The Hawks ( 46 - 32 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 13 tries . Devin Booker led the way for Atlanta , as he tallied 34 points , five rebounds , two assists and two steals on 12 - of - 25 shooting . Jeff Teague finished second on the team , totaling 20 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the visiting Brooklyn Nets , 129 - 109 at Target Center on Saturday evening . Karl-Anthony Towns imposed his will on this one , as he poured in a game - high 37 points to help the Timberwolves dominate , as they won every quarter on their way to the 20 - point win over the struggling Nets . The Timberwolves ( 18 - 29 ) shot 51 percent from the field , as all five starters scored in double digits to lead the way . Karl-Anthony Towns grabbed 13 rebounds and recorded four blocked shots , to go along with his game - high 37 points . Andrew Wiggins followed up with 23 points , while Zach LaVine chipped in 20 . Shabazz Muhammad came up big off the bench for Minnesota , as he finished with 18 points and seven rebounds . The Timberwolves will look to keep rolling , as they play host to the Magic on Monday . The Nets ( 9 - 27 ) outscored the T-Wolves 58 - 48 in the paint and 23 - 12 in fast - break points but were not able to compete as efficiently , as they shot 48 percent from the field , and 27 percent from deep , compared to the 45 percent the T-Wolves hit from deep . Brook Lopez was the high - point man for the Nets , with 25 points , to go along with seven rebounds . Three other players scored in double digits for Brooklyn , including Sean Kilpatrick , who added 14 points , in 25 minutes off the bench . The Nets will look to bounce back , as they visit Miami on Monday .
The Golden State Warriors defeated the Houston Rockets , 121 - 94 , at Oracle Arena on Thursday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Houston leading for the majority of the first quarter , Golden State held Houston to just 50 points in the second half . Defense was key , as they held Houston to 42 percent from the field and 19 percent from three - point range , 50 percent from three - point range and 50 percent from three - point range . Golden State also dominated down low , as they won the rebounding battle , 43 - 44 and the points in the paint differential 56 - 44 . The Rockets ( 1 - 3 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . James Harden continued his great form , as he tallied 18 points , seven rebounds and 10 assists in the win . Klay Thompson was second on the team , as he scored 23 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting . Draymond Green did commit six turnovers , but he accumulated 18 points , eight rebounds and six assists on 7 - of - 12 shooting . Stephen Curry was the only other starter with more than 12 , as he tallied 23 points , seven rebounds and five assists . More importantly , those three players combined to go 31 - of - 51 from the field . Houston will look to bounce back on Sunday in a road matchup against the Oklahoma City Thunder .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 6 - 1 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 3 - 4 ) 101 - 97 on Saturday . Cleveland has won seven straight games , and they 've vaulted themselves out of the early - season hole they were in , at one time standing with a sub - .500 record of 7 - 1 . The Houston Rockets notched their ninth straight win as they defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 122 - 100 , at Toyota Center on Friday night . The Rockets made history in a couple of different ways in this contest , beginning with their nine - game win streak , which is their longest win streak in eight years . They also sank an NBA-record 24 three - pointers , while James Harden passed Hakeem Olajuwon , to become the Rockets ' all time triple - double leader , as he notched his second straight triple - double , for the fifteenth of his career . Harden finished with 29 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting , along with 13 assists and 11 rebounds , in 34 minutes . Meanwhile , Eric Gordon notched a season - high 29 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting , including 7 - of - 12 from deep , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Rockets ( 20 - 7 ) shot 24 - of - 61 from long distance and tallied 27 assists in the game . They moved to 10 - 2 at home and will head out to Minnesota to take - on the Timberwolves on Saturday , for their second game in as many nights . The Pelicans ( 9 - 19 ) fell short on the second night of a back - to - back as they struggled shooting , going 41 percent from the field , 33 percent from long range and only 55 percent from the foul line . Anthony Davis scored 19 points before he was forced to leave the game in the third quarter with a leg contusion , and did not return . No player tallied more than 20 points for the Pelicans but five players scored in double figures , including Cheick Diallo who went 4 - of - 5 from the field , for 10 points , along with seven rebounds , in 22 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans fell to 3 - 10 on the road and will look to bounce back as they visit San Antonio on Sunday .
The Sacramento Spurs ( 5 - 4 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 6 - 4 ) 91 - 94 on Sunday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Kings were able to use a strong second half , where they out - scored the Kings 47 - 38 , to coast to a nine - point victory on the road . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 43 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were also able to force the Kings into 14 turnovers , while committing only 14 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Spurs were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who went 10 - for - 19 from the floor and 5 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 25 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 53 points and 12 rebounds over his last two games . The only other King in double figures was Danny Green , who posted 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 34 minutes . The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Friday .
The visiting San Antonio Spurs beat the Memphis Grizzlies on Tuesday , 97 - 90 . The Spurs ( 55 - 16 ) look poised for a second straight 60 - win season as they continue to roll as the season draws to a close . San Antonio remains two games back from first place in the Western Conference , but still has plenty of time to overtake Golden State for the league 's top record . On Thursday , All-Star forward LaMarcus Aldridge found his groove and helped lead the Spurs offense past the tough grit - and - grind Grizzlies . Aldridge led the team with 23 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting . Superstar Kawhi Leonard had a bit of an off night despite still pouring in 19 points . Leonard shot under 50 percent from the field and went a sub - par 4 - of - 7 from the free - throw line . Memphis ( 40 - 32 ) has now dropped two straight after a four - game win streak earlier in the month . The Grizzlies have fallen to seventh place in the Western Conference , allowing themselves to be eclipsed by the Thunder for sixth . Memphis struggled against the Spurs ' top - ranked defense , shooting just 43 percent from the field on the night . Only two Grizzlies scored in double digits , with only Mike Conley eclipsing 20 points . Conley scored 22 , while All-Star center Marc Gasol added 13 points and 10 rebounds . San Antonio will host the Knicks on Saturday , while the Grizzlies visit Golden State on Sunday .

The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 108 - 94 Tuesday at AT & T Center . The Spurs avoided suffering from their first three - game losing streak in almost a year in pretty dominant fashion , as they opened with a big opening period and adopted a bend - but - don't - break mentality the rest of the way . San Antonio was carried by a pair of stellar performances from their stars in the frontcourt , with Kawhi Leonard and LaMarcus Aldridge shining from start to finish . Leonard finished with a game - high 36 points on top of eight rebounds and four assists , while LaMarcus Aldridge shot 8 - of - 15 from the field en route to scoring 25 points and grabbing six rebounds of his own . With the pair accounting for over half of the Spurs ' points Tuesday night , no other San Antonio players managed to score in double figures , but six managed to score at least six points . For the Thunder , they could n't overcome a slow start to the game and one of their poorest shooting performances of the season . Overall as a team , Oklahoma City shot just 35 percent from the field and 25 percent from beyond the arc . Russell Westbrook managed to lead the way with a team - high 27 points on top of 14 assists and six rebounds , while the starting frontcourt of Steven Adams and Domantas Sabonis each recorded their own double - doubles , combining for 29 points and 22 rebounds . The Thunder have now dropped two straight against two of the NBA 's best teams by a combined 30 points . Up next , the Spurs will remain home Thursday to take on the 76ers , while the Thunder will head home Wednesday and play the Bulls .
