The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 100 - 93 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Sunday . More often than not , the trio of LeBron James , Kevin Love and Kyrie Irving are essentially enough to overcome most opponents . It was a different story Sunday , however , as veteran Channing Frye actually led the way with a season - high 20 - point effort in 25 minutes off the bench . The aforementioned starters were n't necessarily underwhelming , as they combined for 55 points , including four total three - pointers from Love and James . Defense was also undeniably a factor , as Cleveland ( 8 - 1 ) held the Hornets ( 6 - 3 ) to 38 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who tallied 21 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal . Marvin Williams posted 16 points , six rebounds and two assists . Nicolas Batum managed a near double - double with 15 points , nine boards , seven assists , two steals and a block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist did get there , supplying 11 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and a steal . Frye added three rebounds and three blocks to his team - high scoring total . A pair of 19 - point efforts from James and Irving paced the starting five , with the former also filling out the stat sheet with eight rebounds , eight assists , a steal and a block and the latter dishing out four assists , posting three rebounds and recording a steal . Love was strong as well , pouring in 17 points and bringing in 11 rebounds , four assists and a steal . Tristan Thompson mustered a modest four points , but did bring in 12 rebounds . The Hornets move on to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Tuesday night , while the Cavaliers remain home to take on the Raptors on Tuesday evening as well .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Charlotte Hornets 105 - 90 at Spectrum Center on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 9 - 5 ) pulled out their fifth straight win behind a strong effort from Mike Conley . The floor general for the Grizzlies was an all around force from end - to - end , especially after losing James Ennis ( calf ) . The calf injury flared up after returning to the lineup on Monday , and is another blow to the front court for Memphis given Chandler Parsons ( bruised left knee ) inability to play for roughly two more weeks . Memphis controlled the pace of the game from start to finish and never let the Hornets ( 8 - 5 ) get close enough to make it a game . The game got blow fully open after Conley buried a 27 - foot three point shot to take a 69 - 45 lead with just a few seconds left in the third quarter . The Grizzlies point guard finished with 31 points , four rebounds , two assists and three steals on 11 - of - 21 shooting . JaMychal Green had a great performance in the starting lineup with 12 points , eight rebounds and an assist on 4 - of - 4 shooting in 31 minutes . Kemba Walker led the starting lineup in scoring for the Hornets , but failed to provide enough to get his team back in the game after contributing 17 points and two assists . Charlotte got strong productivity from the bench , where Frank Kaminsky dropped 23 points on 11 shots in 20 minutes , while Spencer Hawes added 14 points and 10 rebounds . Both teams play on Saturday , as the Hornets host the San Antonio Spurs , while the Grizzlies head to Philadelphia to take on the 76ers .

Goran Dragic lead the way scoring for Phoenix , scoring 34 points on 11 - of - 15 shooting in just 39 minutes . Roy Hibbert recorded a 15 - point , 10 - rebound double - double , and Roy Hibbert just an efficient 15 points ( 6 - 14 FG ) to go with 10 rebounds , one assist and one block in 31 minutes . Roy Hibbert had 15 points ( 6 - 14 FG ) , 10 rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block in 31 minutes . The Pacers were led by Roy Hibbert , who totaled 15 points , 10 rebounds , two blocks , two steals and one assist in 31 minutes . Both Markieff Morris and Roy Hibbert finished with a pair of 10 - point efforts . Roy Hibbert scored 10 points on 5 - of - 12 shooting and grabbed six rebounds in 27 minutes , while Gerald Stuckey ( 15 ) and CJ Watson ( 14 ) were the only other players to score in double figures . C.J . Watson ( 14 ) was the only other player to score in double figures , and C.J . Watson ( 14 ) was the only other player to score in double figures , while C.J . Miles had 17 points in 21 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Pacers will stay at home Friday to take on the Pistons , while the Pacers will head home Friday to play the Raptors .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 6 - 1 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 2 - 4 ) 97 - 85 on Tuesday at American Airlines Arena in Miami . With the score at 91 - 86 in favor of the Thunder going into the fourth quarter , it looked like a close finish was destined to be on its way . Instead , the Thunder were able to out - score the Heat 14 - 24 in the final quarter to secure the six - point victory on the road . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 37 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Russell Westbrook backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 14 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and 0 blocked shots . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 18 points and 12 rebounds , as he 's really stepped up his production with Ibaka sidelined . Like we 've grown accustomed to , Russell Westbrook came just shy of another triple - double . In 27 minutes , he recorded 14 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) , five rebounds and 11 assists . He had a poor showing in Sunday 's game against the Heat , so it was good to see him get back on track offensively Monday . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Heat will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 42 - 39 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 40 - 41 ) 101 - 92 on Sunday at the American Airlines Center in Utah . The Mavericks got off to a quick start Wednesday , out - scoring the Jazz 22 - 20 in the first quarter alone . The Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 34 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 46 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks were also able to force the Jazz into 10 turnovers , while committing only nine of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Mavericks were led by the duo of Dirk Nowitzki and Gordon Parson . Nowitzki shot 7 - for - 12 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 22 points , while also adding 11 rebounds . It was his second straight double - double and fourth on the year . Dirk Nowitzki scored 22 points and also posted 11 rebounds . It was his second double - double in his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaged 26 points and 11 assists . The only other Nugget to reach double figures in points was Derrick Favors , who finished with 11 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and three rebounds . Rudy Gobert did most of the damage for the Jazz as well , posting 22 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and 11 rebounds . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Wizard to reach double - digit points was Raymond Felton , who came off the bench for 10 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and four rebounds . The Jazz 's next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to Chicago to play the Bulls on Wednesday .

The Los Angeles Clippers ( 11 - 9 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 11 - 9 ) 103 - 101 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Clippers did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 30 percent compared to the Sixers , who went 30 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Clippers did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 13 turnovers , while committing just 14 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Jamal Crawford had a big day for the Magic , as he went 10 - for - 19 from the field and 6 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 32 points , while also adding five assists over 31 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 31 points and 13 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 11 points and 9 rebounds on the year . Elfrid Payton also had a solid all - around game . He recorded 21 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , eight assists and four steals in 37 minutes . He 's had a nice impact on the defensive side of the ball lately as well , recording three or more steals in five out of his last five games . Wesley Johnson was the other player to reach double - digit points , as he finished with 21 . The Clippers ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Magic will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 33 - 19 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 20 - 33 ) 95 - 93 on Friday . The form of these two teams would have indicated a different result , but the Pacers put in a great effort to pick up a needed road win . Defense was key , as the Spurs held the Pacers to 41 percent shooting and forced them to commit 12 turnovers . The assisting margin was huge as well , with San Antonio recording 18 assists to the Pacers 24 . Indiana only dominated the boards , as they snatched down 42 boards to the Pacers 50 . San Antonio has been throttling teams , but this was easily their worst offensive performance of the year . No player scored more than 18 points and no player recorded double - digits in rebounds or assists . The Pacers had four players score 11 or more points and thats indicative of this teams nature , as they play team - ball in an individualized sport . The Pacers will look to rebound when they take on the disappointing New Orleans Pelicans on Monday . The Spurs did not have a single player who scored more than 10 points , but that 's not a huge surprise with this San Antonio team . The bench was spectacular , as they combined for 54 points , 17 rebounds and 10 assists in the win . The high - scorer for the Spurs on this evening was Tim Duncan , who collected 15 points , eight rebounds , two assists and two blocks in the defeat . The Pacers will look to keep up this good form against the Charlotte Hornets on Saturday .

They remain without David Lee ( hamstring ) , but Draymond Green has been more than a capable fill - in . Everyone on their roster that was on the team last season is experiencing a new level of success under new coach Steve Kerr and his offensive system that stresses ball movement . Both Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson finished with double - doubles . Curry had 24 points and five assists on 8 - of - 17 shooting from the field to go along with five assists and five rebounds . Draymond Green pitched in with 12 points , eight rebounds , four assists and three steals in 26 minutes , while Nance Jr. finished with 11 points and eight rebounds in 20 minutes . The Lakers shot 52 percent from the field and 39 percent from beyond the arc , decimating a Lakers defense that has found it 's way of late and that should n't be looked at as an easy puzzle to crack . Golden State will have a couple days off before hosting the Toronto Raptors on Friday . Los Angeles has lost two straight games . They shot a woeful 36 percent from the field and 23 percent from beyond the arc Sunday . The Detroit Pistons defeated the Denver Nuggets , 103 - 86 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Saturday . In a battle between two middling Eastern Conference teams , the Pistons were able to prevail , thanks to a big fourth quarter . Detroit outscored Denver 26 - 19 in the fourth quarter and held them to just 14 points through the first nine minutes of that period . The Pistons offense was on point all evening , as they shot 48 percent from the field , 73 percent from the free - throw line and 28 percent from three - point range . The rebounding differential was huge as well , with the Pistons recording 22 assists to nine turnovers , while the Nuggets committed 16 turnovers to just 15 assists . Andre Drummond recorded another triple - double , as he led the team with 19 points , 19 rebounds and three blocks . Marcus Morris had one of his best games of the year , totaling 21 points and nine rebounds . Danilo Gallinari led the starters in scoring , dropping 21 points and nine rebounds . Jusuf Nurkic was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 10 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Jon Leuer led the bench in scoring , as he dropped 15 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting . The Pistons will host the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday for their next game . The Nuggets ( 2 - 3 ) have been one of the biggest disappointments this season and it 's a wonder when they 'll pull out of this hole . Emmanuel Mudiay did all he could though , as he tallied 11 points , five rebounds and eight assists . Danilo Gallinari was the only starter in double figures , as he accumulated 16 points , three rebounds and two assists . Stanley Johnson led the bench with 12 points and three rebounds , while Ish Smith provided 11 points , eight rebounds and eight assists of his own .

The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Dallas Mavericks 92 - 91 Monday at American Airlines Center . With just over three minutes remaining in Monday 's contest , the Thunder ( 42 - 31 ) looked dead in the water , as they were down 13 and the Mavericks ( 31 - 42 ) had control for majority of the game . Russell Westbrook , however , had other plans , as he led the team on a 140 run to end the game that was topped off by a game - winning jumper from the free throw line . Westbrook finished with yet another triple - double of 37 points ( 16 of which came in the final quarter ) , 13 rebounds and 10 assists in 36 minutes , and he did so while shooting an efficient 15 - of - 30 from the field . And the MVP-candidate carried the load for Oklahoma City , as Victor Oladipo ( 15 ) and Taj Gibson ( 13 ) were the only other players to score in double figures for the Thunder . As for Dallas , they played a strong 45 minutes before collapsing down the stretch and missing their final six shots from the field . Six different Mavericks players managed to score in double figures , but overall , it ended up being a subpar offensive performance from the team , as they shot just 44 percent from the field and 35 percent from behind the arc . Up next , the Thunder will stay home Wednesday to take on the Trail Blazers , while the Mavericks will look to get back on the right track in Milwaukee on Friday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host Denver Nuggets , 125 - 124 , at Pepsi Center on Saturday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Rockets finished the game on a 28 - 8 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as Houston 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with Houston hitting 51 percent of their shots , while Mason Plumlee hit just 22 percent of their shots . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the two teams matching in turnovers , while Houston won the assist battle , 27 - 26 . Defensive rebounding was dominant for the Rockets as well , as they snatched down 0 defensive boards to Denver 's 26 . The Rockets ( 49 - 22 ) have been stifling teams with their rocket launcher mentality and dominating wins over teams like the Nuggets show just how good they 've become . James Harden was once again the catalyst , accumulating 39 points , seven rebounds , 11 assists and four steals . Gary Harris was second on the team , as he accrued 24 points , seven rebounds and eight assists . Eric Gordon was a huge spark off the bench , providing 18 points , three rebounds and three assists on 5 - of - 9 from three - point range . Clint Capela recorded a 12 - point , 9 - rebound double - double . Jamal Murray led the bench with 13 points .

Ellis finished with 17 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and four assists , while Gibson had 15 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and three assists of his own . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , with San Antonio dishing out 24 assists to just 15 turnovers , while Philadelphia committed 10 turnovers to just 23 assists . Kawhi Leonard led the way for Philadelphia , as he tallied 32 points , six rebounds and five assists . Tony Parker was second on the team , finishing with 18 points and five assists . Dewayne Dedmon started for LaMarcus Aldridge and amassed 10 points and 11 rebounds . The only other starter in double figures was Dewayne Dedmon , who totaled 10 points and 11 rebounds on 4 - of - 5 shooting . Nik Stauskas was huge off the bench , totaling 16 points and seven rebounds , while Nik Stauskas provided 16 points and seven rebounds . On deck for the Sixers is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday . The Sixers ( 18 - 34 ) had lost four - straight headed into this game , so a double - digit home win in just what the doctor ordered . Kawhi Leonard had one of his best games of the season , as he accumulated 32 points , six rebounds and five assists on 9 - of - 18 shooting . Tony Parker was second on the team , as he accrued 18 points , three rebounds and five assists . Dewayne Dedmon got a rare start and totaled 10 points , 11 rebounds and three assists .
The Spurs were expected to win this game easily , but it took a monster second half to do so . In fact , San Antonio outscored New Orleans , 54 - 30 , in the second half . Defense was key for the Spurs , as they held the Pelicans to 39 percent shooting and forced them to commit 22 turnovers . Kawhi Leonard carried the load for New Orleans , as he tallied 31 points , seven rebounds , six assists and three steals . LaMarcus Aldridge finished second on the team with 21 points , 15 rebounds and three blocks . The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 118 - 86 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Sunday . Indiana got out to a hot start in the first quarter and they never looked back after that . In fact , the Pacers led by 19 after the first quarter , as they never relinquished the lead from there . Defense was key for Indiana , as they held Orlando to 37 percent from the field and 24 percent from three - point range . Rim protection killed Orlando as well , as they failed to record a block in their loss . The assist - to - turnover ratio kept the Pacers hanging around , as they committed 28 turnovers to 15 assists , while the Magic committed 10 turnovers to just 37 assists . The Pacers ( 29 - 44 ) had to play this game without Al Horford and Avery Bradley , as they did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to hold off the Pacers . Rodney Stuckey was the player of the game , as he accumulated 34 points , six rebounds and seven assists on 13 - of - 19 shooting . Damjan Rudez was a huge spark off the bench , accruing 17 points , three rebounds and five assists . Nikola Vucevic was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 13 points and five rebounds . CJ Watson was a huge spark off the bench , providing 12 points , four rebounds , five assists and two steals in the win . Luis Scola was a huge spark off the bench , providing 15 points , 10 rebounds and three blocks in just 19 minutes of action .

In fact , there were only two lead changes and one tie , as it took some clutch free - throws from the Wizards to close things out . Washington actually held a lead for the majority of the fourth quarter , this was a wire - to - wire win . In fact , Washington 's largest lead was just two points , as they had to outscore Sacramento by 24 in the second half to win by one . Shooting was key , with the Wizards hitting 40 percent of their three - pointers and 81 percent from the free - throw line . The Washington Wizards defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 117 - 110 , at Amway Center on Wednesday evening . The Wizards ( 12 - 14 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Clippers ( 20 - 8 ) , tallying a 53 percent success rate from the field and 53 percent from three - point range . They also suffocated the Clippers ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 29 percent shooting from beyond the arc . The Clippers ( 20 - 8 ) did a pretty good job of keeping pace , though , as they emerged from the first quarter with a 28 - 28 lead . However , Bradley Beal led the way for the Wizards with 41 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds and three assists . John Wall followed with 18 points , 11 assists , five rebounds and one steal . J.J. Redick was next with 17 points and a rebound . Chris Paul tallied a near double - double with 13 points , 12 assists , four rebounds and two steals . Austin Rivers led the second unit with 13 points , two assists and a block . Austin Rivers was productive in a reserve role as well , generating 13 points , two steals , two assists and two steals . Jordan Morris matched Griffin 's scoring total and added nine rebounds , two assists and three blocks . DeAndre Jordan compiled a 13 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one block . Marreese Speights led the second unit with 14 points , four rebounds and one block .
The Sacramento Trail Blazers ( 16 - 25 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 31 - 11 ) 94 - 98 on Sunday . The Trail Blazers came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldnt hold off a bad Kings team . The key for Portland was their shooting , as they shot 45 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range in an incredible comeback victory . The turnovers were the difference in the game , as they committed 21 turnovers to the Kings 13 . Sacramento has been playing some of their best basketball of the season since the new year , but this does mark their third - straight loss . It wasnt for the faults of DeMarcus Cousins or LaMarcus Aldridge though , as they both had great games . Lillard finished with 22 points , five assists and six rebounds , while Matthews tallied 17 points , three rebounds and four assists . Sacramento has a quick turnaround for their next game , as they play the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday in their next game . Portland has been struggling mightily recently and this performance is indicative of their form since the All-Star break , as they 've lost 10 of their last 20 . Wesley Matthews scored 17 of his own , while locking down Cousins for long stretches of this game . On deck for Sacramento is a matchup with the Memphis Grizzlies on Sunday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Orlando Magic , 111 - 92 , at Amway Center on Wednesday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Hawks finished the game on a 23 - 8 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as Orlando 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with Atlanta hitting 54 percent from the field and 53 percent from three - point range , while Orlando went 43 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range on their end . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , as the Hawks recorded more assists than the Magic , while committing less turnovers . The Hawks ( 19 - 16 ) are starting to rebound after a terrible December and dominant road wins like this show just how good they can be . Dennis Schroeder ran the offense at ease , accumulating 18 points , six rebounds and seven assists in the win . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 12 rebounds . Elfrid Payton led the starters with 15 points , four rebounds , six assists , three steals and a block . Evan Fournier went just 6 - of - 14 from the field , including 2 - of - 6 from long range , on his way to 14 points .

The New York Knicks defeated the Indiana Pacers 87 - 81 Tuesday at Madison Square Garden . It was a rough start for the Knicks ( 27 - 41 ) , who scored just 24 points in the first quarter . Those struggles carried into the second quarter , and the team found themselves down by 10 at the half and they appeared ready to earn their fourth straight loss . A big second half , however , helped turn this around , and they managed to outscore the Pacers ( 34 - 33 ) by 16 in the second half en route to the victory . Carmelo Anthony led the way for New York , recording a double - double of 22 points and 13 rebounds in 41 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis struggled in the outing , shooting just 5 - of - 17 from the field en route to scoring 11 points , and to make matters worse , he left the game early in the fourth quarter and did not return due to a thigh bruise . As for Indiana , it was a forgettable shooting night for them in every aspect of the game . As a team , the Pacers shot just 37 percent from the field , 28 percent from behind the arc and 60 percent from the free throw line - - although they only attempted 15 shots at the charity stripe . Paul George led the way with over a quarter of the team 's points , finishing with 22 points on a rough 9 - of - 22 shooting performance from the field . Myles Turner was the only other Indiana player to score in double figures , with the big man notching a double - double of 13 points and 16 rebounds in 31 minutes . Up next , the Knicks will have a rematch with the Nets on Thursday , while the Pacers will head home Wednesday to play the Hornets .

He was able to get to the free throw line 12 times and converted on a perfect 11 of those attempts . The Washington Wizards ( 19 - 18 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 19 - 20 ) 101 - 99 on Saturday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Wizards road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Wizards had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 10 - 6 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , Washington had managed a paltry three wins in 21 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game . They 'd also struggled offensively the majority of the year , often failing to even reach 100 points over the first 22 games of the season . However , the light has seemingly come on for Washington , and their side of the scoreboard , over their last two outings . After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma City on Wednesday , the Wizards roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting 51 percent from the field and 50 percent from beyond the arc . They also managed to find a 51 percent success rate from the field overall , and an equally impressive 50 percent tally from beyond the arc . Chicago was led by Bradley Beal 's game - high 26 points , and he supplemented the game - high scoring total with 14 assists and six rebounds . Morris supplied a 19 - point , 5 - rebound double - double , and added two assists , three steals and a block . Michael Carter-Williams was next with 14 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Rajon Rondo pitched in with 12 points , six assists , four rebounds and three steals in 27 minutes , his most extensive game action in some time .

They also suffocated the Timberwolves ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 33 percent shooting from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . Minnesota 's collective stingy 51 percent success rates from the field and three - point range ( 14 - of - 46 ) . The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Philadelphia 76ers 113 - 95 Wednesday at American Airlines Center . The Mavericks ( 19 - 30 ) steamrolled their way to a fourth straight victory as they continue to be much - improved since the start of the new year . They have now won five of their last six games and boast a 9 - 6 record in 2017 . A major part of this run has been the play of Seth Curry , who scored a game - high 22 points Wednesday on top of six assists , four steals and three rebounds . It was his ninth game since the start of the new year with at least 15 points . The surprise performance of the night , however , came off the bench from Salah Mejri , who played just 21 minutes as a reserve but recorded 16 points and a game - high 17 rebounds in that time . Devin Harris also had a solid day off the bench , scoring 14 points in just 19 minutes . As for the 76ers ( 18 - 30 ) , they 've cooled off a bit since their hot start to January , as they have now lost three of their last four games after Wednesday 's defeat . Jahlil Okafor put together a solid offensive performance in the loss , scoring 16 points in 24 minutes , but it 's clear that Philadelphia is missing the inside presence of Joel Embiid , who has now missed five of the last six games with a knee contusion . Ersan Ilyasova added a double - double of 13 points and 10 rebounds , but overall for the 76ers , it was a forgettable night offensively . The team ended up shooting just 46 percent from the field and 27 percent from behind the arc while committing 21 total turnovers . Up next , the Mavericks will look to continue their winning ways against Portland on Friday , while the 76ers will travel Thursday to San Antonio .

The Warriors also received a nice contribution from their bench with both Ben McLemore and Buddy Hield reaching double figures . Lawson recorded 20 points ( 8 - 9 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and two assists over 24 minutes , while Labissiere had 22 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) in 33 minutes . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Utah Jazz , 85 - 94 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Bucks ( 30 - 40 ) came into Saturday 's contest trying to keep the pressure on eighth - seeded Denver , which they could come within one game of catching with a win against the Bucks ( 30 - 36 ) . Milwaukee was able to pull away in the third quarter on the strength of a typically remarkable effort from Gordon Hayward , as he tallied 19 points , eight rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block to lead the team . The Bucks were led by Jabari Parker 's 19 points , which he supplemented eight rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . No other starter managed double - digit scoring , but Greg Monroe did his best to pull out the first unit with a 12 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and two blocks . Trey Lyles was productive off the bench as well , tallying 14 points , four rebounds and four assists . Rudy Gobert and Derrick Favors turned in a pair of 12 - point efforts from the frontcourt , with the former also contributing 14 rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks , and the latter supplying seven boards , three assists , a steal and a block . Rodney Hood matched Hood 's point total and added four rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Rodney Hood provided 10 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Trey Lyles drew another start for Paul Millsap ( knee ) and provided a team - high 14 points , which he supplemented with eight boards , two assists , a steal and a block . Derrick Favors managed 12 points , nine rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Jerryd Ingles and Joe Ingles led the second unit with 12 points .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 110 - 108 Monday at Chesapeake Energy Arena . Monday 's game came with no shortage of drama , as after plenty of back and forth in the final period , Paul Millsap sit a short jumper that put the Hawks ( 14 - 12 ) up by two with just 12 seconds remaining . The Thunder ( 16 - 12 ) , with one last opportunity remaining went to their star guard Russell Westbrook , who missed a jumper , got the rebound and got his shot blocked before Oklahoma City was able to call one last timeout . The Thunder inbounded it to Westbrook again , who missed a potential game - winning 3 - pointer , and while Steven Adams was able to get the rebound for Oklahoma City , his dunk at buzzer was ruled no good . In the end , it was a battle between the team 's two starting point guards , with Dennis Schroder and Westbrook putting together two of their very best performances of the season . Schroder scored 31 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting from the field - - his second 30 - point game of the season - - on top of eight assists and five rebounds . Meanwhile , Westbrook posted 46 points - - his second highest total this season - - seven assists and 11 rebounds in 35 minutes . Ultimately , the deciding factor Monday was that Schroder got help from his teammates , while the rest of the Thunder players struggled . Atlanta 's Millsap recorded 30 points and 11 rebounds in 39 minutes , while the next highest scorer for Oklahoma City was Jerami Grant with 15 off the bench . Up next , the Thunder will travel to Minnesota on Friday to take on the Timberwolves , while the Thunder will head home Wednesday and play the Heat .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 39 - 21 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 37 - 23 ) 96 - 86 on Wednesday at the United Center in Chicago . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bulls 26 - 18 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 26 percent from the three - point line , while the Bulls went 31 percent from the floor and just 39 percent from beyond the arc . The Clippers were also able to force the Bulls into 11 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Nikola Mirotic had a big day for the Bulls . He went 11 - for - 23 from the field and 5 - for - 8 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 29 points , while also adding nine rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's now combined for 48 points and 33 rebounds over his last two games . DeAndre Noah was able to record a double - double of his own , finishing with 13 points ( 2 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 9 - 14 FT ) , 11 rebounds and two blocked shots . The double - double marked his ninth of the season thus far . The only other Hawk to reach double figures in points was Tony Snell , who chipped in 13 points on 3 - of - 7 shooting from the field . The Bulls ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Bulls will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .

The Bucks were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 52 percent from the floor and a meager 64 percent from deep . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 10 rebounds over his last two games . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Buck reaching double - digits in points was Al-Farouq Aminu , who recorded 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and five rebounds in 28 minutes as a starter . They were the superior shooters as well , going 51 percent from the field and 59 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went 48 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from beyond the arc . Free throws were also a big difference as the Nets converted on 18 - of - 32 while the Nuggets only made 13 - of - 24 . It was a new season - high in points for him , while also marking his first double - double since his first game of the season back in November . Gary Harris was the only other Nuggets ' player to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 21 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and three assists . The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks 93 - 92 at Toyota Center on Sunday . The Rockets ( 2 - 1 ) maintained a lead throughout most of the Western Conference clash with the Mavericks ( 0 - 3 ) , which included a 10 point lead at the half . Drama ensued down the stretch , started by Wesley Matthews , who was able to cap of a 70 run with back - to - back baskets , which cut the Rockets ' lead to two points with 3:2 remaining in the fourth quarter . Matthews ' heads up defense forced a turnover on Harden and transitioned the impressive scoring effort to give Dallas a chance to grab its first win of the season . Matthews continued to put the team on his shoulders after draining a 27 - foot three pointer to tie the game at 92 with four seconds left in the game , but he also committed a shooting foul on James Hardens ensuing drive to the hoop with just one - tenth of a second left to play . Harden missed the first free throw but sank the second and that was all that needed to ice the game for Houston . Harden went on to put up star numbers again , scoring 28 points to go along with seven rebounds and seven assists . Eric Gordon and Ryan Anderson joined Harden in double figures with 14 points each , while Clint Capela was strong on the glass , totaling 10 rebounds . Wes Matthews struggled from behind - the - arc , but not when it mattered most for Dallas . Matthews finished with 25 points , five boards and three assists on 9 - of - 25 shooting ( 3 - of - 15 from three ) . Harrison Barnes started 3 - of - 5 from the field but ended up missing his next six attempts on his way to a lowly 10 points in 38 minutes of action . The Mavericks will head to Cleveland to visit the reigning champion Cavaliers on Tuesday , while the Rockets will visit the Utah Jazz on Wednesday .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Boston Celtics , 109 - 103 , at TD Garden on Wednesday . The Celtics ( 9 - 7 ) checked in to Monday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Celtics ( 9 - 7 ) , managing a 47 percent success rate from the floor and 35 percent from three - point range . They also suffocated the Celtics ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 35 percent shooting from the field and eliciting 10 turnovers from their hosts as well . Isaiah Thomas paced the Celtics with 24 points , a rebound and eight assists . Jae Crowder was next with 18 points , three rebounds , five assists and one steal . Al Horford registered a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and three blocks . Danny Green provided nine points , seven rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Patty Mills paced the bench with 19 points , an assist and a rebound , an assist and a steal . Patty Mills was productive as a reserve as well with 19 points , one assist , one rebound and one steal . David Lee led the bench with 15 points , 12 rebounds and one assist . The Celtics continue their trek through the Northeast with a trip to the Philadelphia 76ers on Wednesday night , while the Spurs visit the Brooklyn Nets on Friday evening as well .

They used their superior shooting in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 55 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 53 percent from the floor and a meager 40 percent from beyond the arc . The Bucks also forced the Bucks into 18 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own . The Pelicans were led by the duo of Anthony Davis and Khris Middleton . Davis went 8 - for - 17 from the field , including 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 22 points , while also adding seven rebounds and five assists . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with Memphis recording two more assists than Portland , while committing five less turnovers . The Trail Blazers ( 15 - 22 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Trail Blazers is just what they need to get going . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 22 - 9 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 15 ) 104 - 79 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . After suffering a tough 99 - 92 loss in game number one on Monday , the Cavaliers were able to bounce back with a convincing 10 - point victory in game two . The Cavaliers got off to a really strong start , out - scoring the Magic 29 - 13 right away in the first quarter . The Magic did n't let off the gas either , as they never trailed in this game . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 42 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 38 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 29 points ( 11 - 18 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds , three assists and two steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 4 - for - 10 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while also adding five assists . After taking double - digit shot attempts in all five of his previous playoff games coming into this one , Irving had just nine field goal attempts Wednesday , although he was able to consistently force his way to the free throw line . Irving was able to take a backseat to James , who readily took this game over from the start . So far this postseason , Irving is averaging 24 points and 1 assists over six games . Tristan Thompson added 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 8 FT ) and 12 rebounds as well , while Aaron Gordon finished with 11 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt ) and seven rebounds . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday .

The Rockets were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Warriors went 41 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from deep . He had a poor showing in Friday 's game against the Heat , shooting just 29 percent ( 1 - 15 FG ) , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Montrezl Harrell added 13 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) and 10 rebounds before fouling out . It was a nice surprise for the Warriors , as he 's averaging only 6 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a triple - double , Klay Thompson finished with 15 points ( 4 - 20 FG , 3 - 13 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , six rebounds and three assists . The Rockets ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Warriors will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Wednesday .

The Pacers got out to an extremely quick start in this one , out - scoring the Sixers 27 - 24 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Pacers used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 41 percent from the field and 17 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers went 35 percent from the floor and just 21 percent from deep . He went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 17 points . The 17 assists were a season - high for him , while it was also his third double - double in his last four games . The only other Sixer to reach double figures in points was Rodney Robinson , who came off the bench for 10 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) and three rebounds in 24 minutes . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 25 - 20 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 22 - 22 ) 108 - 98 on Wednesday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 20 - 26 in the first quarter alone . The Thunder did n't let off the gas either , as they never trailed in this game . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 44 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 39 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavaliers were also able to force the Thunder into 8 - 17 , while committing just 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Cavaliers were led by Kevin Durant , who went 12 - for - 23 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 32 points , while also adding six rebounds . He was able to get to the free throw line nine times and converted on seven of those attempts . He 's now averaging 32 points and 12 rebounds on the year . Kyrie Irving also had a solid all - around game . He went 9 - for - 21 from the field and 3 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also handing out six assists . He was able to get to the free throw line a wopping 9 times , and converted on 7 - of - 7 free throw attempts . Serge Ibaka was the only other Thunder player to reach double figures in points , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt ) . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Thunder will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .

In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Pelicans led for the final 56 minutes , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 14 minutes . Shooting was key , with the Pelicans shooting 44 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . The Hornets could only muster up 41 percent shooting from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with New Orleans winning that battle , 53 - 52 . The Pelicans ( 4 - 10 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Hornets is just what the doctor ordered . The Washington Wizards ( 16 - 6 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 16 - 6 ) 104 - 96 on Tuesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Wizards were able to out - score the Clippers 23 - 21 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an edge to get the victory on the road in Los Angeles . The Wizards were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 56 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 43 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Wizards were also able to force the Clippers into 18 turnovers , while committing only 14 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . Bradley Beal led the way , going 9 - for - 17 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 29 points , while also adding three assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to be , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 23 points and 14 rebounds on the year . Chris Paul was able to record a double - double of his own . He went 4 - for - 10 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from beyond the arc to score 10 points , while also dishing out 11 assists . It was his fifth double - double of the season . Coming off the bench , Jamal Crawford shot 2 - for - 13 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 12 points . It was his best offensive showing since back in early December , so he 'll hope to keep that momentum going . The only other Clipper to reach double figures in points was JJ Reddick , who finished with 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , four rebounds and two assists in 31 minutes . The Wizards ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Clippers will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 114 - 80 , at FedEx Forum on Thursday . The Grizzlies ( 21 - 14 ) have a well - earned defensive reputation , but their thorough domination of the Thunder ( 20 - 13 ) was significantly helped by the ejection of Russell Westbrook for back - to - back technical fouls after 23 minutes for arguing a referee 's call . However , Memphis did earn the victory through their own strong offensive play as well , as they tallied superb 52 and 59 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively . Meanwhile , without their MVP , the Thunder 's offense was largely neutered , as only two reserves , Enes Kanter and Alex Abrines , managed to get into double digits in the scoring column . Westbrook led OKC in scoring despite the early exit , supplying 21 points to go along with five rebounds and two steals , although he notably did not record any assists . Kanter totaled 19 points and five rebounds , while Abrines managed 10 points and three boards . Steven Adams mustered only six points but did haul in 15 rebounds and added two assists and two blocks . However , Andre Roberson , Domantas Sabonis and Anthony Morrow could only register two points apiece . The Grizzlies were paced by Marc Gasol , who compiled 25 points , eight rebounds , two assists , a steal and five blocks . The next two highest point totals came from the bench , as Troy Daniels posted 22 points , along with three rebounds and two assists , and Zach Randolph went for 21 points , eight boards and two assists . JaMychal Green produced 17 points , four rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block , and Andrew Harrison , drawing another start for Mike Conley , tallied 10 points . Chandler Parsons returned after taking off the last game for rest purposes and produced two points , three assists and two steals over 15 minutes . The Thunder return home to face the Los Angeles Clippers on New Year 's Eve , while the Grizzlies are at Sacramento on Saturday afternoon as well .

The Orlando Magic ( 26 - 45 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 26 - 44 ) 112 - 109 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 27 percent compared to the Sixers , who went 27 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 16 turnovers , while committing just 18 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Nikola Vucevic had his way with the Sixers ' bigs . He went 11 - of - 19 from the field to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding 14 rebounds in 37 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 16 points and 15 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 23 points and 13 rebounds on the year . Evan Fournier was able to record a double - double of his own with 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and 10 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 43 points and 30 rebounds over his last two games . Terrence Ross was dialed in with his shot as well . He went 6 - for - 15 from the field and 2 - for - 9 from beyond the arc to score 15 points . The Portland Trail Blazers ( 2 - 2 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 2 - 1 ) 106 - 101 on Friday . Portland was able to secure a win for the 16th time in the last 23 games on the strength of a typically stellar effort from offensive linchpin Damian Lillard , along with strong performances from two of their best bench players . After a dead - even first period , Portland forged ahead in the second quarter to build a 16 - point lead by halftime . Both teams played relatively mistake - free basketball , with only 16 turnovers between them , but the Timberwolves managed to stay a step ahead of the Timberwolves on the night to secure the relatively comfortable victory . Lillard 's 34 points paced Minnesota , and he added two rebounds , seven assists , two steals and a block . Aminu was next in line with 16 points , nine rebounds and an assist . Gorgui Dieng contributed a 12 - point 12 - rebound double - double , and added an assist and a block . Ricky Rubio rounded things out for the starting five with 12 points , nine assists , nine rebounds and three steals . C.J . McCollum paced the reserves with 18 points , six rebounds , four assists , a steal and a block . The Timberwolves remain in last place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They 're home against the Rockets on Monday . Minnesota was spearheaded by Lillard 's 34 - point , seven - assist , two - rebound effort that also included a pair of steals and a block . Ricky Rubio rounded out the starting five 's productive night with 12 points , nine assists and nine rebounds . Zach LaVine paced the Minnesota bench with 10 points . The Timberwolves fell to 2 - 1 and currently reside in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division . They remain home for a Sunday showdown with the Golden State Warriors .

The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Charlotte Hornets in overtime , 125 - 120 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday . The Timberwolves ( 6 - 14 ) may have looked like somewhat easy prey to the hometown Hornets , considering they came in with a 5 - 14 record despite their solid talent . The first quarter did nothing to dissuade those beliefs , as Charlotte ( 11 - 9 ) jumped out to a 29 - 19 lead after the first 12 minutes . However , Minnesota clawed back to trail by only three , 52 - 49 by intermission . The second half was a continuous see - saw battle that appeared like it might go the Hornets ' way in the closing seconds , until an Andrew Wiggins 31 - foot three - point jumper with eight seconds remaining knotted the score at 106 . He then sunk a pair of clutch free throws with 11 seconds remaining in overtime to give Minnesota some crucial breathing room at 123 - 118 . That five - point margin was the final separation between the two teams , as the Timberwolves secured only their third road win of the season . Wiggins totaled 29 points overall while leading the visitors , and he added four assists , a rebound and three steals . Karl-Anthony Towns was right behind him with 27 points , 15 rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Zach LaVine supplied 17 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block . Ricky Rubio managed a modest nine points but did dish out 12 assists . Nemanja Bjelica and Shabazz Muhammad led the bench with a pair of 12 - point efforts , and also totaled eight rebounds between them . The Timberwolves were paced by Kemba Walker , who posted 22 points , eight assists and four rebounds . Frank Kaminsky III got another start at power forward in place of Marvin Williams and tallied 21 points , nine rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . Zach LaVine followed with 17 points , three rebounds , three assists , two steals and a block . Ricky Rubio rounded things out for the starting five with nine points , 12 assists , seven rebounds , a steal and a block . Shabazz Muhammad paced the reserves with 12 points , six boards and an assist . Charlotte remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and is slotted in the sixth seed as well . They head to New Orleans to face the Pelicans on Friday night .

It did n't take long for the Suns to grab ahold of this game , as they managed to open the game on a 27 - 8 run and never looked back . After winning the opening quarter by 17 points , Phoenix continued to pile it on and effectively ended the game by halftime . D'Angelo Russell added 21 points of his own , but he shot a subpar 7 - of - 20 from the field Wednesday . The host Los Angeles Clippers demolished the Brooklyn Nets , 127 - 95 , at Staples Center on Monday night . The Clippers ( 10 - 1 ) became the first team to reach 10 wins on the season with Monday 's victory , and have made quick work of most teams on their run . One of the key factors to their success has been its league - best defense , which was on full display against Brooklyn . The Clippers held their opponents to 44 percent shooting and forced 21 turnovers on the night . Big man Mo Speights provided an extra defensive boost for LA , recording two steals and three blocks off the bench . Defense was n't the only story , however , as the Clippers were able to score a ridiculous 127 points on 53 percent shooting . Point guard Chris Paul led the offense with 21 points and nine assists , while All-Star power forward Blake Griffin trailed not far behind with 20 points and six assists . Los Angeles was able to score seemingly at will from beyond the three - point line , as the team shot 56 percent from three - point range . Brooklyn ( 4 - 6 ) , meanwhile , was bitten with the injury bug prior to the contest . Point guard Jeremy Lin ( hamstring ) as well as backup Isaiah Whitehead ( concussion ) were sidelined , while star center Brook Lopez was given the game off to rest . The absence of key players did the Nets no favors , as the team struggled mightily on both ends of the floor . Former No . 1 overall pick turned D-League call - up , Anthony Bennett was forced to play 26 minutes , shooting just 2 - of - 8 during that stretch .

However , they 've found a way to turn things around away from the confines of Amway Center , as they 've now managed to rattle off victories in four of their last five games , including three straight . The Memphis Grizzlies ( 20 - 18 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 13 - 24 ) 91 - 84 on Tuesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Grizzlies got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 29 - 30 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 37 percent from the field , while the Nuggets went just 37 percent . The Grizzlies also out - rebounded the Nuggets 43 - 59 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Grizzlies were led by Zach Randolph , who went 9 - for - 19 from the field and 6 - for - 8 from the free throw line to score 24 points , while also grabbing six rebounds . It was a season - high in points for Randolph , who also had his second double - double in as many games . Jeff Green was the only other Grizzlies ' player to reach double figures in points . He finished with 16 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 8 FT ) , nine rebounds and two assists in 35 minutes . He 's had a nice impact on the defensive side of the ball lately as well , recording two or more steals in five out of his last five games . Jeff Green shot the ball well . He went 4 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 16 points , while also adding nine rebounds and two blocked shots . The Nuggets ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavliers on Tuesday , while the Nuggets will be at home against the Miami Heat on Tuesday as well .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 11 - 28 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 20 - 21 ) 110 - 104 on Tuesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Nets were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 53 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 45 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Nets were able to force the Knicks into 13 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this game . The Nets were led by Derrick Williams , who went 11 - for - 17 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 31 points , while also adding seven rebounds and a pair of assists . He 's now averaging 18 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Arron Afflalo had an impressive showing . He went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding two assists . He 's now averaging 12 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming one rebound short of a double - double , Kristaps Porzingis finished with 12 points ( 5 - 17 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt ) , 10 rebounds and two steals in 37 minutes . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Knicks will travel to Philadelphia to play the Sixers on Friday .
The Boston Celtics ( 33 - 18 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 31 - 20 ) 107 - 102 on Friday . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially LA , as they shot 42 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Celtics really turned it on , as they outscored the Clippers 26 to 35 . The Celtics actually dominated the rebounding , as they won that battle 46 - 46 . These teams are going in opposite directions right now and this result is indicative of the two teams recent play . Boston has the second - best defense in the NBA and they did a heck of a job today if slowing down a potent Clippers attack . Al Jordan was a beast once again down low , as he added to his league - leading block total with another six swats in this game . Blake Griffin was the star of the game though , as he scored 23 points and snatched down eight rebounds . Most people wondered how a veteran team like this would perform this season , but they are simply slowing games down and winning with stingy defense . That 's a recipe for a deep playoff run and the Clippers have the top - two scorers in the NBA this season . Isaiah Thomas had a great game , as he tallied 28 points , eight assists and two steals in the win . Raymond Felton also played well off the bench , collecting 16 points , five rebounds and four assists . On deck for the Celtics is a matchup against the Oklahpma City Thunder on Tuesday .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 27 - 33 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 38 - 24 ) 103 - 94 on Sunday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Toronto . The Hornets came out firing in this game early , out - scoring the Raptors 58 - 0 in the first half . They were able to out - score the Raptors 24 - 29 in the first quarter , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a victory on the road . The Hornets were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 25 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went 41 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , DeMar DeRozan backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 30 points ( 14 - 26 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds , three assists and one steal in 39 minutes . He 's had a nice couple of games in a row , combining for 54 points and 11 assists over his last two outings . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Gerald Henderson . He had 13 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) and six rebounds in 33 minutes . The Hornets ' next game will be at home against the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday , while the Raptors will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday .

Right from the tip - off , the Warriors were clearly the better offensive team in this one . They capped off the first half with a 48 - 39 point lead , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a victory on the road . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 45 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Stephen Curry backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 26 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , to go along with five assists and two steals . He 's been on a roll over his last two games , shooting a combined 15 - for - 26 from the field and 5 - for - 5 from deep to score 20 points . Rudy Gobert chipped in with a double - double of his own , as he finished with 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 5 - 8 FT ) and 11 rebounds . It was his third double - double in a row , as he 's averaging 8 points and 21 rebounds over that span of games . Coming off the bench , Alec Burks scored 19 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and recorded two rebounds . The Jazz ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 32 - 33 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 42 - 21 ) 106 - 101 on Sunday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . After suffering a tough 99 - 92 loss in game number one on Monday , the Cavaliers were able to bounce back with a convincing 15 - point victory in game two . The Cavaliers got off to a really strong start , out - scoring the Cavaliers 22 - 29 right away in the first quarter . The Cavaliers did n't let off the gas either , as they never trailed in this game . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 46 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 46 percent from the floor and just 28 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 29 points ( 12 - 22 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 8 FT ) , to go along with 10 assists , a 14 rebound and two blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 39 points . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope added 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 7 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and two assists , while Frye added 15 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 0 - 7 3Pt ) and handed out a pair of assists . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Cavaliers will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
Many have tossed around the term `` unicorn '' to describe Los Angeles forward Giannis Antetokounmpo , and on Wednesday , he made it obvious why . The 20 - year - old athletic marvel scored a team - high 41 points to go along with 14 rebounds , six assists , two steals , a block , and most impressively , zero turnovers . Antetokounmpo shot an efficient 11 - of - 20 from the field and went to the free - throw line ten times . Moreover , he was the cornerstone of an excellent offensive night for the Lakers as a whole . The surging team shot over 54 percent from the field and a stellar 11 - of - 34 from three - point range . Los Angeles also recorded 25 assists on the night , relying heavily on transition offense and ISO ball to lead to scoring . On the defensive end , the team was able to limit scoring on the interior fairly effectively . This was largely due to strong play from All-Star center Julius Randle , who led the team with 41 points on 11 - of - 20 shooting and added eight rebounds . Shooting guard Malcolm Williams , meanwhile , scored 21 points off the bench . As a team , the Bucks shot a highly impressive 52 percent from the floor and knocked down 11 threes . For Milwaukee , meanwhile , forward Julius Randle had a career - high 41 points . Antetokounmpo shot 11 - of - 20 and added eight rebounds . Big man Julius Randle , meanwhile , had 15 points to go with seven rebounds and two assists .

The Utah Jazz defeated the New York Knicks , 114 - 109 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . The Jazz ( 4 - 3 ) braced themselves for an offensive void when they lost Gordon Hayward to a finger injury in preseason , as he was slated to miss a minimum of six weeks . However , the standout forward beat the recovery timetable by at least two weeks , starting at the three on Sunday for Utah . He looked as if he had n't missed a beat , rattling off a team - high 28 points , along with five rebounds . While he only found the net on six of his 17 field - goal attempts , he impressively drained all 14 of his shots from the free - throw line . His effort spearheaded a highly productive day for the Jazz offense that saw all five members of the first unit hit double - digit scoring and Utah produce a collective 51 percent success rate from the field . George Hill , who 's helped pick up a good bit of the offensive slack in Hayward 's absence , continued to thrive despite the latter 's return to the court , totaling 23 points , six rebounds , four assists and a steal . Rodney Hood was right behind with 18 points , six rebounds , five assists and a steal . Rudy Gobert and Derrick Favors turned in a pair of 13 - point efforts from the frontcourt , with the former also contributing eight rebounds , an assist , three blocks and a steal , and the latter supplying six boards . Joe Johnson , who headed to the bench with Hayward 's return , tallied 10 points to pace the bench . The Knicks ( 2 - 4 ) were co - led by a pair of 28 - point outputs for Carmelo Anthony and Kristaps Porzingis . Anthony also registered nine rebounds and three assists , while Porzingis supplied eight boards , an assist and two blocks . Derrick Rose continued his strong stretch of play to open his tenure in the Big Apple , totaling 18 points , eight assists , four rebounds and a steal . Courtney Lee was the fourth member of the starting five to hit double digits in the scoring column , posting 10 points , six boards and three steals . The Knicks head back home to face off with the Denver Nuggets on Monday night , while the Knicks remain home to face the Denver Nuggets on Monday evening as well .
The Golden State Warriors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 127 - 107 , at Oracle Arena on Thursday . The Warriors were heavy favorites headed into this matchup and they left no doubt who the better team was . It was n't lopsided throughout though , as there were 11 ties and 21 lead changes in the first half . That 's when Golden State turned it on though , outscoring Detroit , 67 - 49 , in the second half . The Warriors offense was on point , shooting 56 percent from the field , 51 percent from three - point range and recording 39 assists . Three-point shooting really killed Detroit , as they went just 6 - of - 28 from long distance . The Pistons ( 18 - 23 ) have struggled on the road all season and a matchup against Golden State is the last thing they wanted to see . Marcus Morris was Detroit 's best player , as he tallied 21 points , five rebounds and three assists . Andre Drummond recorded another double - double , totaling 12 points and 10 rebounds . Tobias Harris got the start and amassed 18 points and four rebounds . Boban Marjanovic was the only bench player in double figures , amassing 13 points and 11 rebounds on 5 - of - 7 from the field . The Warriors ( 34 - 6 ) have been taking it to teams all season and this blowout win was no different . Kevin Durant led the team in scoring , accruing 25 points , six rebounds and nine assists on 10 - of - 15 shooting . Steph Curry was just as good , collecting 24 points , six assists and five steals . Klay Thompson dropped 23 points of his own . Draymond Green failed to hit a shot , but he provided nine rebounds and 13 assists . Ian Clark and Shaun Livingston each scored in double figures off the bench .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 108 - 107 , at Barclays Center on Monday . The Sixers ( 7 - 20 ) have been mocked for some time for the `` Trust the Process '' slogan that has become associated with their seemingly never - ending string of losing seasons . However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Joel Embiid , is starting to make some noise around the league . The latest team to get an up - close look at their improving squad was the Nets ( 7 - 19 ) , which suffered their eighth road loss of the season while seeing Embiid tally 33 points , nine rebounds , an assist , three steals and three blocks . It was the first time since Feb. 35 that he failed to record a double - double , and it was the first time since Jan. 22 where he failed to record at least six rebounds . For Brooklyn , Brook Lopez led the way with a near double - double consisting of 33 points , 10 rebounds , eight assists , a steal and four blocks . Robert Covington and Bojan Lin followed with a pair of 15 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block , and the latter posting four assists , two rebounds and a steal . Sergio Rodriguez went for 11 points , five assists , two rebounds and a steal on 3 - of - 11 shooting to help make up for some of the shortfall from the bench . Joe Harris paced the reserves with 19 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Ersan Ilyasova was right behind him with 19 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Jeremy Lin filled out the stat sheet with 16 points , four assists , two rebounds and two steals . Jahlil Okafor registered a 3 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one steal . Gerald Henderson paced the second unit with 10 points and two boards . Joel Embiid paced the Sixers with a 22 - point , 9 - rebound double - double that also included eight assists , four blocks and a steal . Jeremy Lin filled out the stat sheet with 16 points , four assists , two rebounds and a pair of blocks . Jahlil Okafor was productive as a reserve as well with three points , four rebounds , two assists and one block . The two teams now head back to the Nation 's Capital for the second game of the home - and - home series , which unfolds on Friday night .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 121 - 118 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . These are two of the hottest teams in the Western Conference right now and New Orleans showed that their season is still alive with this crucial win . It was a tale of two halves , as Dallas took a six - point lead into the locker room , while New Orleans responded by winning the second half , 61 - 37 . Rebounding was key for the Pelicans , as they won that battle , 44 - 23 . The big men of New Orleans dominated in the paint , outscoring the Pelicans , 46 - 26 . The Pelicans ( 32 - 43 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the league and they fell just shy in this close loss . Anthony Davis carried the load , as he tallied 30 points and 13 rebounds on 11 - of - 21 shooting . Harrison Barnes also had one of his best games of the season , totaling 19 points and eight rebounds . Jrue Holiday was the only other Pelican in double figures , as he collected 18 points , five rebounds and seven assists . The only other starter in double figures was Wesley Matthews , who dropped 10 points to accompany three rebounds and to assists . The Pelicans will host the Boston Celtics on Sunday for their next game . The Pelicans ( 32 - 43 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 15 tries . DeMarcus Cousins led the way for New Orleans , as he accumulated 29 points , 16 rebounds and four blocks in the win . Jrue Holiday was second on the team , finishing with 18 points , five rebounds and seven assists . DeMarcus Cousins accumulated 29 points , 16 rebounds and six assists .
The San Antonio Mavericks defeated the San Antonio Spurs , 105 - 101 , at AT & T Center on Tuesday . These are two teams at the top of the standings , but the Spurs really took it to the Spurs in this beatdown . It was a near wire - to - wire win for San Antonio , as San Antonio held just one lead in the first three minutes , with the Spurs leading the rest of the way . Each quarter was decisive , as they won the first quarter by 11 , the second quarter by eight and the third quarter by 11 . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the biggest difference , with San Antonio dishing out 20 assists to just 11 turnovers , while San Antonio committed 7 turnovers to just 26 assists . Three-point shooting was a big factor as well , with the Spurs going 20 - of - 28 , while the Spurs hit just 7 - of - 22 from long range . Seth Curry led the way for San Antonio , as he tallied 24 points , five rebounds and five assists . Harrison Barnes totaled 19 points , three rebounds and two blocks . Harrison Barnes was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 19 points , three rebounds and two assists . Kawhi Leonard led the Spurs in scoring , as he accumulated 24 points and seven rebounds . Wesley Matthews finished second on the team with 17 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Manu Ginobili came off the bench to provide 10 points , five rebounds and three assists .

In fact , the Suns led for nearly every minute of this game , with the Raptors having their only lead in the first quarter . Both offenses were extremely efficient , as they each shot over 53 percent from the field . Phoenix dominated in the interior , as they won the rebounding battle , 41 - 43 , and outscored Toronto , 62 - 46 in the paint . Phoenix ( 20 - 16 ) has been struggling recently , but a 125 - point outing on the road is just what the doctor ordered . The Utah Jazz ( 25 - 24 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 37 ) 110 - 109 on Friday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . While both teams have already been eliminated from playoff contention , it was still another hard fought game Sunday . Both teams shot very similar percentages , with the Kings going 52 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 52 percent from the floor and a meager 47 percent from beyond the arc . The Jazz were also able to force the Kings into 12 turnovers , while committing only 13 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Rodney Hood led the way , going 10 - for - 17 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 28 points , while also adding four rebounds and two steals . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 33 points and 11 rebounds .
