It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other King to reach double figures in points was Arron Afflalo , who finished with 17 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) in 40 minutes . The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .

The Hornets were led by Al Jefferson , who shot 9 - for - 19 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also grabbing 12 rebounds . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Wizard to reach double - digit points was Kris Humphries , who came off the bench for 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and five rebounds . Gary Neal had the most production off the bench for the Wizards . He went 6 - for - 13 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding five assists . He shot a combined 6 - for - 14 from the field over his last two games , so it was good to see him get dialed in on Monday . The Hornets also got some solid contributions from their bench , with both Gerald Henderson and Kris Humphries reaching double figures in points . Henderson recorded 17 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and five assists , while Henderson had 17 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and two assists . Despite suffering the loss , the Wizards had six players reach double figures in points . Al Jefferson led the way , going 9 - for - 19 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to finish with 18 points . He was able to get to the free throw line seven times and converted on all six attempts . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise as he 's averaging only 13 points per game so far this season . Brian Roberts had a nice game off the bench , scoring 13 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) in 24 minutes . The Hornets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Wizards will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 23 - 59 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 53 - 29 ) 114 - 105 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Going into halftime tied at 45 , it looked as if this was going to be a grind - it - out , close finish . Instead , the Suns were able to out - score the Clippers 29 - 30 in the fourth quarter , giving them enough of an edge to get the victory on the road in LA . The Suns were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 45 percent from the floor and 29 percent from deep . The Clippers had all five starters reach double figures in points . Wesley Johnson led the way , going 7 - for - 16 from the field and 5 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 19 points , to go along with two rebounds and two steals . He struggled to just 10 points on Sunday , so it was a nice bounce back game for him . Notching a double - double , Cole Aldrich posted a double - double , posting 14 points ( 5 - 5 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and 10 rebounds . He 's now averaging 23 points and 8 rebounds on the year . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the host New Orleans Pelicans , 129 - 99 , at Smoothie King Center on Friday . This was a game full of swings , as the Rockets made a huge comeback , despite playing with a depleted roster . After trailing by 16 points in the first quarter , Houston outscored New Orleans by 24 points over the final three quarters to pull out a comeback win . Defense was key for the Rockets , as they held the Pelicans to 42 percent from the field , 81 percent from the free - throw line and 19 percent from three - point range . New Orleans also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than New Orleans , while committing three less turnovers . The Pelicans ( 23 - 35 ) had a tough task in altitude here , but they made it look easy in a blowout win . DeMarcus Cousins did all he could for New Orleans , as he led the team with 27 points and nine rebounds . Ryan Anderson was second on the team , providing 17 points and four rebounds off the bench . Clint Capela recorded a double - double , totaling 15 points and eight rebounds . James Harden was the player of the game , as he accumulated 13 points , four rebounds and 14 assists . Eric Gordon was a huge spark off the bench , providing 19 points , one rebound and two steals on 9 - of - 16 shooting . Patrick Beverley accumulated two points , 12 rebounds , five assists and four steals as the Rockets bench .

This was a sloppier game than expected , as the two team 's combined to shoot under 41 percent from the field . The second quarter was when the tide turned , as the Trail Blazers outscored the Bucks 17 - 17 in that 12 - minute stretch . Portland is now 5 - 2 at home and Milwaukee is now 7 - 2 on the road and these are two teams going in opposite directions right now . The Bucks have been playing poorly lately and that continued on Sunday . The team shot just 79 percent from the free - throw line and the bench amassed just 14 total points . Milwaukee has now lost eight of their last 12 and they are starting to look like a bad team . The good news is that the defense has been the problem all year and that really wasnt the issue today . The Bucks will look to bounce - back against the Denver Nuggets on Monday . The Bucks are one of the hottest teams in the NBA and they showed why on Thursday . They didnt play well , but knuckled down defensively to pick up an impressive win . The Heat were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went 47 percent from the floor and just 40 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were also able to force the Bucks into 12 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .

It 's rare to see Memphis dominated in their home building , but that was just the case here in this near wire - to - wire win for LA . Shooting was the difference in the game , with the Clippers shooting 51 percent , while they held the Grizzlies to just 43 percent . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the two teams matching in turnovers , while LA won the assist battle , 30 - 30 . Defensive rebounding was decisive for the Clippers , as they won that battle , 45 - 43 . The Clippers ( 24 - 16 ) had a tough task here against a hot Clippers team , as they simply did n't have enough in the arsenal to win this game . The Clippers found out earlier in the day that superstar forward Blake Griffin will be sidelined for much longer than originally anticipated , but his problematic quadriceps tendon is n't the cause . Instead , it 's a broken right hand allegedly suffered during an altercation with a team employee in Toronto that will apparently keep him out 1 - 12 additional weeks . His continued absence keeps the spotlight squarely on Chris Paul , who has more often than not already served as the team 's scoring leader during the time Griffin has already missed . The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Miami Heat , 91 - 82 , at Spectrum Center on Thursday . The refrain is a familiar one for the Hornets ( 19 - 14 ) , but does n't seem to get old : The dynamic duo of Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum supply a significant portion of the offense , and the complementary pieces around them step up in support as needed . That formula equaled another home victory for Charlotte on Thursday , their 11th of the season in 17 home games . Walker scored a game - high 22 points , while Batum provided 16 . The hosts also played superior team defense , holding the Heat ( 10 - 23 ) to 40 percent shooting overall and inducing 16 turnovers . Miami was paced by Josh Richardson , who followed up a 22 - point outing against the Thunder on Tuesday with another 20 points on Thursday , along with four rebounds , two assists , a block and a steal . Tyler Johnson came off the bench to supply 18 points , seven rebounds , five assists , two steals and a block . Wayne Ellington provided 12 points , two boards and an assist in a reserve role as well . The returning Goran Dragic could only muster five points on 2 - of - 11 shooting , although he did add eight assists , three rebounds and a steal . Hassan Whiteside went for eight points , 10 rebounds and two blocks , notably taking only seven shots on the night . Walker complemented his aforementioned scoring total with seven rebounds , four assists and a steal . Batum filled out the stat sheet with 13 rebounds , eight assists , three steals and a block . Marvin Williams registered 13 points , two assists , a rebound and a steal . Cody Zeller offered nine points , seven rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block , while Jeremy Lamb led the second unit with 10 points , nine rebounds and a block . The Heat next head to Boston for a Friday night battle with the Celtics , while the Hornets host the Cleveland Cavaliers for a New Year 's Eve showdown on Friday night .

The Utah Jazz ( 24 - 16 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 28 - 9 ) 100 - 92 on Tuesday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . After suffering a tough 99 - 92 loss in game number one on Monday , the Jazz were able to bounce back with a convincing 12 - point victory in game two . The Jazz got off to a really strong start , out - scoring the Cavaliers 29 - 29 right away in the first quarter . The Cavaliers did n't let off the gas either , as they never trailed in this game . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 48 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 37 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 29 points ( 10 - 20 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , to go along with five assists , four rebounds and four steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Jazz should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 5 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also adding four assists . After taking double - digit shot attempts in all five of his previous playoff games coming into this one , Irving had just nine field goal attempts Wednesday , although he was able to consistently force his way to the free throw line . Irving was able to take a backseat to James , who readily took this game over from the start . So far this postseason , Irving is averaging 24 points and 2 assists over six games . Rodney Hood added 18 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 4 - 10 3Pt ) , five rebounds and three assists as well . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Cavaliers will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 116 - 96 , at United Center on Wednesday . The dynamic duo of Giannis Antetokounmpo and Jabari Parker were at it again for the Bucks ( 16 - 16 ) , as they posted over half of the team 's scoring total while each played at least 40 minutes . Their combined 23 - of - 34 effort from the field spearheaded a red - hot Milwaukee offense that drained their buckets at a 57 percent clip , and that also was successful on 60 percent of their 15 attempts from behind the arc . Meanwhile , the Bulls ( 16 - 18 ) could only get one such standout effort , which came from Jimmy Butler . The offensive imbalance ultimately left them unable to keep pace as the game wore on , and accordingly , the Bucks outscored their hosts by a 67 - 45 margin in the second half . Antetokounmpo tallied a game - high 35 points , and added nine rebounds , eight assists , seven blocks and two steals in a remarkable performance . Parker followed with 27 points , five rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Malcolm Brogdon continued his rapid development , as he managed 15 points , 12 assists and 11 rebounds , his first career triple - double . Greg Monroe led the bench with 15 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and a pair of steals . Butler 's 26 points paved the way for Chicago , and he complemented them with eight assists , seven boards and two steals . Robin Lopez provided a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Taj Gibson contributed 11 points , five rebounds , an assist and a block . Michael Carter-Williams , who drew the start for the struggling Rajon Rondo , and Dwyane Wade both struggled , as they only turned in eight apiece .

They were able to use a strong second half , where they out - scored the Thunder 31 - 29 , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a victory on the road . They also shot well from the floor , going 48 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 46 percent from the floor and just 31 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Russell Westbrook backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 27 points ( 12 - 27 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds and seven assists . He struggled to just three points on Sunday , so it was good to see him get back on track . Also , coming off the bench , Thaddeus Young had a strong showing , finishing with 14 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt ) , 14 rebounds and three blocked shots . It was far - and - away his best game of the year so far , as it marked a new season - high in points , along with being his first double - double of the year . He 's averaging just 1 points and seven rebounds on the season . Also playing a big factor in the win was Bojan Bogdanovic . Bogdanovic went 7 - for - 12 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 18 points . The Nets ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Thursday , while the Thunder will travel to Philadelphia to play the 76ers on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 11 - 5 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 2 - 14 ) 107 - 103 on Sunday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Lakers were down 81 - 78 following the third quarter , but were able to make a run in the final quarter , out - scoring the Lakers 27 - 38 to take the 10 - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Pacers were the superior shooters in this one , going 41 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 38 percent from the floor and just 33 percent from beyond the arc . The Lakers were also able to force the Lakers into 10 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Paul George led the way , going 10 - for - 22 from the field to score 39 points , while also adding four rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 46 points and 14 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 22 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Monta Ellis had a relatively quiet night . He went 5 - for - 7 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 15 points , while also adding six assists . The Lakers ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Lakers will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .

The Miami Heat defeated the Indiana Pacers , 101 - 93 , at American Airlines Arena on Tuesday . The recent form of these teams would indicate a Miami blowout , but that simply was n't the case in this close - fought battle . A 17 - 3 run in the third quarter was the decisive stretch , as that swung a double - digit lead for the Pacers into a 10 - point lead for the Heat . Despite there being just five ties and three lead changes , neither team led by more than 13 points , as it was a single - digit margin for well over 100 minutes . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Miami going 21 - of - 40 from long distance , while Indiana went just 9 - of - 40 . The Heat also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 66 - 45 . Goran Dragic led the way for Miami , as he collected 24 points , five rebounds and five assists . Hassan Whiteside totaled 13 points and 18 rebounds . Dwyane Wade was the only other Pacer in double figures , as he totaled 16 points and three assists . Paul George led Miami in scoring , as he accumulated 31 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and three steals . Indiana will be in action again on Saturday , as they travel to play the Orlando Magic .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 101 - 92 , at Target Center on Monday . The Timberwolves ( 12 - 26 ) put an end to a four - game losing streak with Monday 's victory , and it was thanks in large part to the monster performance put on by Karl-Anthony Towns . After scoring 20 points in the first quarter and outscoring the entire Mavericks ( 11 - 27 ) team by himself , Towns finished with a game - high 34 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and three blocks in 37 minutes . The big man 's night was made even easier with Ricky Rubio shining as a facilitator , notching a double - double of his own with 13 points and 15 assists on top of five rebounds and five steals . The two helped the Timberwolves lead wire - to - wire Thursday , as the team overall shot a very impressive 56 percent from the field . As for the Mavericks , the loss leaves them alone at the very bottom of the Western Conference , but the defeat did n't come without a pair of great performances from their stars in the frontcourt . Harrison Barnes led the way with a team - high 30 points , while veteran Dirk Nowtizki posted 26 points , five rebounds and four assists in 31 minutes . Unfortunately for Dallas , they failed to get any other significant contributions elsewhere , with the other 10 Mavericks players who played combining to score just 36 points . And while Dallas managed to shoot an impressive 46 percent from behind the arc , their inability to get to the free throw line ended up hurting them , as they shot just 7 - of - 9 from the charity stripe . Up next , the Timberwolves will stay home Wednesday to play the Rockets , while the Mavericks will head home to take on the Suns on Thursday .

He was able to get to the free throw line nine times and converted on all eight attempts . It was a nice bounce back game for him after struggling with his shot against the Pelicans on Sunday . He 's now averaging 23 points and 11 assists on the season . The Celtics were mostly a different team in the second half , as they outscored their visitors by a 59 - 44 margin over the final 24 minutes . McConnell was outstanding setting up his teammates for scoring opportunities , compiling 15 assists and supplementing them with nine points , four boards and a pair of steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Isaiah Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 6 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding 10 assists . He 's now averaging 14 points and 3 rebounds on the year . The other two starters to reach double figures in points was Evan Turner , who recorded 12 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) and seven rebounds in 34 minutes . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 20 - 15 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 14 - 21 ) 117 - 116 on Monday at the American Airlines Center in Sacramento . The Mavericks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 57 - 49 in the first half . Along with the quick start , the Mavericks also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 46 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 48 percent from the floor and just 38 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , DeMarcus Cousins backed his words up , as he finished with a game - high of 35 points ( 15 - 30 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds , four assists and one steal . Cousins did n't have the best night shooting on Sunday , as he went 15 - for - 20 from the field and 3 - for - 3 from the three - point line over his previous two games , so it was good to see him get dialed back in and have a strong showing . Deron Williams also did everything he could to keep the Kings close . He went 10 - for - 18 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 25 points , as he went 10 - for - 6 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from beyond the arc . He 's been the most reliable player off the bench for the Mavericks this season , so it was good to see him get things pointed back in the right direction . Getting the start at shooting guard , Dirk Nowitzki finished with 23 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and five rebounds . It was his second game in a row with 23 points , after not reaching it once previously in the season . Coming off the bench , Marco Belinelli added 14 points ( 5 - 17 FG , 4 - 13 3Pt ) , nine rebounds and three steals in 43 minutes . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while the Kings will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Wednesday .
The Dallas Hawks defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 105 - 102 , at American Airlines Center on Tuesday . These are two teams on the outside looking in for the playoffs and the Mavericks were able to escape with a huge win to get them closer to that eight - seed . Despite Dallas leading by eight points after the first quarter , Dallas took care of business from there by winning the other three quarters by at least four points . In fact , the Mavericks outscored the Mavericks , 49 - 37 , in the second half . Defense was key , as they held Dallas to 43 percent shooting and forced them to commit 15 turnovers . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the two teams matching in turnovers , while Dallas won the assist battle , 8 - 23 . The Mavericks ( 20 - 9 ) have been playing their best ball of the season recently and this win only adds to that success . Dennis Schroder led the team in scoring , as he collected 22 points , three rebounds and six assists . Al Horford finished second on the team with 17 points , seven rebounds and two assists . DeMarre Carroll went 6 - of - 15 from the field to score 15 points , while Charlie Villanueva led the bench with 14 points . Dallas will look to build off this win on Wednesday in a road matchup versus the New Orleans Pelicans . The Mavericks ( 20 - 7 ) have been plying better with their recent lineup change , but that was n't the case here . Rajon Rondo did all he could though , as he led the team with 22 points , three rebounds and six assists . Rajon Rondo flirted with a triple - double , as he accumulated 13 points , four rebounds and 11 assists . Tyson Chandler also had one of his best games of the season , totaling 17 points and seven rebounds .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Indiana Pacers , 110 - 91 , at Philips Arena on Wednesday . Atlanta were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this 16 - point victory . The Hawks took care of business in the second half , outscoring the Pacers , 55 - 50 . The Hawks defense was key , as they held the Pacers to 40 percent from the field and 20 percent from three - point range . The Pacers also dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle , 43 - 42 and the points in the paint differential , 42 - 27 . The Pacers ( 15 - 29 ) have struggled on offense all season and duds like this against a bad Atlanta defense only adds to those troubles . Jeff Teague was the player of the game , as he tallied 17 points , 11 assists and two steals . DeMarre Carroll went just 7 - of - 11 from the field , but finished with 12 points and nine rebounds . C.J . Miles led the Pacers in scoring , as he dropped 18 points , three rebounds and two assists on 7 - of - 15 shooting off the bench . Al Horford finished with 14 points , seven rebounds , five assists and one steal . Paul Millsap went just 4 - of - 7 from the field , but finished with 12 points , nine rebounds and five assists . C.J . Miles led the Hawks in scoring , as he dropped 18 points on 2 - of - 8 from three - point range . Jeff Teague accumulated 17 points , three rebounds and 11 assists as well .

It 's bizarre to see a team well under .500 favored by double - digits over a team well above .500 , but circumstances made that the case in this matchup . Portland is without their top - three scorers and two point guards and have now lost their third - straight game . The defense was the difference in the game , as they held Portland to 36 percent shooting and forced them to commit 14 turnovers . Shooting was key , with the Clippers shooting 46 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range . They shot 45 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings shot 49 percent from the field and only 45 percent from beyond the arc . The Golden State Warriors ( 2 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) 97 - 87 on Thursday at the Staples Center in New Orleans . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Warriors were able to out - score the Pelicans 26 - 16 in the first quarter , therefore securing the six - point victory on the road in New Orleans . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans went 38 percent from the floor and 35 percent from deep . What really made the difference though was turnovers . The Warriors forced the Pelicans into 13 turnovers , while committing just 12 of their own . The Warriors ' frontcourt did most of the damage in this game . Klay Thompson went 11 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also handing out six assists . He was able to get to the free throw line a wopping 8 times , and converted on 8 - of - 1 free throw attempts . The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Cleveland Rockets , 128 - 60 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Houston leading for the majority of the game , the Cavaliers never led by more than four points and held a double - digit lead for the final three quarters . Shooting was key , with the Cavaliers shooting 52 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . The Cavaliers could only muster up 48 percent shooting from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , with the two teams matching in turnovers , while Cleveland won the assist battle , 22 - 22 . Defensive rebounding was dominant for the Cavaliers as well , with Cleveland winning that battle , 42 - 26 . The Cavaliers ( 4 - 0 ) had a tough task here without LeBron Love and Devin Booker , as they did n't have enough ammunition to match with the Cavaliers . Kevin Love recorded another double - double , totaling 24 points and five rebounds on 9 - of - 16 shooting . Eric Gordon went just 6 - of - 13 from the field , but finished with 16 points , three rebounds and three assists .
This was a very tight game , as neither team was able to grab a double - digit lead . It was a costly foul late that decided it , as three free - throws by Ricky Rubio with two seconds left was the difference in the game . Three-point shooting was the only real advantage for Minnesota , as they shot 18 - of - 42 from long distance , while Denver went just 6 - of - 16 from long range . Karl-Anthony Towns led Denver , as he tallied 28 points and 14 rebounds . Andrew Wiggins finished with 18 points , four rebounds and two assists . Kevin Martin led the team , as he totaled 28 points and 14 rebounds . Emmanuel Mudiay collected 15 points , five rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Minnesota will look to play better on Thursday in a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans . The Nuggets ( 2 - 1 ) have gotten off to a historically bad start offensively this season , but they were able to pull out a win here , thanks to some elite defense . Six players scored in double figures for the Nuggets , with Andrew Wiggins leading the team with 18 points . Andrew Wiggins , Andrew Wiggins and Kevin Martin both scored 14 a piece , while Emmanuel Mudiay added 15 points and two assists . Minnesota will look to play better on Wednesday , when they host the New York Knicks for their next game . The Nuggets ( 2 - 0 ) have been one of the biggest disappointments this season and it 's a wonder when they 'll pull out of this hole . Ricky Rubio did return from an elbow injury in this game , as he accumulated 12 points , five rebounds and eight assists in the loss . Karl-Anthony Towns led the team in scoring , totaling 28 points , 14 rebounds and four blocks in the win . Emmanuel Mudiay was the only other starter in double figures , as he collected 15 points , two assists and two steals . Will Barton led the bench with 14 points and four rebounds .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 50 - 21 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 14 - 57 ) 103 - 82 on Wednesday at Madison Square Garden in New York . The Grizzlies got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Knicks 30 - 20 in the first quarter alone . The Grizzlies were the superior shooters in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 58 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 42 percent from the floor and just 22 percent from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies were able to force the Knicks into 17 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this game . The Grizzlies were led by Zach Randolph , who went 9 - for - 12 from the field and 5 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 23 points , while also chipping in seven rebounds . It was one point shy of a season - high for him , as he 's now put together a very strong string of games over the last two weeks . The majority of the rest of the Knicks production came from the bench . Jason Smith had 16 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and four rebounds , while Carter had 14 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and two steals . The Knicks ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday , while the Knicks will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 99 - 88 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . The Sixers ( 5 - 18 ) have been mocked for some time for the `` Trust the Process '' slogan that has become associated with their seemingly never - ending string of losing seasons . However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , on their roster that is able to get it done . However , the Sixers ( 7 - 16 ) were able to pierce Philadelphia 's armor Wednesday , touching up Gregg Popovich 's crew for a season - high 88 points . Philadelphia was led by a pair of 23 - point efforts from Ersan Ilyasova and Langston Galloway , with the former adding eight rebounds , an assist , and a steal and a block . Joel Embiid had a near double - double with 14 points and nine rebounds , while Joel Embiid was next with a 14 - point , 7 - rebound double - double . Sergio Rodriguez went for 16 points , eight assists , two rebounds and one steal in 30 minutes off the bench . Nik Stauskas was productive in a reserve role as well , compiling 14 points , two rebounds and one assist . Ersan Ilyasova paced the Sixers with 23 points , eight rebounds , four assists and one steal . Joel Embiid totaled 14 points , seven boards , two assists , four steals and four blocks . Dario Saric totaled 13 points , five rebounds , one assist and one block . Joel Embiid led the bench with 14 points , seven rebounds , two assists and one block . Dario Saric was actually a secondary contributor on the night but still provided a full stat line of 13 points , five rebounds , one assist , two blocks and one steal . Dario Saric was productive as a reserve as well with 13 points , five rebounds , one assist , one block and one block . The Sixers resume post - All - Star - break play in Philadelphia against the Sixers on Friday night , while the 76ers remain home to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Friday evening .
After a record - setting perfect free - throw night on Tuesday for Utah , the Jazz struggled as a team from the line on Friday against the Lakers . The Jazz shot just 70 percent as a unit from the line , while also converting on only 24 percent of their shots from three - point range . The night was particularly tough for young wing Rodney Hood , who missed nine field goal attempts , five three - point attempts , and went just three - for - five at the free - throw line . Poor shooting seemed to be a theme of the night for both sides , as the Lakers ' young stars struggled mightily on the offensive end . D'Angelo Russell went just 3 - of - 14 from the field , including hitting only 20 percent of his three - point attempts . Jordan Clarkson , meanwhile , shot just 4 - of - 14 for nine points . Bench guard Lou Williams led the team with 17 points off the bench . Los Angeles ( 1 - 1 ) , meanwhile , saw yet another loss come in Friday 's matchup . The team has yet to pick up a win in the 2016 - 14 season , and has seen major shooting struggles thus far . These struggles continued against Utah , as the team shot just 38 percent in the loss . Star small forward George Hill led the team with 23 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , while center Rudy Gobert added 13 points on 4 - of - 9 shooting .
The Sacramento Kings ( 11 - 10 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 5 - 16 ) 101 - 92 on Friday night at Sleep Train Arena in Utah . The Kings got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 57 - 49 in the first half alone . The Kings were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 41 percent from the floor and just 18 percent from deep . The Kings also forced the Jazz into 13 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own . The Kings were led by Rudy Gay , who went 10 - for - 19 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to finish with a game - high of 29 points , while also adding six rebounds and three steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 32 points and 16 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 16 points and 16 rebounds on the year . Gordon Hayward had a strong showing , posting 19 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 10 FT ) , seven assists and four steals . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Nik Stauskas chipped in with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and eight rebounds in 30 minutes as a starter . The Kings ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday , while the Jazz will travel to Denver to play the Nuggets on Wednesday .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the Indiana Pacers , 90 - 85 , at United Center on Monday . The Bulls ( 15 - 16 ) jumped on their visitors early in a battle of division rivals , building a 28 - 19 advantage after one quarter . Save for a 20 - 12 edge by the Pacers ( 15 - 17 ) in the third quarter , Chicago had control of the contest for the most part , despite being outperformed on the offensive end by Indiana . The visitors posted a 42 percent success rate from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , which was notably superior to the Bulls ' respective 39 and 24 percent tallies . However , a pair of strong efforts from Dwyane Wade and Nikola Mirotic helped carry the Bulls to the hosts to their ninth home victory of the season . On a night when Jeff Teague significantly struggled with his shot , it was backup point guard Aaron Brooks who led the Pacers off the bench with 19 points , seven assists , four rebounds and a block . Myles Turner was next with 16 points and eight boards , while Paul George turned in 14 points , eight assists , three rebounds and a steal . Thaddeus Young chipped in with 12 points , six boards and a trio of steals . Teague could only muster six points , along with five assists and two rebounds , on 2 - of - 8 shooting . Al Jefferson posted 10 points , six rebounds and three assists in 20 minutes off the bench . Wade 's 21 points paced the Bulls , a total he complemented with five assists , three rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Mirotic registered 20 points and seven boards in 30 minutes off the bench . Jimmy Butler filled out the stat sheet with 16 points , five assists , two rebounds and two steals . Taj Gibson and Jeremi Grant turned in matching 10 - point efforts , and Robin Lopez mustered eight points but hauled in 12 boards , recorded three steals and added a block . The Pacers continue on their road trip , with their next stop being the Nation 's Capital for a Wednesday night tussle with the Washington Wizards . The Bulls remain home to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday evening as well .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 40 - 8 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 10 - 38 ) 91 - 85 on Sunday at the Wells Fargo Center in Atlanta . Both teams seemed to struggle shooting the ball in this one . The Hawks went just 44 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers went 44 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were able to out - rebound the 76ers 44 - 44 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Hawks were led by Al Horford , who went 10 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also grabbing 11 rebounds . The 23 points matched a season - high for Horford , while the double - double was his third in the last four games . Dennis Schroder had a solid showing off the bench , scoring 15 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and six assists . Despite the loss , the 76ers had six players reach double figures , with all their starters included in that feat . Paul ' production were lead by Horford , who posted 15 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , eight rebounds and two steals in 35 minutes . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the New York Knicks on Friday , while the Sixers will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Orlando Magic ( 35 - 46 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 33 - 48 ) 107 - 98 on Tuesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 20 percent compared to the Sixers , who went 20 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Bucks into 23 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Greg Monroe had his way with the Magic . He went 9 - for - 15 from the field and 5 - for - 0 from the free throw line to score 23 points , while also chipping in seven rebounds . The only other player to reach double figures in points was Evan Fournier , who recorded 13 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven assists in 38 minutes . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Buck reaching double - digits in points was Giannis Antetokounmpo , who recorded 11 points , while shooting 5 - for - 7 from the field and 0 - for - 6 from beyond the arc . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Bucks will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .

Los Angeles have been one of the best home teams in the NBA this season , but this was a tough task against a feisty Denver team . The Nuggets dominated from start to finish , as they led for over 42 minutes of this game and led by at least six points for the entirety of the second half . The second quarter is where they spread it out , outscoring the Lakers , 30 - 22 . Rebounding was the glaring difference in the game , with Denver winning that battle , 42 - 31 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 11 more assists and committing three less turnovers . D.J . Augustin led Los Angeles in scoring , as he dropped 26 points on 3 - of - 3 from three - point range . Emmanuel Russell accumulated 24 points , six rebounds and six assists . Julius Randle was the only other Laker in double figures , collecting 14 points , six rebounds and three assists . On deck for Los Angeles is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday . The Lakers ( 12 - 50 ) came into this game tied for the worst record in the west , so this win is a mixed result . D'Angelo Russell led the way for Los Angeles , as he tallied 24 points , four rebounds and two assists . Julius Randle was the only other Laker in double figures , collecting 14 points , six rebounds and three assists . On deck for Los Angeles is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 9 - 6 ) defeated the LA Clippers ( 6 - 7 ) 91 - 80 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Going into halftime tied at 45 , it looked as if this was going to be a grind - it - out , close finish . Instead , the Raptors were able to out - score the Clippers 20 - 20 in the final quarter to secure the four - point victory on the road . The Raptors were the superior shooters in this one , going 37 percent from the field and 24 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 39 percent from the floor and just 22 percent from beyond the arc . The Raptors were able to force the Clippers into 19 turnovers , while only committing nine of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Raptors were led by DeMarre Carroll , who went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding five rebounds and four steals . He 's been on a roll over his last two games , shooting a combined 16 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 16 from deep to score 33 points . DeAndre Jordan chipped in with six points ( 3 - 5 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt ) , 14 rebounds and five blocks as well , while Jordan Griffin recorded his fifth double - double of the year , finishing with 13 points and 15 rebounds . The Raptors ' next game will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the host Miami Heat , 106 - 94 , at America Airlines Arena on Tuesday . While Miami got out to an early lead , that was the only one they 'd have all game . In fact , the Thunder led for the final 40 - plus minutes , as they pulled out a near wire - to - wire win . Rebounding was the biggest factor to the Thunder 's success , as they won that battle , 46 - 32 . Fastbreak points and points in the paint were also decisive , as Oklahoma City outscored Miami , 58 - 32 in the paint and 16 - 4 in fastbreak points . The Thunder finished the game shooting 51 percent from the field , while holding the Heat to just 44 percent . Miami ( 20 - 12 ) have riden the back of Russell Westbrook all season and he carried the load once again here . Westbrook notched his 15th triple - double of the season , as he accumulated 29 points , 17 rebounds and 11 assists in the win . Steven Adams was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 15 points and eight rebounds . Enes Kanter was a nice spark off the bench , providing 19 points and eight rebounds . On deck for the Heat is a road matchup against the Memphis Grizzlies on Thursday . Miami ( 10 - 22 ) had to play this game without Goran Dragic and it clearly hampered them in this loss . Josh Richardson had been struggling this season , but he was a nice bright spot in this loss , tallying a career - high 22 points , five rebounds and three assists . The Johnson 's once again led the bench in scoring , as Josh Johnson accrued 16 points and five rebounds , while Tyler Johnson dropped 15 points , two rebounds and two assists . Hassan Whiteside really struggled , as he went 4 - of - 11 from the field and committed four turnovers en route to a 12 - point and eight - rebound dud . The Heat will look to play better on Thursday in a road matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .

Frontcourt depth was one of the biggest concerns for the Celtics heading into their 2016 - 14 season . And while for the most part , the play behind starer Cody Zeller has been inconsistent at best , Kelly Olynyk is showing that he can be a legitimate reserve option for Boston with his play over the last three games . In Monday 's outing , Olynyk played 26 minutes off the bench and scored 15 points on 6 - of - 9 shooting from the field to go along with nine rebounds . Now , over the course of Boston 's current three - game win streak , Olynyk has averaged 27 points and 6 rebounds over 26 minutes per game while shooting an impressive 6 - of - 12 ( 67 percent ) from behind the arc and 15 - of - 34 ( 63 percent ) from the field overall . There have been trade rumors brewing all season surrounding Boston and another big man , but Olynyk is doing his best to put those to rest . The Hornets ' next game is on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Hornets will stay at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday . Jae Crowder finished second on the team , totaling 15 points , seven rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Cody Zeller recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and eight rebounds .

The Miami Heat ( 41 - 29 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 26 - 44 ) 113 - 99 on Wednesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . Fighting to get back into the playoff hunt in the stacked Western Conference , the Pelicans have started to hit their stride , notching their third straight victory in a row . They used their superior shooting in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 16 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans went just 39 percent from the floor and 44 percent from beyond the arc . Only furthering their advantage , the Heat also out - rebounded the Pelicans 53 - 42 . Anthony Davis was one of the few bright spots for the Pelicans . He was a big factor in the win . He went 10 - for - 11 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the free throw line to score 24 points , while also adding 14 rebounds and three blocked shots . It was far - and - away his best game of the year so far , as it marked a new season - high in points , along with being his first double - double of the year . He 's averaging just 3 points and five rebounds on the season . Rookie Luke Babbitt had a solid game as well , going 10 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from beyond the arc to score 23 points . The only other Pelican to reach double figures in points was Toney Douglas , who finished with 14 points ( 4 - 16 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) , nine rebounds and an assist . Since joining the Pelicans 8 games ago , he 's averaged 12 points , 4 rebounds and 4 assists in 28 minutes per game . Coming off the bench , Amar'e Stoudemire chipped in with 16 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and nine rebounds . The Pelicans ' next game will be at home against the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday , while the Pelicans will be at home against the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday .
The visiting Dallas Mavericks upset the powerhouse Los Angeles Clippers on Friday , 90 - 88 . Dallas ( 9 - 21 ) has now won four of its last seven games after a horrendous start to the season that had seated them at last in the Western Conference . On Friday , the team saw the return of star forward Dirk Nowitzki ( Achilles ) . Despite only playing 15 minutes , Nowitzki was a difference - maker for the Mavs , scoring 17 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting . Forward Harrison Barnes , meanwhile , led the team with 24 points . The Mavericks played tough defense , forcing 20 Clippers turnovers on the night . Los Angeles ( 22 - 9 ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs in a major win on Thursday , but saw a fourth quarter collapse against the Mavericks . Despite leading by as much as eight early in the fourth , the Clippers walked away with a loss at the end of the day . LA is missing star forward Blake Griffin , who recently underwent surgery and is expected to be sidelined until mid - January . Griffin 's absence was felt , as the Clippers ' starting five combined for just 34 points . Sixth man Jamal Crawford led the team with 26 off the bench . The Mavericks will play host to the Chicago Bulls on Sunday , while the Mavericks will have a long break before hosting the Oklahoma City Thunder on Thursday in the second half of a back - to - back for Kemba Paul 's team .
Fans had the pleasure of witnessing a career night from a bright young star on Wednesday , as Utah 's Rudy Gobert scored a personal - best 35 points on the night . Gobert shot an absurd 13 - of - 14 from the field and went 9 - of - 12 at the free - throw line . While delivering this incredible offensive output , Gobert maintained the defensive excellence for which he is known . On the night , Gobert blocked four shots and stole the ball once while pulling down a team - high 13 rebounds . The Jazz as a whole shot 46 percent from the field but hit just 7 - of - 28 from beyond the three - point arc . On the Knicks ' end , things were a little bleaker . The team committed four more turnovers and 15 more personal fouls than its opponent , a slate of errors that ultimately cost them the win . Sophomore big man Kristaps Porzingis had seven of those fouls , but still managed to score 24 points and hit three three - pointers . The Knicks , meanwhile , saw dramatic struggles on offense . The team hit just 48 percent of its shots and saw only two players score in double digits . Forward Kristaps Porzingis led the team with 24 points and also pulled down seven rebounds . As a team , the Knicks shot just 48 percent from the field and reached the line only 100 times . The Knicks will visit the Lakers on Sunday , while the Jazz will host the Lakers on Sunday .

The Nets also out - rebounded the Nets 51 - 57 , giving them an even greater advantage in the victory . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 38 points and 25 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 16 points and 16 rebounds on the season . Eric Bledsoe did n't have his best game from the field , but he managed just nine points ( 2 - 16 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , three rebounds and a pair of assists . The Nets received a big boost from the bench as well , with Cory Jefferson posting a double - double of 12 points ( 4 - 16 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and 5 - of - 0 FT . Markieff Morris had a season - high of 19 points , while also adding seven rebounds and four assists . He 's now averaging 20 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming one rebound short of a double - double , Brandon Knight finished with 12 points ( 4 - 16 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Nets will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .

The Washington Wizards defeated the Toronto Raptors , 105 - 96 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday evening . The Raptors ( 36 - 25 ) have put up valiant efforts thus far in the absence of All-Star point guard Kyle Lowry , with DeMar DeRozan particularly taking on an elevated role . However , when quality opponents come calling , the void felt by the absence of a player of Lowry 's caliber eventually rears its ugly head . Such was the case Wednesday , as the Wizards ( 36 - 23 ) leveraged superb efforts from trade - deadline acquisition Bojan Bogdanovic and trusted shooting guard Bradley Beal to pull out the tough road win . The pair combined for nearly half of Toronto 's point total , and the visitors made a game - changing statement in the second quarter by outscoring their hosts by a whopping 26 - 8 in the first 5:54 of the period . On the defensive end , the Wizards stymied Toronto to the tune of sub - 40 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range overall . Bogdanovic paced the Raptors overall with 27 points , his best scoring haul since donning his new team 's uniform . His effort included a sensational 6 - for - 7 tally from behind the arc . DeMarre Carroll supplied nine points , four rebounds and two assists . Norman Powell led the bench with 17 points , and Norman Powell led the second unit with 17 points .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 121 - 105 , at Barclays Center on Sunday . The two teams engaged in a true see - saw battle , with each club dominating in alternate quarters . It was the Celtics ( 0 - 1 ) who got hot at the right time , however , as they outscored the Nets ( 0 - 1 ) by a margin of 31 - 33 in the final period . The second half was a continuous see - saw battle that appeared like it might go the Nets ' way in the closing seconds , until their Mirza Teletovic missed a jumper with a second remaining that put the Celtics up by two . Deron Green led the Celtics with 19 points , three assists , a rebound and a steal . Green followed with 19 points , six boards , three assists and a pair of steals . Kevin Garnett supplied a near double - double with 10 points , six rebounds , three assists and a block . Marcus Smart led the bench with 11 points , two rebounds , two assists and a steal . Bogdanovic 's 10 points paved the bench . The Celtics were led by Deron Williams 's 19 points , which he supplemented with eight assists , three rebounds , two steals and a block . Kelly Olynyk followed with 19 points , six rebounds , two assists and a steal . Avery Bradley registered 15 points , two rebounds and a block . Kevin Garnett turned in a 10 - point , 6 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and a block . Marcus Smart paced the second unit with 10 points , two rebounds , two assists and a block . The Nets head back home to face off with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night , while the Celtics remain home to face off with the Orlando Magic on Friday evening as well .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 114 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 18 - 7 ) came in to Wednesday hoping to extend their recent stellar run in rather comfortable fashion against what would have seemed like an overmatched Sixers squad . However , Philadelphia ( 6 - 19 ) came ready to defend their home court , and rolled out Joel Embiid and Jahlil Okafor together as starters for the first time this season . While both big men played relatively well , it was Robert Covington who exploded for a season - high 26 points , which he complemented with 12 rebounds and two assists . However , the dynamic duo of Kyle Lowry and DeMar DeRozan put on their usual impressive show for the Raptors , helping them overcome one of the Sixers ' stronger offensive performances to date on the season . Philadelphia actually outpaced their visitors from the field by a 50 percent to 47 percent margin , and saw four of the five members of their first unit hit double digits in the scoring column . DeRozan led the way for Toronto with 31 points , five boards and three assists . Lowry was next with 20 points , seven assists and four rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas contributed a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also featured an assist , two steals and a block . DeMarre Carroll supplied 10 points , three boards , an assist and a steal , while Terrence Ross and Cory Joseph tallied a pair of 13 - point efforts to lead the bench . Okafor was second behind Covington with 17 points , four rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Sergio Rodriguez and Gerald Henderson put forth a pair of 16 - point efforts , with the former adding five assists and a rebound and the latter also posting two assists and a steal . Embiid had a quiet night by his standards , registering nine points , six rebounds , five assists , two blocks and a steal . Ersan Ilyasova , who moved back to the bench with Okafor 's insertion into the starting lineup at power forward , went for 12 points , seven rebounds and an assist to lead the bench . The Raptors head back home to face off with the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday night , while the Sixers remain home to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday evening as well .

After losing the first quarter , the Bucks bounced back in a big way , winning the next two periods 46 - 50 . Serge Ibaka also scored 21 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) to go with nine rebounds , three blocks , one assist and two steals in 37 minutes . The Bucks had a balanced attack as well , with six players scoring in double figures . The Indiana Pacers ( 13 - 12 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 14 - 11 ) 110 - 94 on Monday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte . The Pacers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 25 - 20 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Pacers also shot much better than the Hornets , going 49 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Hornets went just 33 percent from the floor and a meager 39 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Pacers also secured a 42 - 46 rebounding advantage , further helping to secure an impressive 22 - point victory on the road . Myles Turner was a force in this game , going 9 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the free throw line to score 22 points , while also adding seven rebounds . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Wizard to reach double - digit points was Marvin Williams , who came off the bench for 13 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and two rebounds . The Pacers ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Hornets will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Orlando Magic ( 19 - 13 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 9 - 23 ) 100 - 93 on Monday at the Amway Center in Brooklyn . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 15 percent compared to the Sixers , who went 15 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 12 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Brook Lopez had his way the night with the Magic . He went 7 - for - 18 from the field and 10 - for - 12 from the free throw line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding 15 rebounds and five steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 26 points and 16 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 34 points and 17 rebounds on the year . Evan Fournier was able to record a double - double of his own with 17 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and 10 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 42 points and 26 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 18 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Victor Oladipo was another player with a solid showing . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 9 - 17 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 4 FT ) , but he still finished with 12 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 23 points , 11 rebounds and five assists . Rookie Jarrett Oladipo did everything he could to keep the Nets in this game . He went 5 - for - 12 from the field and 3 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 17 points , to go along with three rebounds and five assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming one rebound short of a double - double , Tobias Harris finished with 12 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , eight rebounds and two assists in 37 minutes . The only other Hornet in double figures was Jarrett Jack , who came off the bench for 10 points ( 3 - 5 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) . The Magic 's next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Nets will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .

The New York Knicks defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 91 - 83 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . The recent form of these teams would indicate a New York blowout , but that simply was n't the case in this close - fought battle . A 24 - 0 run spanning between the second and third quarter was the decisive stretch , as that swung a double - digit lead for the Knicks into a 10 - point lead for the Knicks . Despite there being just four ties and three lead changes , neither team led by more than 14 points , as it was a single - digit margin for well over 50 minutes . Defense was key for the Knicks , as they held the Sixers to 40 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range . New York also dominated the glass , winning the defensive rebounding battle , 42 - 26 . Carmelo Anthony was a monster , as he accrued 25 points , seven rebounds and two assists on 10 - of - 20 shooting . Carmelo Anthony was second on the team , finishing with 25 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Wily Noel started for the injured Jerami Grant and accrued 17 points , 12 rebounds and two assists . No other player had more than 10 points or five assists . Carmelo Anthony led the way for New York , as he tallied 25 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Nerlens Noel was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 17 points and 12 rebounds . Quincy Acy led the team in scoring , dropping 10 points off the bench .

The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder , 117 - 117 , at Chesapeake Energy Arena on Saturday . Russell Westbrook has been virtually unstoppable the majority of the season , but had been somewhat human the last three games after seeing a streak of six consecutive triple - doubles snapped against the Celtics on Dec. 10 . However , matched up Saturday against one of the most porous defenses in the league , especially against point guards , the perennial All-Star exploded for 41 points , a career - high 16 assists and 12 rebounds , his 50th career triple - double . He added two steals and a block as well . His spectacular performance helped negate a remarkable effort on the other side from Serge Ibaka , who managed a game - high 31 points on 13 - of - 19 shooting , and he added nine rebounds and four assists . Evan Fournier was next with 21 points , five assists and two rebounds . Steven Adams was next among the starting five with a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks , two steals and one block . Victor Oladipo supplied 12 points , two assists , one rebound and one steal . Enes Kanter led the bench with 16 points , eight boards , one steal and one block . Elfrid Payton tallied a 23 - point , 9 - assist double - double that also included seven rebounds , one steal and one block . Evan Fournier was next with 21 points , two rebounds and five assists . Victor Oladipo compiled 12 points , two assists , one rebound and one steal . Enes Kanter was productive as a reserve as well with 16 points , eight rebounds , one steal and one block . Elfrid Payton led the Thunder with 23 points , seven rebounds , nine assists , one steal and one block . Evan Fournier was next with 21 points , five assists and two rebounds . Victor Oladipo tallied 12 points , one rebound , two assists and one block . Rookie Aaron Gordon posted 12 points , one rebound and one assist . D.J . Augustin paced the bench with 12 points , one rebound and one block . Elfrid Payton was next with 23 points , nine assists , seven rebounds , two steals and one block . Steven Adams posted a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included one block . Jeff Green tallied 11 points , three assists , one rebound and one block in 22 minutes off the bench . The Thunder head back home to take on the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday night , while the Thunder head to the Big Apple to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Tuesday evening .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 8 - 19 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 8 - 20 ) 115 - 108 on Monday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Right from the tip - off , the Timberwolves were clearly the better offensive team in this one . They capped off the first half with a 48 - 39 point lead , giving them enough of an advantage to coast to a victory on the road . The Timberwolves were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 37 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 45 percent from the floor and just 43 percent from beyond the arc . The Timberwolves were also able to force the Suns into 17 turnovers , while only committing 17 of their own . The Timberwolves were led by Zach LaVine , who went 7 - for - 16 from the field and 4 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding four rebounds and three assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 33 points and 19 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 17 points and 15 rebounds on the year . Devin Wiggins was the other player to score in double figures for the Suns . He went 6 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 18 points . The Timberwolves ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Thursday , while the Suns will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday .
The Miami Heat ( 7 - 4 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 4 - 9 ) 116 - 109 on Tuesday at the American Airlines Arena in Miami Florida . The Heat did most of their damage in the first half , out - scoring the Celitcs 52 - 42 . They were able to finish the game shooting 47 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 51 percent from the floor and 52 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were also able to force the Kings into 18 turnovers , while only committing seven of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Heat were led by Chris Bosh , who went 8 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 67 points in the last three games . The only other King in double figures was Omri Casspi , who chipped in with 16 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 0 - 4 FT ) and six rebounds . The Heat 's next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday . The Kings will be at home against the New York Knicks on Friday .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 20 - 51 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 51 - 21 ) 104 - 95 on Friday at the Barclays Center in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 57 - 49 in the first half . Along with their quick start , the Nets also used their superior shooting to grab an advantage , going 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Cavaliers went 44 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 30 points ( 13 - 16 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , to go along with six assists . Lopez was able to get to the free throw line at will , converting on 6 - of - 4 free throw attempts . He 's now averaging 22 points and 8 rebounds on the season . Kyrie Irving had a very quiet night as well , going 6 - for - 22 from the field and 1 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score 13 points . He also chipped in five rebounds and four assists , coming just shy of a triple - double . Shane Larkin had his best game of the year as well , posting 16 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and seven assists in 31 minutes . The Nets ' next game will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Cavaliers will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .

Ish Smith tallied 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , three rebounds and three assists , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Jazz shot 47 percent from the field and 46 percent from long range but gave up 7 turnovers in the game . Gordon Hayward was the high - point man for the Pistons with 17 points , in 31 minutes . Rudy Gobert added 12 points and nine rebounds , while Ish Smith chipped in 16 points , three assists and three rebounds . The only other player to score in double digits for the Jazz was Tobias Harris , who finished with 12 points , along with four rebounds and two assists , in 30 minutes off the bench . Rudy Gobert finished with 12 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 5 FT ) , nine rebounds and four blocks , in 20 minutes .
