The Pistons have now lost two in a row . Next , the Pistons will look to influence the race - for - eighth as they host the Mavericks on Sunday . The Jazz will visit Phoenix to challenge the Suns on Sunday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Denver Nuggets , 123 - 113 , at Verizon Center on Monday . Despite there being just five ties and six lead changes , this game was close throughout . In fact , neither team grabbed a double - digit lead , as it came down to the final seconds . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Wizards going 16 - of - 24 and the Nuggets hitting just 4 - of - 26 from long distance . Washington also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than Denver , while committing six less turnovers . The Wizards also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 43 - 39 . Gary Harris led Denver with 26 points , while Marcin Plumlee provided 19 points and eight rebounds . Bradley Beal led the team in scoring , as he dropped 26 points on 10 - of - 15 shooting . John Wall went just 12 - of - 19 from the field , but finished with 30 points , three rebounds and 10 assists . John Wall led the Nuggets , as he accumulated 30 points , three rebounds and 10 assists . Bradley Beal was second on the team , as he dropped 26 points to go along with five assists . Marcin Gortat and Markieff Morris each recorded a double - double , combining for 33 points and 31 rebounds . Wilson Chandler led the starters in scoring , dropping 21 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting . Marcin Gortat recorded a double - double , totaling 11 points and 15 rebounds .
The Brooklyn Nets ( 24 - 33 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 39 - 22 ) 104 - 94 on Wednesday . A game that was expected to be a grind - it - out defensive battle largely fulfilled that prophecy , with Brooklyn finally able to pull away on the strength of a pair of standout efforts from their two best players , and an injury to one of their opponent 's key pieces . Deron Williams and Dirk Nowitzki were able to post double - digit scoring totals , and Mason Plumlee led the way with a 16 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , a steal and a block . Brooklyn was led by Dirk Nowitzki 's 20 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , two assists and a block . Joe Johnson followed with a near double - double consisting of 15 points , eight rebounds , three assists and a steal . Al-Farouq Aminu contributed 12 points , five rebounds , two assists and four steals . Al-Farouq Aminu was productive in a reserve role as well , tallying 12 points , five rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Dallas was led by Deron Williams 's 23 points , which he supplemented with six assists , six rebounds and a steal . Dirk Nowitzki followed with 20 points , six rebounds and two assists . Joe Johnson was next with a bench - leading 15 points , along with eight rebounds and three assists . Monta Ellis registered 12 points , five assists , one rebound and three steals . The Mavericks remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are just a game behind the eighth - seeded Dallas Mavericks . They head to Atlanta to take on the Hawks on Monday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 114 - 105 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday . Throughout his first seven seasons , DeMar DeRozan had managed two performances of over 38 points . In what has already proven to be a stellar 2016 - 12 campaign , the All-Star shooting guard has already accomplished the feat on three occasions , with Tuesday night being one of those . DeRozan led all scorers with 31 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists and two steals . The performance included a 11 - of - 19 tally from the field , and even a rather rare three - pointer on two attempts from beyond the arc . Toronto ( 38 - 18 ) was hot collectively from long range , and it proved to be the difference in the game . Both teams equaled the others ' solid 50 percent success rate from the field , yet the Raptors managed to drain their 27 three - point attempts on the night . The Raptors were led by Andrew Wiggins , who tallied 26 points , four rebounds , three assists and a steal . Ricky Rubio followed with 12 points , 13 assists , three rebounds and two steals . Jonas Valanciunas generated a 14 - point , 7 - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Shabazz Muhammad matched Towns 's scoring total and added six rebounds and one block . Shabazz Muhammad matched Muhammad 's scoring total while leading the bench and added six rebounds . Shabazz Ross led the second unit with 10 points .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 35 - 32 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 28 - 37 ) 121 - 84 on Sunday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 31 - 24 right away in the first quarter . Along with the quick start , the Trail Blazers also shot better from the field , going 56 percent from the floor and 49 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 37 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers were also able to force the Magic into 15 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Aaron Gordon had a big game . He went 8 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 32 points , while also adding four rebounds . He 's now averaging 15 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Aaron Gordon had a double - double of his own , going for 18 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 0 - 3 FT ) , four rebounds and three assists before fouling out . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only three points on Friday against the Blazers . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 114 - 106 , at Palace at Auburn Hills on Sunday . The Pistons ( 33 - 12 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Cavaliers ( 25 - 12 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Detroit forced the visitors into a highly efficient 48 percent shooting from long range , while also boasting nine of their own . The Cavaliers ' starting five was decidedly top - heavy in terms of production , as Kevin Love led the way with 29 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds and three assists . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope was next with 19 points , seven rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block . Marcus Morris tallied 14 points , two assists , two rebounds and one steal . Tristan Thompson posted a 11 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included one block . Ersan Ilyasova went for 11 points , four rebounds , two steals and one block . Stanley Johnson led the bench with 15 points , four rebounds , five assists and one steal . LeBron James posted a 20 - point , nine - rebound , eight - assist triple - double that also included one steal . Reggie Jackson led Detroit with 15 points , six assists and two rebounds . Tristan Thompson provided a 11 - point , 14 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks . Timofey Mozgov went for 12 points , eight rebounds and three blocks in 19 minutes .
The Washington Wizards ( 24 - 20 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 23 - 22 ) 109 - 99 on Friday night . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially Charlotte , as they shot 39 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Wizards really turned it on , as they outscored the Hornets 29 to 25 . The Hornets actually dominated the rebounding , as they brought down 43 boards to the Hornets 43 . The Hornets also shot well from long distance , as they went 18 - for - 32 in their win . The Hornets have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . Markieff Morris was the player of the game , as he tallied 23 points and eight rebounds off the bench . Otto Porter also had one of his best games of the season , as he tallied 14 points and 12 rebounds . Marco Belinelli also had an impressive game off the bench , scoring a season - high 18 points . There were many instances throughout the game where the fans were booing their home team and that 's a sad indication of where this franchise has been playing at the moment . They 'll look to keep up this good form against the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday in the second half of a back - to - back . Charlotte shot horribly in this game , but they hung in with their grittiness and hustle . The Hornets set a season - high with 19 offensive rebounds and attacked the glass all game long . Unfortunately for them , they shot just 39 percent from the field and 25 percent from three - point range . Marcin Gortat played one of his best games of the year , as he accumulated 8 points and 12 rebounds in the defeat . The Hornets have now won 14 of their last 10 games and are steadily moving up the Eastern Conference standings . They 'll have their biggest test of the season in their next game , when they take on the undefeated Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Atlanta Hawks , 112 - 86 , at Verizon Center on Monday evening . The Wizards ( 26 - 20 ) knew they 'd have to hit on all cylinders to insure that they could keep pace with John Wall and company , and they managed to do that and then some Monday . Washington posted outstanding 58 - and - 62 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively , while seeing six players tally double - digit scoring . Meanwhile , they did a superb defensive job on Wall , limiting him to a modest 19 points on 7 - of - 17 shooting , and the Hawks ( 27 - 20 ) to 36 percent shooting overall , including one stretch of 30 consecutive missed shots . Wall led the way for the Wizards with 19 points , nine assists and six rebounds . Morris followed with 15 points , nine assists , one rebound and one steal . Dwight Howard totaled a 12 - point , 13 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and one block . Tim Hardaway , Jr. paced the bench with 12 points and a steal . John Wall provided a 19 - point , 9 - assist double - double , while Markieff Morris ( 15 points ) and Bradley Beal ( 15 points ) were highly productive off the bench . The Wizards continue their road trip with a Saturday night showdown with the Miami Heat , while the Wizards remain home to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Friday evening as well .

In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Rockets led for the final 38 minutes and held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . The Rockets shot 49 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range , while the Suns shot just 43 percent from the field and 23 percent from long distance . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Houston winning that battle , 47 - 53 . The Rockets ( 23 - 9 ) have been dominant at home this season , but this was a devastating loss in a game they were supposed to win . The New York Knicks ( 19 - 24 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 26 - 16 ) 117 - 106 on Friday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Knicks came out firing in this game , out - scoring the Celtics 31 - 34 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Knicks shot the ball well , going 51 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 39 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Knicks were also able to force the Celtics into 23 turnovers , while only committing three of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Knicks were led by Derrick Rose , who went 13 - for - 24 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 30 points in 33 minutes . He also chipped in nine rebounds , five assists , two steals and two blocked shots , but it was n't enough to keep the Celtics in contention for the victory . Notching a double - double , center Willy Hernangomez posted 17 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) and 11 rebounds in 20 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 54 points and 18 rebounds over his last two games . As for the Celtics , Carmelo Thomas did n't have his best game , finishing with 13 points ( 5 - 14 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt ) , four rebounds and three assists . He should only continue to get better with the huge increase in minutes , as he did n't get much playing time with the Rockets . The Knicks ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Celtics will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Wednesday .

The Utah Jazz defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 107 - 101 at Staples Center on Monday . The Jazz ( 13 - 9 ) edged out a close victory down the stretch after the Lakers ( 10 - 13 ) found life late in the second half . The see - saw third and fourth quarters saw scoring runs in favor of Los Angeles in the third , while the Lakers bounced back in the fourth behind Lou William 's streaky scoring bursts and Julius Randle 's explosiveness under the rim . Williams dropped in a two point shot to close the Lakers lead to three point with 3:26 remaining in the final period , but Rodney Hoot responded for Utah with a 25 - foot three pointer . The Lakers only managed two points over a three minute stretch , while Los Angeles closed out the game . Williams finished with 38 points , six rebounds and seven assists on 13 - of - 27 shooting to lead all scorers in his 34 minutes off the bench . Worth noting was the Lakers starting lineup , which consisted of Brandon Ingram , Luol Deng , Metta World Peace , Julius Randle and Timofey Mozgov . Head coach Luke Walton was experimental with the lineup , and it seemed to funnel the Lakers into more isolation style basketball , which was the game plan as discussed in the post - game press conference . All five Utah starters finished in double figures scoring , led by Gordon Hayward and his 23 points . Rudy Gobert finished with 14 points , 17 rebounds and five blocks in 39 minutes . Next up , the Lakers play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday , while the Lakers visit the New Orleans Pelicans on Wednesday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Toronto Raptors , 102 - 96 , at Air Canada Centre on Friday . The Raptors ( 0 - 1 ) invested heavily into their star two - guard Goran Dragic in the offseason , inking the 20 - year old to a five - year , $ 139 million contract . He began paying immediate dividends on that hefty sum Wednesday , tallying a game - high 24 points and adding six rebounds , four assists , two steals and two blocks . It was an outstanding defensive performance for the dynamic duo of Jonas Valanciunas and Goran Dragic , who combined for 55 of the Heat 's 96 points on the night . The Raptors were also able to post a solid 45 percent success rate from the field overall while limiting the Raptors to just 45 percent shooting . Toronto was led by Dwyane Wade 's 22 points , which he supplemented with six rebounds , four assists , three blocks and a steal . Joe Johnson followed with a near double - double consisting of 16 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Luol Deng and DeMarre Carroll turned in matching 10 - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds , three assists , two steals and one block , and the latter providing four rebounds , three assists and two steals . Cory Joseph led the second unit with 10 points , two assists and three rebounds . Cory Joseph was productive as a reserve as well with 10 points , three rebounds and two assists . Valanciunas paced the Raptors with 24 points , 14 rebounds , three assists , three steals and three blocks . DeRozan was right behind him with 22 points , six boards , four assists and one steal . Kyle Lowry and Kyle Lowry registered matching seven - point efforts , with the former adding four rebounds , six assists and three steals , and the latter providing four rebounds and two assists . Cory Joseph led the second unit with 10 points , three rebounds and two assists , while Cory Joseph led the bench with 10 points , three rebounds and two assists . The Raptors ( 0 - 1 ) were spearheaded by Goran Dragic , who supplied 26 points , two assists and six rebounds . Joe Johnson and Joe Johnson produced matching 16 - point efforts , with the former adding seven rebounds , two assists and two steals , and the latter registering seven assists , four rebounds and a pair of steals . Cory Joseph led the second unit with 10 points , two assists and a rebound . The series now shifts back to Toronto , where the deadlocked teams will meet for Game 3 at the Air Canada Centre on Monday night .

The Warriors got off to a hot start , out - scoring the Suns 26 - 28 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Warriors shot the ball extremely well , going 52 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 45 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from beyond the arc . Despite out - rebounding the Suns 41 - 49 , the Warriors were forced into 20 turnovers , which may have been the difference in an otherwise evenly played game . The Warriors received a huge contribution from center Mirza Thompson , who went 15 - for - 22 from the field and 8 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 43 points , while also adding three assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 33 points and 17 rebounds per game . The New Orleans Pelicans ( 14 - 27 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 13 - 30 ) 114 - 99 on Saturday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Pelicans road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Timberwolves had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 17 - 4 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , New Orleans had managed a paltry three wins in 22 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game . They 'd also struggled offensively the majority of the year , often failing to even reach 100 points over the first 18 games of the season . However , the light has seemingly come on for New Orleans , and their side of the scoreboard , over their last two outings . After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma City on Wednesday , the Pelicans roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting a stellar 51 percent from the field and 44 percent from three - point range . They also suffocated the Timberwolves ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 21 percent shooting from beyond the arc . Minnesota received a trio of 20 - point - plus efforts from their starting five , spearheaded by Andrew Wiggins 's 21 points . He added four rebounds , two assists and three steals . The Miami Heat defeated the Golden State Warriors 105 - 102 Monday at AmericanAirlines Arena . After Kevin Durant tied the game at 102 with just over 10 seconds left in the fourth quarter , Dion Waiters held the ball at the top of the key while the clock ticked down . With a little over two seconds on the clock , Waiters launched a shot from behind the arc . The shot hit nothing but net and the Heat pulled off one of the biggest upset victories in the NBA this season . Waiters was not only the hero , but he was also the star , as he finished with a game - high 33 points on 13 - of - 20 shooting from the field and 6 - of - 8 from 3 - point land in 33 minutes . As a team , the Heat were scorching from behind the arc , hitting a ridiculous 43 percent of their shots from long range in the winning effort . The win gives Miami their fourth straight victory as they were perfect over their four - game home stand . Meanwhile , the loss ends the Warriors ' ( 38 - 7 ) seven - game win streak , as it ended up being too little too late in the closing moments for the NBA 's top team . Durant led the way in the scoring column , finishing with 27 points on 12 - of - 23 shooting from the field , but he did shoot just 1 - of - 8 from behind the arc . Additionally , Steph Curry almost put together a triple - double , as he recorded 21 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists in 37 minutes . Klay Thompson added 22 of his own , but JaVale McGee 's 10 points made him the fourth and final Heat to score in double figures . Up next , the Heat will look to continue their winning ways in Brooklyn on Friday , while the Warriors will look to return to form against the Hornets on Wednesday .

He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 34 points and 11 rebounds per game . J.J. Redick had a solid showing as well , going 9 - for - 13 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 23 points . It was a season - high in points for him . J.J. Redick had 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 23 minutes . The Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Cavaliers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 55 - 26 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 30 - 51 ) 110 - 103 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 31 - 31 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters as well , going 45 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went just 38 percent from the floor and a meager 36 percent from beyond the arc . To go along with the superior shooting , the Clippers also secured a 47 - 58 rebounding advantage , which may have been enough to hold off the Clippers . The Clippers were led by Wilson Chandler , who went 12 - for - 23 from the field and 6 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 32 points , while also adding six rebounds and four assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 23 points and 13 rebounds per game . J.J. Redick had a strong showing as well , going 7 - for - 16 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 20 points . It was a nice surprise for the Nuggets , as he 's averaging only 11 points per game so far this season . Nearly recording a triple - double , Chris Paul finished with 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , seven rebounds and nine assists . He 's been filling up the stat sheet lately , combining for 17 points , 11 rebounds and 11 assists over his last two outings . Kenneth Faried was able to notch a double - double , as he finished with 19 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 5 - 9 FT ) and 17 rebounds . The Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Nuggets will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 102 - 89 , at TD Garden on Friday . These two teams came into this matchup tied for the most wins in NBA history and the Celtics were able to pull ahead of the Hornets with this victory . The second quarter was the difference in the game , as Boston outscored Charlotte , 27 - 19 . Defense was also key for the Celtics , as they held the Hornets to 36 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . Boston also dominated the glass , winning the defensive rebounding battle , 42 - 26 . Isaiah Thomas carried the Celtics , as he tallied 18 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Jae Crowder finished second on the team , totaling 19 points and nine rebounds . Jared Sullinger recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 8 points and 10 rebounds . Frank Kaminsky was a nice spark off the bench as well , amassing 10 points and seven rebounds . Boston 's next game will be on Sunday against the Phoenix Suns . The Hornets ( 15 - 13 ) had to play this game without Al Horford and Avery Bradley , as they did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to hold off the Celtics . Frank Kaminsky led the team in scoring off the bench , as he totaled 20 points and nine rebounds . Kemba Walker carried the load for Boston , scoring a game - high 18 points to go along with four rebounds and seven assists . Jared Sullinger was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled eight points and 10 rebounds . David Lee had a nice game off the bench , totaling 10 points and seven rebounds . Thing 's do n't get any easier for Charlotte , as they play the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday for their next game .

The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Denver Nuggets , 125 - 109 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Cleveland leading for much of the first half , Cleveland pulled away in the second half , outscoring the Nuggets by 31 points . Cleveland took advantage of the happy whistle , as they went 46 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while the Nuggets went just 40 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . Cleveland also dominated down low , as they won the rebounding battle 49 - 45 and the points in the paint differential 56 - 45 . The Nuggets ( 37 - 30 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to show how dangerous they can be . LeBron James was the player of the game , as he tallied 27 points , five rebounds and 12 assists on 11 - of - 16 from the field . Kevin Jokic finished with 27 points , 13 rebounds and four assists . Gary Harris was second on the team , as he accrued 16 points , three rebounds , two steals and two blocks off the bench . Kyle Korver led the starters in scoring , as he accrued 14 points , five rebounds and eight assists . Kevin Love recorded a double - double , totaling 16 points and nine rebounds on 5 - of - 11 shooting .
The Chicago Bulls defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 118 - 88 , at Barclay 's Center on Wednesday . This was a game that appeared to be over headed into the fourth quarter , but Chicago had other ideas . In fact , Chicago led by 14 points headed into the fourth quarter , as the Bulls outscored the Nets , 25 - 22 , to pull out an amazing comeback win . The statistics tell the story , with Chicago winning the shooting , rebounding , assisting and turnover differentials . Three-point shooting was a huge factor as well , with the Bulls hitting 10 - of - 26 , while the Nets went just 13 - of - 35 from long range . The Bulls ( 3 - 3 ) have been stifling teams with their rocket launcher mentality and dominating wins over teams like the Nets show just how good they 've become . Jimmy Butler was the player of the game , accumulating 22 points , six rebounds and two assists on 6 - of - 10 shooting . Jimmy Butler was n't far behind , totaling 22 points and six rebounds . Brook Lopez was the only other starter with more than 13 points , as he accumulated 13 points , two rebounds and four assists . Dwyane Lin led the team in scoring , as he accrued 14 points , two rebounds and four assists on 5 - of - 10 shooting . Rajon Rondo accumulated 10 points , four rebounds , four assists , three steals and two blocks . Chicago will look to keep rolling on Monday against the Houston Rockets .
The Washington Wizards defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 107 - 94 , at Smoothie King Center on Tuesday . The Wizards ( 27 - 20 ) learned earlier in the day that Anthony Davis would miss the contest with the hip injury that he suffered after a flagrant foul by the Knicks ' Kyle O'Quinn on Monday . However , that did n't deter them from notching their sixth road victory of the season on the strength of standout efforts from Davis ' replacement Anthony Davis and Anthony Morris . Davis was right behind him with a season - high 36 points , which he supplemented with 17 rebounds , three assists , three steals and two blocks . He made a driving layup with three seconds remaining in regulation to send the game into overtime , and then made another in the extra period to help the Wizards come back from a 111 - 106 deficit with 2:30 remaining . Bradley Beal followed Davis with 21 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , two assists and one steal . John Wall supplied a 18 - point , 19 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds , three steals and one block . Markieff Morris collected 21 points , eight rebounds and one assist . Marcin Gortat contributed a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and one steal . Donatas Motiejunas was productive in a reserve role as well with 10 points and four rebounds . Davis led the way with a game - high 36 points , along with 17 rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Gortat was next with a 17 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a steal . Otto Porter , Jr. provided a 13 - point , 6 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and four blocks . Donatas Motiejunas was productive in his own right , supplying 10 points , four rebounds and two assists . The Pelicans head back home to face the Phoenix Suns on Monday evening , while the Wizards remain home to tangle with the Cleveland Cavaliers on Monday night .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 3 ) 103 - 95 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Celtics built a strong lead early in this game , out - scoring the Celtics 31 - 25 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 44 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 31 points ( 13 - 26 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds , four assists and two steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 7 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding six assists . He 's now averaging 15 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Jae Crowder was able to record a double - double of his own with 16 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Celtics will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 10 - 16 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 18 - 10 ) 96 - 92 on Sunday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Sacramento . The Kings got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Kings 24 - 19 in the first quarter alone . The Kings were the superior shooters in this one , going 39 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 38 percent from the floor and 20 percent from deep . The Kings also forced the Grizzlies into 13 turnovers , while committing just 11 of their own . DeMarcus Cousins led the charge , going 6 - for - 18 from the field and 8 - for - 8 from the free throw line to score 20 points , while also adding five rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 28 rebounds over his last two games . Kosta Koufos was also a big factor in the win , posting a season - high of 16 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 6 FT ) , while also adding 13 rebounds and three blocked shots in 30 minutes . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 18 points and 11 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Garrett Temple added 13 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and six assists . The Kings ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Grizzlies will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .

The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the New York Knicks , 121 - 107 , at Madison Square Garden on Monday night . The Knicks ( 22 - 31 ) have been mired in controversy on and off the court in recent weeks , with rumors swirling about a possible trade of franchise cornerstone Carmelo Anthony and losses in three of their last four games . The Lakers ( 18 - 36 ) are n't in much better shape , however , and came into Monday 's contest with only five road wins in 28 games away from the Staples Center this season . However , a sterling effort from the Los Angeles bench that generated over half of the team 's scoring total helped lead the way to a relatively easy victory . The visitors were sharp from the jump , building a 29 - 19 lead after one and a 61 - 45 advantage by halftime . That edge was 97 - 73 after three quarters , and even with New York showing some signs of life in garbage time , the Lakers still coasted to a double - digit road victory . The Lakers were led by Lou Williams off the bench , who tallied 22 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal in 26 minutes . Nick Young was next and paced the starters with 17 points , which he complemented with five rebounds and one steal . Brandon Ingram and Julius Randle followed with matching 14 - point efforts , with the former also providing seven boards , two assists and one steal , and the latter offering two rebounds , two assists and one block . Tarik Black posted a modest nine points but hauled in 10 boards and recorded one steal . D'Angelo Russell ( four points , six assists , two rebounds ) was minimally involved , but Justin Holiday ( 14 points ) and emerging rookie Ivica Zubac ( 10 points ) were productive as reserves as well .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Utah Jazz , 102 - 96 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 5 - 5 ) used a late fourth - quarter surge to secure their first road victory on Monday , after dropping their first three away from home to start the season . They did so with yet another great performance from Vince Carter off the bench , as he continues to turn back the clock in his 19th NBA season . Carter had 20 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting in 31 minutes as a reserve - - his third straight game with at least 17 points . Zach Randolph added a great performance off the bench himself , scoring 18 points and grabbing 10 rebounds in just 23 minutes to notch his third double - double of the season . For the starters , it was Marc Gasol and Mike Conley who carried the load , scoring 22 and 18 points respectively . For the Jazz ( 7 - 5 ) , on top of losing Monday 's game , they also lost their starting power forward Derrick Favors , as he left the game with left knee soreness after 21 minutes of playing time . Favors has been bothered with knee issues since before the season even started , and it is possible the team is now extra cautious with their star forward , opening the door for second - year player Trey Lyles to play a bigger role . The power forward out of Kentucky was great in 32 minutes off the bench , scoring 18 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . Gordon Hayward , who has been unstoppable as of late with five straight games of at least 20 points , struggled mightily , shooting just 4 - of - 14 from the field and 1 - of - 7 from behind the arc en route to just 13 points . With Favors potentially out for an indefinite amount of time , the burden will be on Hayward to regain his scoring mojo and carry the load for a Utah team that is n't very prolific offensively . Up next , the Grizzlies will head to Los Angeles on Wednesday to take on the red - hot Clippers , while the Jazz will have off until Thursday when they take on Chicago at home .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 9 - 6 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 6 - 7 ) 111 - 89 on Tuesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Jazz have n't been able to find their flow as a team thus far , and they took their second straight loss Wednesday . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 55 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 38 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Russell Westbrook backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 20 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , while also adding seven rebounds and nine assists in 27 minutes . He 's really stepped up his game in the absence of Jamal Crawford , as Hayward is averaging 22 points and 5 assists over his last five games . The Thunder also received some solid contributions from their bench with both Dion Waiters and Anthony Morrow reaching double figures . Waiters had 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and three rebounds , while Morrow had 15 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt ) and two steals . The Thunder 's next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Jazz will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The visiting Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Miami Heat , 110 - 107 , at American Airlines Arena on Saturday . In a battle between two defensive - minded teams , offense was on display . In fact , both teams show over 49 percent from the field and there were only 16 combined turnovers and 19 combined steals/blocks . Those are extremely low numbers and it comes as a big surprise with these inefficient offenses squaring off . Free-throw shooting was key for the Grizzlies , as they went 27 - of - 33 to the Heat 's 16 - of - 24 . The assist - to - turnover differential was huge as well , with Memphis recording 23 assists - to - six turnovers , while Miami recorded just 18 assists - to - 10 turnovers . There were five ties and 13 lead changes , with no team leading by double - digits for the entirety of the game . Miami ( 11 - 6 ) have been thriving off their elite defense lately , but the offense was key in this victory . Marc Gasol was the player of the game , as he tied a season - high with 28 points , adding three rebounds and six assists to his tally . Troy Williams got the first start of his rookie campaign and scored a career - high 18 points in a career - high 35 minutes . Tony Allen also got a rare start , totaling 11 points and eight rebounds in the win . Mike Conley finished the game with 21 points and seven assists , hitting numerous big shots in the fourth quarter . On deck for Miami is a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Monday . Miami ( 5 - 11 ) had to play this game without Goran Dragic and Justise Winslow , but they fought to the final whistle . In fact , all five starters scored in double figures , with none of them shooting below 50 percent from the field . Dion Waiters stepped up in Dragic 's absence , accumulating a team - high 28 points , five rebounds and six assists . Hassan Whiteside recorded another double - double despite dealing with foul trouble , scoring 15 points and grabbing 12 rebounds in the defeat . Josh Richardson amassed 15 points , three rebounds and five assists , but missed a game - tying three at the buzzer . Miami will host the Boston Celtics for their next game on Monday .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the New York Knicks , 107 - 102 , at Madison Square Garden on Saturday night . Although both teams entered the game with losing records , they engaged in an exciting and tightly - contested offensive affair through three quarters . Both defenses clamped down in the final 8 minutes , however , and the Hornets ( 8 - 8 ) were able to rally behind their starters and retake the lead midway through the third quarter after Kemba Walker drained a three pointer over the final seconds to seal the victory for the Hornets . The three - point shooting was the biggest part of the Hornets ' success , as Charlotte posted respective success rates of 37 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range , while also eliciting 8 turnovers from their hosts as well . Kemba Walker led the way with 28 points , a total he supplemented with three assists , two rebounds , three blocks and a steal . Jeremy Lamb followed with a full 14 - point , 2 - assist double - double that also included a rebound and a steal . Frank Kaminsky III paced the bench with 14 points , five rebounds and three assists , while Frank Kaminsky III posted a 14 - point , 5 - rebound double - double that also included three assists and a block . Brandon Jennings paced the second unit with 12 points , four assists and a rebound . Brandon Jennings was productive in a reserve role as well with 12 points , four assists and a rebound . The Knicks remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Tuesday . The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 120 - 116 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Sunday evening . The Cavs ( 28 - 8 ) narrowly escaped Phoenix with the win , as the Suns ( 12 - 26 ) used a strong second half to come within two points , with 3:20 left in the fourth . The Cavs started out with a huge 41 - point first quarter but the Suns retaliated in the third , winning the quarter 37 - 37 , to bring the score to 93 - 90 at the start of the fourth . However , the Cavs were able to hang on to escape with a four - point win . Cleveland 's big three earned their keep in this one , as they combined for 40 points in the first half , and another 40 in the second half , for a huge 80 - point contribution on the night . Warren followed up with 15 points on 7 - of - 9 shooting , along with three rebounds , three steals and two assists , in 27 minutes off the bench . T.J. Warren added 15 points , while rookie T.J. Warren chipped in 15 points . The only other player to score in double digits for the Suns was Tyson Chandler , who finished with 10 points and 15 rebounds .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 87 - 75 , at Palace at Auburn Hills on Friday . Both teams ' defenses came out ultra - sharp , with only a combined 29 points scored in the first quarter . The game remained close throughout the second and third periods as well , and the Pistons ( 33 - 36 ) actually entered the fourth quarter with a 66 - 60 lead . That 's when the light went on for the Raptors ( 40 - 29 ) , who rattled off 27 points over the final 12 minutes while limiting Detroit to just nine points . Abysmal three - point shooting was part of the downfall for the Pistons , as they managed just a 15 percent success rate from behind the arc . The loss negated a mammoth 22 - rebound effort from Detroit 's Andre Drummond . Serge Ibaka paced Toronto with 17 points , nine rebounds and one assist . DeMar DeRozan followed with 14 points , eight boards and six assists . DeMarre Carroll supplied 12 points , one rebound , one assist and one steal . Jonas Valanciunas chipped in with 10 points , eight rebounds , one steal and one block . Cory Joseph was productive as well with a full stat line of nine points , seven rebounds , six assists and one block . Norman Powell led the second unit with 11 points and two rebounds . Reggie Jackson led Detroit with 20 points and six assists . Tobias Harris posted 14 points , seven rebounds and one steal . DeMarre Carroll matched Carroll 's point total and added seven assists , one rebound and one steal . Jon Leuer led the second unit with 12 points , five rebounds and two assists . The San Antonio Spurs ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 0 - 1 ) 101 - 100 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Mavericks have n't been able to find their flow as a team thus far , and they took their second straight loss Wednesday . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 50 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks finished at 49 percent from the floor and 38 percent from deep . This marked the fifth straight loss for the Mavericks , as they look to improve their draft positioning for the 2015 NBA Draft . The Spurs got their biggest contribution from their bench , with both Devin Ginobili and Dirk Nowitzki reaching double figures in points . Ginobili finished with 20 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and six assists , while Harris added 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and 13 rebounds . It was his fifth double - double of the season . Danny Green was the only other starter to reach double figures in points , finishing with 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) . The Spurs were led by the duo of Dirk Nowitzki and Monta Ellis . Ellis went 11 - for - 21 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also handing out six assists . He was able to get to the free throw line a wopping 4 times , and converted on 4 - of - 4 free throw attempts . Dirk Nowitzki was the only other Spurs ' player , as he had 18 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) and grabbing six rebounds . It was his thirteenth double - double of the season and third straight game with at least 10 rebounds . Nowitzki shot 7 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from deep to score 18 points , while also grabbing six rebounds . It was the most points he 's had in the last four games . In Nowitzki 's third game with the team , he finished with 5 points ( 2 - 10 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt ) , four rebounds and three assists . He should only continue to get better with the huge increase in minutes , as he did n't get much playing time with the Rockets . The Spurs ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Mavericks will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .

The 22 points matched a season - high for him , while the only other player to reach double figures was Carl Landry , who came off the bench to score 14 points ( 6 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) in 22 minutes . The San Antonio Spurs ( 15 - 5 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 4 - 15 ) 123 - 101 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . After going into halftime down 62 - 42 , the Timberwolves came out firing in the third quarter , out - scoring the Timberwolves 28 - 25 , but the Timberwolves were able to hold them off and steal the victory on the road . It was a new season - high in points for him and also a nice bounce back game after posting just three points in Saturday 's game against the Bulls . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 45 - 22 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 43 - 26 ) 91 - 83 on Tuesday at the Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 29 - 20 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 42 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 42 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 33 points ( 13 - 20 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 10 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds , six assists and two steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 8 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding four assists . After taking double - digit shot attempts in all five of his previous playoff games coming into this one , Irving had just nine field goal attempts Wednesday , although he was able to consistently force his way to the free throw line . Irving was able to take a backseat to James , who readily took this game over from the start . So far this postseason , Irving is averaging 24 points and 3 assists over six games . Joe Johnson added 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds and three assists as well . The Jazz ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Los Angeles Clippers ( 31 - 16 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 9 - 40 ) 105 - 93 at Staples Center on Sunday . The Clippers were able to exploit the Lakers defensive breakdowns which eventually led to a 28 points blowout win . Los Angeles burst out the gate and opened up a 36 point lead by the end of the first quarter . Los Angeles was led by Chris Paul , who put up 27 points , seven assists , one rebound and two steals in 31 minutes . Clarkson finished with 17 points and eight rebounds , and Lance Stephenson had 16 points on 6 - of - 7 shooting off the bench . The Lakers , who shot under 44 percent from the field , were led by 27 points and seven assists from Chris Paul . DeAndre Jordan added six points , 17 rebounds and one block on 2 - of - 3 shooting , including 1 - of - 3 from behind the arc . Jordan Clarkson dropped 17 points on 7 - of - 16 shooting to lead the bench in scoring . Lance Stephenson continues to impress with his newest team and added 16 points , five rebounds and a steal in 22 minutes off the bench . Jamal Crawford ( 15 ) , Jamal Crawford ( 15 ) , and Roy Hibbert ( 12 ) round out the Los Angeles starters who scored in double figures , while Lance Stephenson scored 16 points in 22 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Lakers host the Celtics on Saturday . The Lakers welcome the Nuggets to Los Angeles , also on Sunday .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the host Washington Wizards , 112 - 100 , at Verizon Center on Monday . Washington have been one of the best home teams in the NBA this season , but this was a tough task against a feisty San Antonio team . The Spurs dominated from start to finish , as they led for over 42 minutes of this game and led by at least six points for the entirety of the second half . The second quarter is where they spread it out , outscoring the Wizards , 31 - 22 . Rebounding was the glaring difference in the game , with San Antonio wining that battle , 52 - 18 . They also dominated the points off turnover differential , winning that , 31 - 12 . The Wizards ( 14 - 3 ) have been thriving off their elite defense lately , but the offense was key in this victory . LaMarcus Aldridge was the player of the game , as he led the Wizards with 24 points and seven rebounds . Tony Parker finished second on the team with 20 points , five assists and three blocks . Otto Porter provided 14 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Jonathan Simmons was a nice spark off the bench , dropping 15 points in 17 minutes . On deck for Washington is a home matchup against the Sacramento Kings on Sunday . The Spurs ( 14 - 3 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 17 tries . John Wall led the way for Washington , as he tallied 21 points , three rebounds and five assists . Tony Parker was second on the team , with 20 points , three assists and two steals . Otto Porter provided 14 points , eight rebounds and three assists .

The Indiana Pacers ( 19 - 15 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 21 - 13 ) 100 - 103 on Wednesday at the American Airlines Arena in Miami Florida . The Heat did most of their damage in the first half , out - scoring the Celitcs 52 - 52 . They were able to finish the game shooting 39 percent from the field and 23 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 38 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were also able to force the Heat into 7 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Heat were led by Chris Bosh , who went 12 - for - 29 from the field and 2 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score 32 points , to go along with seven rebounds and two assists . It was far - and - away his best game of the year so far , as it marked a new season - high in points , along with being his first double - double of the year . He 's averaging just 5 points and seven rebounds on the year . Also playing a big factor in the win was Monta Ellis . Ellis went 8 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding nine assists . He was able to get to the free throw line eight times and converted on all seven attempts . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise for the Pacers , as he 's averaging only 10 points per game so far this season . Monta Ellis also had a strong showing , finishing with 17 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) and nine assists . He 's now averaging 7 points , 4 rebounds and 5 assists on the year . The other starter to reach double figures in points was Ian Mahinmi , who posted 13 points ( 4 - 5 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 5 - 8 FT ) and nine rebounds in 20 minutes . Coming off the bench , Rodney Stuckey played well , going 3 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 12 points in 30 minutes . Jordan Deng had a solid showing off the bench , scoring 10 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 0 - 0 3Pt ) , to go along with nine rebounds and a steal . The Heat will look to keep the momentum going against the Detroit Pistons on Friday night .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 88 - 86 , at FedEx Forum on Monday . The recent form of these teams would have indicated a closer game , but Memphis took care of business in this wire - to - wire win . In fact , the Grizzlies led by at least seven points for the entirety of the second half , as the final 31 - point margin was their largest lead of the game . Memphis was very efficient on offense , shooting 36 percent from the field and 30 percent from three - point range . The turnover differential was huge as well , with the Grizzlies recording 13 assists to 12 turnovers , while the Trail Blazers committed 12 turnovers to 13 assists . Marc Gasol led the way for Portland , as he tallied 36 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Evan Turner was second on the team , providing 15 points and nine rebounds off the bench . JaMychal Green recorded a double - double , totaling 10 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . Portland has a decent chance to snap this slide in their next game , as they take on the Brooklyn Nets on Thursday . The Grizzlies ( 16 - 8 ) have now won six of their last six games , as they continue to battle for the top - spot in the east . Damian Lillard led the way for Memphis , as he tallied 19 points , three rebounds and two assists . Tony Allen was second on the team , as he accrued 15 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . Tony Turner tallied 15 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . Evan Turner came off the bench to provide 10 points and 10 rebounds .

The Portland Trail Blazers ( 8 - 3 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 5 - 4 ) 102 - 93 on Friday . Portland was able to secure a win for the 16th time in the last 21 games on the strength of a typically stellar effort from offensive linchpin Damian Lillard , along with strong performances from two of their best bench players . After a dead - even first period , Portland forged ahead in the second quarter to build a 18 - point lead by halftime . Both teams played relatively mistake - free basketball , with only 16 turnovers between them , but the Trail Blazers managed to stay a step ahead of the Pelicans on the night to secure the relatively comfortable victory . Lillard 's 24 points paced New Orleans , and he added four rebounds , seven assists and two steals . LaMarcus Aldridge was right behind with 22 points , nine rebounds , two assists and a steal . Wesley Matthews followed with 16 points , two rebounds and two assists . Matthews was next with 16 points , five rebounds and two assists . Ryan Anderson contributed 12 points , three rebounds and an assist . Ryan Anderson paced the New Orleans bench with 12 points , three rebounds and an assist . They head to Sacramento to take on the Kings on Sunday night . Portland was paced by Anthony Davis , who supplied 22 points , 11 rebounds , three assists , three steals and three blocks . Wesley Matthews followed with 16 points , two assists and a rebound . Wesley Matthews contributed 16 points , five rebounds and two assists . Ryan Anderson was next with 12 points , three rebounds , an assist and a block . Ryan Anderson rounded out a productive night for the starting five with 12 points , three rebounds and an assist . The Pelicans remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are slotted in the sixth seed as well . They 're home again on Wednesday night to take on the Sacramento Kings .
The host Indiana Pacers defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 115 - 108 on Tuesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse . Despite Indiana ( 2 - 2 ) leading for nearly the entirety of the game , the Lakers ( 1 - 3 ) kept it close all night long . The only leads for the Lakers were when they started up 40 and when they took a late lead in the fourth quarter at 106 - 104 . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , as both teams took 28 attempts , with the Pacers making four more than the Lakers . Rim protection was huge as well , as Indiana swatted away eight shots to the Lakers two . Los Angeles leaned on their bench in this game and nearly pulled out an upset win . Lou William was the leading scorer for the Lakers off the bench , dropping 19 points and five assists . Second on the team was Jordan Clarkson , who scored his 15 off the bench as well . Luol Deng and D'Angelo Russell were the only starters in double figures , as they combined for just 21 points . Larry Nance Jr. set a career - high in steals , as he recorded 11 points , five rebounds and six steals in the defeat . Paul George led the team in scoring , as he tallied 30 points , seven rebounds and four steals . In fact , George scored the final 12 points for the Pacers in their tight win . Monta Ellis was second on the team , with his 17 points , three assists and two blocks . Jeff Teague scored just nine points on 4 - for - 15 shooting , but provided six points and six rebounds as the starting point guard . C.J . Miles also scored 16 points off the bench . The Lakers road trip continues on Wednesday , as they play the Atlanta Hawks . The Lakers return to action on Friday , when they host the Memphis Grizzlies for their next game .

The Brooklyn Nets ( 1 - 1 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 0 - 3 ) 102 - 90 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Detroit . The Pistons shot the ball well in this one , going 48 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 42 percent from the floor and just 6 percent from deep . The Nets also out - rebounded the Pistons 48 - 41 , only furthering their advantage in this one . The Nets were led by Kevin Garnett , who went 7 - for - 12 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the free throw line to score 18 points , while also adding 14 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 47 points and 10 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 18 points and 14 rebounds on the year . Deron Smith was able to contribute a double - double of his own with 14 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 2 - 8 FT ) , nine rebounds and five assists . The only other Hornet to reach double - digit points was Kentavious Caldwell-Pope , who scored 10 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) . The Nets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Pistons will be at home against the New York Knicks on Wednesday .

Speights was able to get to the free throw line nine times and converted on six of those attempts . He 's now averaging 28 points and 18 rebounds on the season . It was n't his best day shooting the ball , but he still did enough to help secure the victory , even with both Dwyane Wade ( hamstring ) and Luol Deng ( calf ) sitting out with injuries . The Utah Jazz defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 88 - 83 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Jazz ( 40 - 24 ) picked up their 40th win of the season and continue to rise in the Western Conference behind stellar play from Rudy Gobert . The elite center for Utah tipped in the buzzer beater for the win over the Kings on Sunday , and came up with another ridiculous stat line on Monday , as he finished with 15 points , 15 rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks across 36 minutes of action . The Pelicans simply could not find a rhythm shooting the ball , and finished with a season worst 36 percent as a unit . They allowed multiple Jazz scoring runs and did not have a single lead throughout the entirety of the game . The Pelicans picked up their first win with DeMarcus Cousins on Sunday , but were unable to do the same on the second game of a back - to - back . The Sacramento Kings ( 32 - 48 ) defeated the Sacramento Thunder ( 54 - 26 ) 114 - 112 on Thursday . The statistics would indicate a Sacramento win , but they simply couldnt do enough to pull out a big road victory . The Kings outshot the Kings 48 percent to 48 percent and outrebounded them 40 to 44 . Oklahoma City also dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 40 boards to the Thunder 40 . The Kings have been playing competitively lately , but this was not one of those games . This sort of performance exemplifies which directions these two franchises are going right now and Oklahoma City is just what they need to get some momentum going . Rudy Gay was fantastic in this game , as he led the team with 31 points and eight rebounds in the win . Seth Curry had one of his best games of the year , as he tallied 20 points , three assists and two rebounds in the loss . Serge Ibaka also had a nice game off the bench , as he scored 14 points to go along with eight boards . This will be a fluent situation , but the rookie has definitely earned more playing time with a performance like this . It 's a good thing the Kings starters got some rest here , as they play the second half of a back - to - back set against the Sacramento Kings on Saturday . The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Thursday , while the Kings will be at home against the New York Knicks on Saturday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 106 - 93 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Sunday . Indiana got out to a hot start in the first quarter and they never looked back after that . In fact , the Pacers led by 10 after the first quarter , as they never relinquished the lead from there . Defense was key for Indiana , as they held New Orleans to 46 percent from the field ( 34 - of - 83 ) and 47 percent from three - point range ( 7 - of - 39 ) . The Pelicans shot 53 percent from the field and 45 percent from three - point range on their end , despite being dominated in rebounding and second - chance points . The Pacers ( 21 - 33 ) are battling for the eight - seed in the west and overtime losses like this are devastating for that pursuit . George Hill was the player of the game , as he accumulated 17 points , three rebounds and nine assists on 6 - of - 11 shooting . George Hill was the lone bright spot for the Pelicans , as he led the team with 16 points and three rebounds . Alexis Ajinca was the only other Pelican in double figures , as he amassed 14 points , seven rebounds and two assists . The Pelicans ( 27 - 26 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to slide down the standings . George Hill led the way for New Orleans , as he tallied 17 points , three rebounds , nine assists and two steals on 6 - of - 11 shooting . George Hill was second on the team , collecting 17 points , three rebounds and nine assists . Alexis Ajinca got a rare start and totaled 14 points , 7 rebounds and three assists .

The Mavericks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Grizzlies 25 - 26 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 38 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks were able to force the Grizzlies into 12 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this game . The Mavericks were led by Dirk Nowitzki in this one . He went 7 - for - 13 from the field and 4 - for - 4 from the free throw line to score 20 points , while also adding five rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 9 rebounds . He 's now pushed his season averages to 22 points and 4 rebounds per game . Mike Conley was the other starter to reach double figures in points . He finished with 14 points ( 3 - 8 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 7 - 8 FT ) and three assists in 31 minutes . He 's now averaging 20 points and 5 assists on the season . The other starter to reach double figures in points was Matt Barnes , who posted 11 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) . Zaza Pachulia had one of his better games of the season , as he posted 10 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 18 rebounds over 34 minutes . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Grizzlies will travel to Chicago to play the Bulls on Wednesday .

This was a much needed win for the Mavericks , who came into this one losers of six of their last eight games and in danger of slipping out of the top eight in the West with another loss . He 's combined for 35 points and 26 rebounds over his last two games , pushing his season averages to 31 points and 7 assists per game . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the Utah Jazz on Friday , while the Trail Blazers will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Boston Hawks defeated the Boston Celtics , 102 - 101 , at TD Garden on Friday . The Celtics ( 0 - 1 ) invested heavily into their star two - guard Isaiah Thomas in the offseason , inking the 21 - year old to a five - year , $ 139 million contract . He began paying immediate dividends on that hefty sum Wednesday , tallying a game - high 23 points and adding eight rebounds , a assist , a steal and a block . The rest of the starting five also posted double digits in the scoring column , and although they committed 11 turnovers , the Celtics ( 0 - 1 ) were able to keep the Celtics ( 0 - 1 ) to a 36 percent success rate from the field and a 31 percent tally from three - point range . The Utah Jazz defeated the Orlando Magic , 114 - 107 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday . The Jazz ( 26 - 16 ) have a well - earned defensive reputation , but they did a fine job lighting up the scoreboard on Saturday as well after falling behind early . All five members of their first unit tallied double digits in the scoring column , and Utah shot a stellar 49 percent from the field overall . The Magic ( 17 - 25 ) did a pretty good job of keeping pace , though , as they emerged from the first quarter with a 42 - 29 lead and managed a 46 percent success rate from the floor . However , Utah 's vaunted defense asserted its dominance following their disastrous first 12 minutes , limiting Orlando to just 65 points over the last three quarters . Elfrid Payton led all scorers with 28 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , nine assists , two steals and a block . Aaron Gordon went for 21 points , four boards , two assists and a steal . Nikola Vucevic could n't quite duplicate his standout effort from Friday night versus the Suns , but did contribute a solid 15 points , eight rebounds , three assists and three steals . Serge Ibaka overcame a questionable designation due to a shoulder injury to take the floor and tally 13 points , five rebounds and two assists . Jodie Meeks notched a spot start in place of Evan Fournier ( foot ) and collected 12 points , six assists , three rebounds and a steal . Jeff Green led the bench with 11 points and five rebounds . Gordon Hayward paced the Magic with 23 points , seven assists , five rebounds and a steal . Rudy Gobert was next with a monster 19 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and two blocks . Derrick Favors registered 17 points , six rebounds and an assist . George Hill and Rodney Hood turned in matching 14 - point efforts , with the former also dishing out seven assists and recording two steals , and the latter posting four rebounds and two assists . Joe Ingles and Alec Burks led the second unit with a pair of eight - point tallies . The Magic continue their road trip with a Monday afternoon showdown against the Denver Nuggets , while the Jazz travel to Phoenix to take on the Suns on Monday evening .

The Chicago Bulls ( 42 - 28 ) defeated the Toronto Raptors ( 41 - 28 ) in a wild Eastern Conference first - round playoff series Wednesday at United Center , 108 - 92 . The shorthanded Bulls led wire - to - back as they built up a 9 - point lead in the first quarter and never looked back . They took a 21 - point lead into halftime and never led by fewer than six points in the second half . The Bulls shot 53 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors shot 38 percent from the floor and only 40 percent from beyond the arc . Nikola Mirotic led the Bulls in scoring with 29 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 3 - 11 3Pt ) , to go with 11 rebounds , four blocks and one assist in 32 minutes . Mike Dunleavy added 21 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , along with two assists , three rebounds and two steals , in 25 minutes . Patrick Patterson was solid off the bench , with 17 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) , five rebounds , one assist , two steals and one block , in 37 minutes . The Raptors will face the second night of a back - to - back as they travel to Houston to take on the Rockets on Saturday . The Bulls will look for their second straight win when they take on the Bulls on Sunday .
The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 119 - 108 , at Staples Center on Sunday . The Lakers ( 4 - 3 ) notched their third straight win and remain undefeated at home after another strong performance by their young , talented core . Los Angeles built upon an eight - point first quarter lead in the second period , where a series of scoring runs capped off the first half . The Suns made the game a heated contest in the fourth quarter . Devin Booker buried a 10 - foot jump shot with 6:39 left in the final period and drew a foul , sinking a free throw to pull the game within one point . The Lakers were able to outlast the Phoenix comeback attempt and did not let up their lead , even after it dwindled to just one possession . Nick Young and D'Angelo Russell nailed much needed back - to - back three pointers to put the game out of reach and secure the rest of the victory from the charity stripe . Devin Booker had a standout performance , as his sophomore season continues where he left off from his rookie year . Booker finished with 39 points , seven assists and three rebounds on 13 - of - 29 shooting . T.J. Warren added 22 points , while Eric Bledsoe finished with 19 points , two assists and two boards . Nick Young provided his best game of the young season with 22 points and seven rebounds , in addition to three buckets from behind the arc . Jordan Clarkson and Lou Williams were impressive off the bench , adding a combined 32 points on 13 - of - 28 shooting in 26 minutes and 30 minutes , respectively . Julius Randle had the most well - rounded game for the Lakers on his way to 18 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal . Both teams play on Tuesday , as the Suns host the Portland Trail Blazers , while the Lakers host the San Antonio Spurs .

They also shot better in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 46 percent from the floor and just 38 percent from beyond the arc . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 28 points and 21 rebounds per game . Coming close to a triple - double , Manu Ginobili finished with 12 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , seven assists and three rebounds . The Sixers ( 3 - 10 ) may sport the worst record in the league , but they may be one of the feistiest cellar dwellers in the history of the NBA . Philadelphia has kept their competitive spirit thriving despite the disappointing season , and has often played as if they 're capable of beating virtually any team in the NBA on the right night . The 76ers ( 4 - 10 ) were led by Joel Embiid , who celebrated his raising of his minutes limit by scoring a game - high 26 points , which he supplemented with seven rebounds , two assists , two blocks and a block . The Sixers ( 4 - 10 ) were once again led by Joel Embiid , who celebrated the raising of his minutes limit by putting together a 26 - point , seven - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two blocks and two steals . Bledsoe was a distant second with 8 points , 11 assists , eight rebounds and two steals . Alan Williams supplied a 12 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included a pair of blocks . Gerald Henderson was productive in a reserve role as well with 11 points , five boards , an assist and three steals . Nik Stauskas 's 14 points led the bench , and Hollis Thompson was also productive in a reserve role with 14 points . The 76ers fall to 3 - 10 and second place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Monday .
