The Houston Rockets dominated the Los Angeles Lakers 134 - 95 Wednesday at Target Center . This game appeared to be over after the first quarter , as the Lakers ' ( 10 - 14 ) leaky defense had no answered for the Rockets ' ( 15 - 7 ) high - powered offensive attack , as Houston won the quarter 43 - 27 . And while Los Angeles managed to pull closer before halftime , the Rockets absolutely poured it on in the second half . Houston was led by shooting guard Eric Gordon , who has really adjusted to his new role off the bench , as he scored a game - high 26 points in just 24 minutes on a scorching 9 - of - 13 from the field . Early MVP-candidate James Harden was not too far behind , scoring 25 points on top of eight rebounds , six assists and four steals . To round off a terrific performance from the Rockets ' backcourt players , Patrick Beverley put together his best performance since returning from injury , recording 10 points , 12 assists , seven rebounds and three steals in 32 minutes . As a team , the Rockets made a living at the 3 - point line , shooting an impressive 27 - of - 36 from long range . For the Lakers , it was a night to forget , as the team shot a dreadful 39 percent from the field and 25 percent from behind the arc . Julius Randle led the way with a double - double of 21 points and 10 rebounds in 29 minutes , while Lou Williams continued to campaign for a Sixth Man of the Year award , posting an efficient 24 points in 25 minutes . Meanwhile , Jordan Clarkson made his first start at point guard this season and posted a lowly seven points on just 3 - of - 13 shooting from the field . Up next , the Rockets will head to Oklahoma City on Friday to take on the Thunder , while the Lakers will head home Wednesday to play the Suns .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 113 - 107 , at TD Garden on Friday . These two teams came into this matchup tied for the most wins in NBA history and the Lakers were able to pull ahead of the Lakers with this victory . The second quarter was the difference in the game , as Boston outscored Los Angeles , 33 - 21 . Defense was also key for the Celtics , as they held the Lakers to 39 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range . Boston shot 48 percent on their end and recorded 28 assists on their 39 made baskets . The Lakers ( 17 - 36 ) have now lost 10 of their last 12 games , as they ca n't get out of their own way . Lou Williams led Los Angeles in scoring , as he provided 21 points , four rebounds and four assists off the bench . D'Angelo Russell led the starters , collecting 20 points , six rebounds and six assists . Nick Young was the only other starter with more than four points , as he dropped 17 points to add to his three rebounds and three assists . Larry Nance Jr. recorded an 18 - point , 11 - rebound double - double off the bench . The Celtics ( 32 - 18 ) have rode Isaiah Thomas ' absurd fourth quarter numbers all season and he was at it yet again here . Thomas scored 17 of his 38 points in the fourth quarter , to go along with two rebounds and four assists . Al Horford flirted with a triple - double , accumulating 11 points , eight rebounds and eight assists . Jae Crowder was second on the team in scoring , totaling 18 points , six rebounds and two steals . Marcus Smart was a spark plug off the bench , accruing nine points , seven assists and five steals .
The Golden State Warriors ( 64 - 7 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 43 - 27 ) 114 - 98 on Wednesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Going into halftime tied at 45 , it looked as if this was going to be a grind - it - out , close finish . Instead , the Warriors were able to out - score the Clippers 33 - 26 in the final quarter to secure the six - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 42 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Warriors were also able to force the Clippers into 21 turnovers , while only committing 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson . Curry went 12 - for - 23 from the field and 4 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 33 points , while also adding five assists and three blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 43 rebounds over his last two games . Draymond Green was able to contribute a double - double of his own , finishing with 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) , 12 rebounds and four assists . The Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 3 - 6 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 6 - 5 ) 125 - 99 on Sunday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Despite a fierce comeback by the Lakers , who out - scored the Lakers 58 - 48 in the second half , the Lakers were able to hold off the late comeback and secure the win . The Timberwolves were the superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 47 percent from the floor and 33 percent from deep . This marked the fifth straight loss for the Lakers , as they look to improve their draft positioning for the 2015 NBA Draft . The Timberwolves got a huge contribution off the bench , as Adreian Bjelica went 9 - for - 15 from the field and 1 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 24 points , while also adding eight rebounds and three steals . The only other Laker to reach double figures in points was Luol Deng , who finished with 13 points ( 2 - 5 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 7 - 7 FT ) in 24 minutes . Rubio came just shy of a triple - double , as he finished with 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , 10 assists and four rebounds . The Lakers had six players reach double figures in points . Nemanja Bjelica was the only starter to score in double figures , as he ended with 10 points ( 4 - 5 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt ) and two rebounds . The Timberwolves ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 1 ) ) defeated the San Antonio Spurs ( 0 - 1 ) Wednesday by a score of 107 - 92 at the AT & T Center in Los Angeles . The Clippers were able to get off to a hot start , but were able to out - score the Spurs 30 - 18 in the first quarter to seal the victory in front of their home crowd . They were the superior shooters , going an impressive 51 percent from the field and 56 percent from the three - point line , while the Spurs went 37 percent from the floor and 30 percent from deep . The Clippers had all five starters reach double figures in points . Chris Paul led the way , going 13 - for - 20 from the floor and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 32 points , while also adding six assists . He temporarily left the game in the first quarter after straining his hamstring , but he came back in the second and played through the injury to bring the Clippers to a huge win . Paul went on to finish with 32 points ( 13 - 20 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , six assists and seven steals , while Leonard added 18 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 6 FT ) of his own , to go along with 11 rebounds . It marked his third double - double over his last four games . Coming off the bench , Jamal Crawford shot 4 - for - 10 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from beyond the arc to score 17 points . The Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Thursday , while the Spurs will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 109 - 87 , at Toyota Center on Wednesday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Rockets led for the final 42 minutes and held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . The Rockets shot 49 percent from the field and 51 percent from three - point range , while holding the Mavericks to 41 percent from the field and 32 percent from long range . Houston also abused Dallas on the boards , 48 - 32 . Wesley Matthews led the team in scoring , as he dropped 26 points on 8 - of - 22 shooting . Harrison Barnes was the only other Maverick in double figures , as he totaled 20 points , four rebounds and three steals . Montrezl Harrell and Patrick Beverley each scored 11 points a piece off the bench . Harrison Barnes led Dallas in scoring , as he accrued 20 points , four rebounds and three steals . Harrison Barnes was second on the team , finishing with 20 points and four rebounds . Deron Williams accumulated 15 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Eric Gordon was a huge spark off the bench , providing 18 points , three rebounds and three assists on 6 - of - 14 from three - point range . Dallas will look to get out of this slide on Monday against the scorching - hot Miami Heat .

The Bulls got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Cavaliers 57 - 49 in the first half . The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Indiana Pacers 100 - 99 Tuesday at AT & T Center . Monday 's contest marked the return of superstar Kawhi Leonard , who had been out with a concussion , for the Spurs ( 46 - 13 ) , and his impact was felt immediately . San Antonio opened up a early lead and managed to hang on throughout the contest , and it was thanks in large part to yet another great performance from Leonard . Leonard finished with a game - high 31 points in 11 - of - 22 shooting to go along with 11 rebounds and two assists in 34 minutes . And it was Leonard and the other four starters that managed to carry the team , as those five ended up scoring 78 of the team 's 100 points . In the end , it was the Spurs ' hot shooting from outside that won them Monday 's contest , as they shot a scorching 31 percent as a team from behind the arc . For the Pacers ( 31 - 30 ) , the loss ended a three - game winning streak , and they did not have the same sort of success from three . The team finished shooting just 30 percent from behind the arc , with the starting five going just 3 - of - 6 from deep . San Antonio was equally unsuccessful from the free throw line Monday , where they shot 19 - of - 32 ( 72 percent ) from the charity stripe . C.J . Miles led the way for Indiana with 19 points , while veteran David Lee posted a 18 - point , 5 - rebound double - double . The team 's bench , however , accounted for an impressive 43 points .
The Boston Celtics defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 117 - 108 , at TD Garden on Friday . The Celtics ( 23 - 14 ) learned earlier in the afternoon that they 'd play without Avery Bradley , who 'd tallied a team - high 26 points on Friday versus the Sixers . Marcus Smart entered the starting five in his stead and did n't disappoint , producing 22 points , six assists , five rebounds , two steals and a block . However , the high - scoring affair was a showcase for two of the game 's brightest stars , as Isaiah Thomas ( 38 points ) and Anthony Davis ( 36 points , 15 rebounds , two assists , two blocks ) put on a spectacular show on opposite ends of the court . Ultimately , a 36 - point third quarter by Boston did in the Pelicans ( 14 - 24 ) , which suffered their 13th road loss in 17 games this season . Langston Galloway was actually the second leading scorer on New Orleans in a bench role , posting 20 points , four rebounds and an assist over 22 minutes . Jrue Holiday was next with 13 points , five assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block . Rookie Buddy Hield totaled nine points , five rebounds and three assists , with all three of his baskets coming from three - point range . Donatas Motiejunas made his season debut and supplied 11 points , five boards , four assists and a steal over 20 minutes . Thomas added three rebounds , two steals and a block to his game - high scoring total , and was also notably 6 - of - 11 from behind the arc . Al Horford and Jae Crowder had matching eight - point efforts , with the former adding eight assists , seven rebounds and a pair of blocks , and the latter providing six rebounds , two assists and a steal . Gerald Green paced the bench with 15 points and three boards , while Kelly Olynyk offered 12 points , four assists and four rebounds in a reserve role as well . The Pelicans continue on their trek through the Northeast with a visit to the New York Knicks on Monday night , while the Celtics tangle with the Toronto Raptors north of the border on Tuesday evening .

It was a much - needed victory for the Raptors as they came into this game tied with Dallas for the eighth seed and only a half - game behind seventh place Houston . Their opponent , the Pacers , despite their record , have been a formidable foe over their last seven games , winning won four - of - seven , as well as their last two in a row . Indiana started out terribly slow , with a 25 - point first quarter , but managed to cut the deficit to one by half time . The teams matched each other in the third quarter , leaving the fourth to decide the game . Toronto used a 90 run , culminating at the 8:30 mark in the fourth quarter , in order to create some separation , which they were then able to maintain until the final buzzer . The Raptors used a balanced team effort to emerge victorious , as four players scored 13 or more points , while the team played solid defense and rebounded well . The San Antonio Spurs ( 27 - 16 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 18 - 24 ) 109 - 99 on Saturday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Spurs road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Nuggets had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 10 - 2 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , San Antonio had managed a paltry three wins in 16 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game . They 'd also struggled offensively the majority of the year , often failing to even reach 75 points over the first 26 games of the season . However , the light has seemingly come on for San Antonio , and their side of the scoreboard , over their last two outings . After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma City on Wednesday , the Spurs roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting a stellar 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc . They also managed 42 of their points off 38 Denver turnovers . That helped them overcome 13 turnovers , as did their defense , which forced the same amount from the Nuggets . The Nuggets were led by Arron Afflalo , who tallied 21 points , two assists , four rebounds and three steals . Tim Duncan followed with 16 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Jusuf Nurkic and Wilson Chandler followed with matching 16 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block , and the latter furnishing five rebounds , seven assists , two steals and a block . Jusuf Nurkic pitched in with 10 points , nine rebounds and two assists . Denver remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division . They 're home against the San Antonio Spurs on Saturday night .

Pau Gasol had his way with the Pistons ' bigs . He went 13 - of - 18 from the field to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and three blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 36 points and 19 rebounds . Drummond , on the other hand , finished with 31 points ( 13 - 18 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) of his own , while adding 12 rebounds . It was his first double - double of the season , pushing his season averages to 10 points and 36 rebounds on the year . Marcus Morris was the other player to reach double - digit points , as he finished with 18 . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Pistons will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Houston Rockets ( 29 - 13 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 15 - 28 ) 110 - 98 on Saturday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Rockets road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Pacers had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 10 - 4 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , Houston had managed a paltry three wins in 18 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game . They 'd also struggled offensively the majority of the year , often failing to even reach 67 points over the first 21 games of the season . However , the light has seemingly come on for Houston , and their side of the scoreboard , over their last two outings . After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma City on Wednesday , the Rockets roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting a stellar 51 percent from the field and 39 percent from beyond the arc . They also managed 43 of their points off 29 Indiana turnovers . As it turned out , they needed every one of those buckets before all was said and done , with the Pacers coming on strong with a 30 - point fourth quarter to make things close until the final seconds . Houston was once again led by standout guard James Harden , who tallied 45 points , along with seven assists , a rebound , four steals and a block . C.J . Miles was right behind him with 17 points , six assists , a rebound and a steal . Dwight Howard was next with a 14 - point , 17 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a block . Solomon Hill paced the reserves with 13 points , three assists , three rebounds and two steals . The Pacers are currently in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and they retain a rather tenuous hold on the eighth seed in the conference by one - and - one - half games over the Utah Jazz . They now head to Philadelphia to face off against the Sixers on Wednesday night .

The Pistons ( 16 - 52 ) have been a different team over recent weeks and blowout wins like this show just how good they can be . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope led the starters in scoring , as he tallied 20 points , eight rebounds and two assists . Reggie Smith was a huge spark off the bench , providing 15 points , eight assists and three steals . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope also scored 20 points , adding eight rebounds and two assists to his tally . Jason Richardson led the bench with 14 points , five rebounds and two assists .
The Spurs have been dominant at home over recent seasons and wins like this show just how scary they can be . They won each of the first three quarters by at least eight points , as they took a 27 - point lead into the fourth quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , with San Antonio dishing out 19 assists to just 13 turnovers , while Dallas committed 15 turnovers to just 17 assists . Kawhi Leonard led the Mavericks in scoring , as he tallied 23 points , two rebounds and four assists . LaMarcus Aldridge was the only other starter with more than four points , as he tallied 14 points and 10 rebounds . Kawhi Leonard led the team in scoring , dropping 23 points . LaMarcus Aldridge contributed 14 points , 10 rebounds and two steals . Patty Mills was huge off the bench , providing 16 points and four rebounds . The Mavericks ( 28 - 25 ) have been dominant at home all season , but this was a devastating loss in a game they were supposed to win . Kawhi Leonard was the player of the game , as he accumulated 23 points , two rebounds and three assists . LaMarcus Aldridge was second on the team , with 14 points , 10 rebounds and two steals . Dirk Nowitzki amassed 10 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Charlie Villanueva was a nice spark off the bench , providing 13 points , six rebounds and three assists . On deck for Dallas is a home matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 3 - 5 ) defeated the LA Clippers ( 5 - 2 ) 92 - 94 on Wednesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis during game five of the first round of the Western Conference playoffs . The Clippers got off to a hot start in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 26 - 25 in the first quarter alone . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this one , going 44 percent from the field and 18 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 41 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Blake Griffin backed his words up , as he finished with a team - high of 24 points ( 9 - 19 FG . 0 - 0 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , to go along with 12 rebounds , two assists and one steal over 33 minutes . He 's been a force lately for the Grizzlies , averaging 20 points over his last five games . The only other Clipper to reach double figures in points was Jamal Crawford , who came off the bench for 13 points ( 2 - 7 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) and one assists in 20 minutes . Marc Jordan also reached double figures with 13 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 FT ) and 12 rebounds . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Wednesday .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 15 - 29 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 16 - 32 ) 122 - 73 on Sunday at American Airlines Arena in Dallas . The Mavericks got off to a quick start Wednesday , out - scoring the Lakers 29 - 22 in the first quarter alone . The Mavericks were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went just 38 percent from the floor and a meager 14 percent from beyond the arc . The Mavericks did force the Lakers into 11 turnovers though , while committing just 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Mavericks were led by the duo of Justin Anderson and Justin Anderson . Anderson went 5 - for - 11 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding two assists . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming one rebound short of a double - double , Dirk Nowitzki finished with 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , five rebounds and one steal . He 's now averaging 11 points and 5 rebounds on the year . The other starter to reach double figures in points was Dirk Nowitzki . Dirk went just 5 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 13 points in 20 minutes . The Mavericks ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 42 - 16 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 13 - 45 ) 101 - 97 on Wednesday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Despite a fierce comeback by the Timberwolves , who out - scored the Grizzlies 58 - 48 in the second half , the Timberwolves were able to hold them off and steal the victory on the road . The Grizzlies were able to out - rebound the Timberwolves 43 - 35 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Grizzlies were led by Marc Gasol , who scored 27 points ( 11 - 14 FG , 5 - 9 FT ) , while also adding 11 rebounds and two blocked shots . The 25 points were a new season - high for him and a nice surprise for the Grizzlies , as he 's averaging only 5 points per game so far this season . Mike Conley was able to record a double - double of his own , finishing with 13 points ( 3 - 12 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) and 10 assists . It was the most minutes he 's played all season , and he cashed in on the extra playing time . Ricky Green scored 13 points ( 3 - 5 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) and grabbed four rebounds , while Tony Allen and Tony Allen reached double figures as well with 11 and 11 points respectively . The Timberwolves ' next game will be on the road against the Portland Trail Blazers on Thursday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Thursday .

They also shot better in this game , going 52 percent from the field , while the Lakers went just 45 percent . The 21 points were a new season - high for him , while the double - double was his third in the last four games . The Toronto Raptors took down the host Utah Jazz on Friday , 104 - 98 . The Raptors ( 21 - 8 ) are in second place in the East and have been separating from the lower seeds in recent weeks . On Friday , the team squeezed out a narrow win against the Jazz thanks to a strong fourth quarter push . The Raptors trailed by two points heading into the fourth but outscored the Jazz 32 - 24 in the quarter . Toronto was led by star point guard Kyle Lowry , who scored 36 points on 15 - of - 20 shooting . The lights - out Lowry was complemented by 24 from shooting guard DeMar DeRozan . 'The Quadruple Capital ' added six rebounds and four steals on the defensive end . The Jazz ( 18 - 13 ) appear to be in a bit of a slump , having now lost three straight games . The team lost its second straight on a fourth quarter collapse , as the team once again led heading into the game 's final quarter . Center Rudy Gobert once again played strong basketball , scoring 13 points on 5 - of - 7 shooting and pulling down 14 rebounds . Forward DeMar DeRozan also scored 24 , but shot just 10 - of - 24 . The team struggled to find its shot , however , hitting just 44 percent on the night . Containing Joel Hill proved difficult for the Jazz as well , as he pulled down a team - high 14 rebounds . Both teams will enter the All-Star Break .
The Lakers benefited from balanced production across their roster , as all five starters , and two reserves , hit double digits in the scoring column . The offensive proficiency led to a 50 percent success rate from the field , and their defense managed to elicit 9 turnovers from the Lakers . Gorgui Dieng led the starting five with a 19 - point , 6 - rebound double - double and Jordan Clarkson registered 16 . Jordan Clarkson posted 16 points in 35 minutes off the bench . Kobe Bryant led the way with 38 points on 10 - of - 21 shooting , and he added five rebounds , five assists and one steal . Jordan Clarkson matched Clarkson 's point total and added two assists , three rebounds and two steals . Karl-Anthony Towns totaled 14 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Shabazz Muhammad matched Towns 's scoring total and added three assists and a rebound . Shabazz Muhammad led the bench with 12 points , three rebounds , one assist and two steals . Ricky Rubio managed a 10 - point , 15 - assist double - double that also included two rebounds and one steal . Shabazz Muhammad led the second unit with 12 points , three rebounds and one assist . Shabazz Muhammad was productive in a reserve role as well , tallying 12 points , three rebounds , two steals and a block . Andrew Wiggins paced the Lakers with 30 points , four rebounds , one assist , two steal and two blocks . Williams contributed a 16 - point , 12 - rebound double - double that also included four assists , two steals and one block . Zach LaVine led the bench with 14 points , while Lou Williams paced the second unit with 20 points .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Indiana Pacers , 109 - 105 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Sixers ( 1 - 7 ) had taken the Pacers ( 4 - 5 ) to the limit just two nights prior before succumbing in overtime , 122 - 115 . However , their second consecutive foray into an extra period against Indiana went much better , culminating in Philadelphia 's first victory of the season . Joel Embiid led the way by playing a game - high 26 minutes and posting 25 points , seven rebounds , two assists and a block . While he shot just 33 percent ( 6 - of - 18 ) from the field , he successfully parlayed 12 of 14 visits to the free - throw line into points . The impressive third - year man helped spearhead a sizable advantage for the Sixers down low , as they outrebounded the Pacers by a 54 - 40 margin . Indiana was led by Paul George , who despite leaving the game in the first half temporarily with a left thumb sprain , totaled 26 points , nine rebounds , four assists and two steals . Monta Ellis was actually second in line despite coming off the bench , amassing 19 points , six rebounds , five assists and four steals over 36 minutes . C.J . Miles , who drew the start at shooting guard , turned in 12 points , four rebounds , an assist and a steal . Jeff Teague was modestly involved on offense over 35 minutes , supplying 13 points , four assists , a rebound and three steals . Thaddeus Young was the only other member of the starting five with double - digit scoring , supplying 10 points , four rebounds , three assists and two steals . The Sixers remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again on Friday night to face off with the New York Knicks .

The Thunder got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Thunder 31 - 21 in the first quarter alone . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Thunder went 40 percent from the floor and a meager 37 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder also out - rebounded the Thunder 51 - 48 , giving them an even greater advantage in the victory . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 22 points and 12 rebounds per game . Coming close to a triple - double , Jeff Teague finished with 11 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt ) , five rebounds and an assist . Al Horford led the way , posting 21 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , 13 rebounds and four blocked shots . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to be a force this season . Korver on the other hand went 4 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 11 points . It was his best offensive showing since back in mid - November , so it was good to see him turn things around . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Thunder will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .

The Pacers ( 29 - 28 ) came in to Tuesday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but were also running on fumes after two games in the previous three nights . Fatigue may have played a role in the first half , as the Wizards ( 34 - 21 ) built a 62 - 52 lead by halftime . The second half was much tighter , but Washington eventually pulled away on the strength of a highly productive night for their starting five . All first unit members hit double digits in the scoring column , and the Wizards managed to shoot 52 percent from the field overall , as well as a superb 52 percent on their 29 shots from behind the arc . The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 128 - 96 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Detroit leading for the first 60 minutes , this game was close throughout , as there were eight ties and eight lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 13 points . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with Cleveland winning that battle , 41 - 45 . They also stifled Detroit with their defense , holding the Pistons to 37 percent from the field and 21 percent from three - point range . Detroit also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than Detroit , while committing six less turnovers . The Cavaliers ( 44 - 22 ) had to play this game without Al Horford and Avery Bradley , as they did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal to hold off the Cavaliers . Iman Shumpert also had one of his best games of the season , totaling 18 points and five rebounds .
The host Los Angeles Lakers took down the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , 130 - 119 . Friday also marked the unveiling of Los Angeles 's new Shaquille O'Neal statue . Los Angeles ( 21 - 51 ) snapped a six - game losing streak on Friday , though it may not have been in their best interest . LA will lose its draft pick if it falls outside of the top three , and the Phoenix Suns remain on the Lakers ' tail for the second - worst record in the NBA . Still , there was a lot to like on Friday for Lakers fans . Guard Jordan Clarkson had a career - high 35 points while shooting 8 - of - 10 from three - point range . It was the team 's first overtime game of the season , and they seemed to respond well to the extra period . LA outscored Minnesota 29 - 10 in overtime , immediately establishing an eight - point advantage at the start of the OT . The team finished with staggering shooting splits of 52 percent from the field , 61 percent from three - point range , and 86 percent form the line . Minnesota ( 28 - 43 ) , meanwhile , extended its own losing streak to four games . While production from the starting five was solid , the Timberwolves struggled once again with finding points off the bench . The team saw just 23 bench points versus 39 from LA . There was no issue for Minny 's starters , though , as third - year forward Andrew Wiggins exploded for an efficient 36 points . Reigning Rookie of the Year Karl-Anthony Towns recorded a double - double with 25 points and 13 rebounds , and point guard Ricky Rubio had 19 points while dishing out a whopping 15 assists . The Timberwolves will visit Portland on Sunday , while LA will host the Blazers on Sunday .

Gorgui Dieng played 31 minutes in his second game since returning from a knee injury and scored 17 points . The Rockets will host the Brooklyn Nets on Tuesday . The Timberwolves will host the New York Knicks on Saturday .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 8 - 17 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 7 - 17 ) 120 - 119 on Friday . Phoenix has won two straight and seven of their last eight games . Injuries can be blamed for the depth of the Suns ' struggles this season , but they were never considered a team with much of a shot at a playoff spot in the stacked Western Conference . An argument could be made that the injuries the Suns continue to suffer are a blessing in disguise considering that it 's forcing the team to give their young talent run against top - flight teams . Eric Bledsoe led the way with a team - high 32 points , eight assists , three rebounds and two steals in 40 minutes . Tyson Chandler turned in a double - double of his own , putting up 14 points and 11 rebounds in 36 minutes . Off the bench , Leandro Barbosa scored a team - high 18 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) and grabbing three rebounds in 33 minutes off the bench . In the end , Chandler Davis did n't have his best game of the season , putting up a double - double of 14 points ( 4 - 10 FG ) and 11 rebounds in 44 minutes . Leandro Barbosa ( 18 ) , Langston Galloway ( 17 ) , and Jared Dudley ( 12 ) round out the Suns players who scored in double figures . Up next , the Pelicans will head home Wednesday to take on the Grizzlies , while the Suns will stay home Wednesday and play the Trail Blazers .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the host Philadelphia 76ers , 103 - 97 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday . Turnover have plagued these two teams all season and 45 combined turnovers in this game shows just that . The third quarter was the difference for Philadelphia , as they outscored Philadelphia , 18 - 24 . Rebounding was decisive , with the Thunder winning that battle , 53 - 43 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 13 more assists and committing three less turnovers . Russell Westbrook led the way for Philadelphia , as he tallied 32 points , 12 rebounds and nine assists . Sergio Rodriguez finished second on the team with 12 points , nine assists and three steals . Enes Kanter was huge off the bench , totaling 17 points and 12 rebounds . Russell Westbrook was the player of the game , as he accumulated 32 points , 12 rebounds and nine assists . Joel Embiid was second on the team with 20 points and seven rebounds . Enes Kanter was a huge spark off the bench , providing 17 points and 12 rebounds . On deck for the Sixers is a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday . The Sixers ( 0 - 1 ) were undefeated in their home building coming into this , but they did n't have enough in the arsenal to win this game . Russell Westbrook led the way , as he collected 32 points , 12 rebounds and nine assists . Enes Kanter was a beast off the bench , totaling 17 points and 14 rebounds on 7 - of - 14 shooting .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Denver Nuggets , 103 - 86 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Saturday . In a battle between two middling Eastern Conference teams , the Pistons were able to prevail , thanks to a big fourth quarter . Detroit outscored Denver 26 - 19 in the fourth quarter and held them to just 14 points through the first nine minutes of that period . The Pistons offense was on point all evening , as they shot 48 percent from the field , 73 percent from the free - throw line and 28 percent from three - point range . The rebounding differential was huge as well , with the Pistons recording 22 assists to nine turnovers , while the Nuggets committed 16 turnovers to just 15 assists . Andre Drummond recorded another triple - double , as he led the team with 19 points , 19 rebounds and three blocks . Marcus Morris had one of his best games of the year , totaling 21 points and nine rebounds . Danilo Gallinari led the starters in scoring , dropping 21 points and nine rebounds . Jusuf Nurkic was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 10 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Jon Leuer led the bench in scoring , as he dropped 15 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting . The Pistons will host the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday for their next game . The Nuggets ( 2 - 3 ) have been one of the biggest disappointments this season and it 's a wonder when they 'll pull out of this hole . Emmanuel Mudiay did all he could though , as he tallied 11 points , five rebounds and eight assists . Danilo Gallinari was the only starter in double figures , as he accumulated 16 points , three rebounds and two assists . Stanley Johnson led the bench with 12 points and three rebounds , while Ish Smith provided 11 points , eight rebounds and eight assists of his own .
The Denver Nuggets ( 11 - 14 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 9 - 15 ) 112 - 100 on Sunday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Nuggets road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Timberwolves had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 7 - 3 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , Denver 's Big Three of Karl-Anthony Towns , Andrew Wiggins and Andrew Wiggins combined for 57 points , and Denver proved to be too much for the visitors to handle . Minnesota was once again led by Andrew Wiggins , who managed 23 points , five assists , a rebound and two steals . Zach LaVine was next with 20 points , four rebounds , five assists , a steal and a block . Danilo Gallinari followed with 15 points , three rebounds and five assists . Will Barton was productive in a reserve role as well , tallying 14 points , seven rebounds and five assists . The Timberwolves remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are 11 games behind the eighth - seeded Dallas Mavericks . They head to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Monday night . Denver was paced by Karl-Anthony Towns , who supplied 19 points , 10 rebounds , an assist and three blocks . Danilo Gallinari was next with 20 points , four rebounds , five assists and a steal . Ricky Rubio followed with 13 points , nine assists and four rebounds . No other starter managed double - digit scoring , but Gorgui Dieng was the only other member of the starting five with double - digit points ( 11 ) .
The Golden State Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 2 - 4 ) by a score of 108 - 95 on Wednesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . The Warriors were the superior shooters in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 37 percent from the floor and just 25 percent from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies were able to out - rebound the Grizzlies 47 - 43 , giving them even more of an advantage and helping push them further to the victory . As has been the case all season , Stephen Curry did all he could to keep the Grizzlies in this game . He went 11 - for - 25 from the field and 8 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 32 points , while also adding 10 assists and four blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and seven assists over his last two games . He 's now averaging 23 points and 7 rebounds on the year . Mike Conley was able to notch a double - double of his own with 11 points ( 3 - 13 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) , nine assists and two steals . Despite suffering the loss , the Grizzlies did have six players reach double figures , including all five starters . Marc Gasol led the way , finishing with 21 points ( 7 - 23 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 7 - 10 FT ) , 15 rebounds and five blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 21 points and 10 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Vince Carter had a season - high of 16 points ( 5 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) in 26 minutes off the bench . He had just six points on Sunday , so it was a nice bounce back game for him . Notching a double - double , Draymond Green posted 16 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , 12 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 44 points and 4 assists over his last two games . Vince Carter was dialed in with his shot as well , going 5 - for - 7 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 16 points in 21 minutes . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while the Grizzlies will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Jrue Holiday ( 10 - 10 ) , 123 - 100 , on Tuesday at the Moda Center to take a commanding three - game lead in the series . Golden State led this game from the opening tip to the final buzzer as it cruised to another victory over Jrue Curry . The Warriors jumped out to a 25 - 26 lead after the first quarter and never looked back , as the lead reached as many as 37 points in the third quarter . The Pelicans were led by a big game from Stephen Curry , who had 40 points ( 10 - 29 FG , 7 - 18 3Pt , 13 - 14 FT ) , with five rebounds , nine assists and three blocks in 44 minutes . Anthony Davis had 29 points ( 11 - 22 FG ) , 15 rebounds , three assists , two steals and three blocks in 46 minutes . Tyreke Evans also stuffed the stats sheet , recording 19 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt ) , four rebounds , eight assists and three steals in 40 minutes . Draymond Green posted a double - double with 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , 17 rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block in 40 minutes . The Pelicans now head to Brooklyn to take on the Nets on Wednesday night . The Pelicans the next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 44 - 38 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 33 - 49 ) 107 - 99 on Tuesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nuggets 27 - 31 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went 43 percent from the floor and just 28 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers were also able to force the Nuggets into 20 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Nikola Jokic had his way with the Sixers ' bigs . He went 7 - for - 10 from the field and 3 - for - 3 from the free throw line to score 18 points , while also adding 13 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 48 points and 49 rebounds over those two games . Coming off the bench , Allen Crabbe added 16 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 7 FT ) , four rebounds and two steals in 37 minutes . The only other Nugget in double figures was Brian Crabbe , who had 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 23 minutes . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday , while the Nuggets will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 7 - 5 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 8 - 4 ) 103 - 88 on Sunday . This game was much closer than most people would have anticipated , as the Kings had their worst shooting night of the season . The still ended up prevailing with the victory despite shooting 11 - for - 37 from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Kings recorded 26 assists and 13 turnovers , while the Kings committed 14 turnovers to their 26 assists . It 's rare to see a team win a game when your turnovers and assists are nearly identical , but that was the case here . The Kings won the rebounding total 40 to 42 and that very well may have been the decisive factor . The Bulls were outscored by 12 in the fourth quarter and just couldnt hold off the Kings in overtime for a devastating loss . Jimmy Butler wasnt the hero , as he hit the game - winner . He went 11 - for - 18 from the field to accumulate 17 points , eight rebounds and three steals in the win . Rudy Gay also stuffed the stat sheet , as he accumulated 20 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Mike Dunleavy was the only other starter with more than 10 points , as he tallied 12 points , three assists and two steals in the defeat . The Bulls will look to exact revenge on Thursday in a rematch with the Kings for their next game .

The Hornets were the superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Hornets went 45 percent from the floor and 48 percent from beyond the arc . The Celtics were also able to force the Hornets into 16 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Mo Williams led the way for the Hornets , going 9 - for - 23 from the field and 6 - for - 13 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 28 points , to go along with seven rebounds and four assists as well . His scoring has dipped lately , scoring under his average in four straight games , but it did n't matter Wednesday , as the Celtics still secured the win . Avery Bradley was the only other Hornets ' player in double figures , scoring 14 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) , while also adding four rebounds and a steal . This game was close throughout , as there were nine ties and seven lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 13 points . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with Miami winning that battle , 44 - 51 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording six more assists and committing two less turnovers . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 51 - 27 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 38 - 40 ) 104 - 99 on Wednesday . The Bucks haven now clinched the Central Division title , but remain in a dogfight for the top seed in the Eastern Conference with the Toronto Raptors . With only a 3 - game lead coming in to the night , Milwaukee finds itself in a must - win scenario for the time being every time they take the court . Fortunately , they were back at full health Wednesday , with Zaza Pachulia leading the way with 19 points , 10 rebounds , two assists , and a steal over 31 minutes . Kevin Love was next with a 16 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included a pair of assists , a steal and a pair of blocks . Khris Middleton also continued his strong play , tallying 16 points , four rebounds , an assist and a pair of steals . Tristan Thompson paced the Milwaukee bench with a double - double that featured 11 points , 10 rebounds and four blocks . The Bucks remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and are 12 games behind the eighth - seeded Detroit Pistons . They head home to face the Toronto Raptors on Tuesday night . Milwaukee was spearheaded by a resurgent effort from Michael Carter-Williams , who managed a double - double with 21 points , nine rebounds , eight assists , a steal and a block . Zaza Pachulia was next with a 19 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , five steals and a block . Kevin Love pitched in with 16 points , 11 rebounds , a steal and two blocks . J.R. Mayo paced the Bucks bench with 11 points , two rebounds , two assists and a steal . Milwaukee remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and are slotted in the sixth seed as well . They head to Boston to take on the Celtics on Wednesday night .

The New York Knicks ( 4 - 5 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 4 - 4 ) 93 - 95 on Friday . Charlotte was coming off two losses to the Los Angeles Lakers and Portland Trail Blazers at the start of their current four - game Western Conference roadtrip . Kristaps Porzingis scored a team - high 10 points and grabbed 15 rebounds in 32 minutes . The Knicks have won five of their last six games as their schedule has softened over the last two weeks . They 'll host the Miami Heat on Saturday to complete their current back - to - back set . Charlotte has lost four straight games , and while their prospects this season look dire at the moment , the team has faced off against plenty of formidable teams in the early part of their schedule , leaving the door open to hope for more wins going forward . Just as a team like the Cleveland Cavaliers is sturggling to find consistency due to having so many new additions , the roster turnover for the Hornets can be pointed to as the source of their struggles thus far . Jeremy Afflalo ( ankle ) returned from a six - game absence and put up 12 points and one assist in 28 minutes off the bench . Charlotte is on a three - game win streak , but they have one of the worst record in the NBA . Carmelo Anthony led the way with 24 points and six rebounds , while Kristaps Porzingis contributed 10 points and 15 rebounds in 32 minutes . Up next , the Hornets will travel to Detroit Thursday to take on the Pistons , while Charlotte will head to Orlando Friday to go up against the Magic .
It was another dominant shooting night for the victorious Golden State Warriors on Thursday . Since snapping his league - record three - point streak last week , Steph Curry has been lights out from beyond the arc , hitting 28 three - pointers in the past three games . Curry dominated from the floor on Thursday , hitting five threes , shooting 13 - of - 23 overall , and leading the game with 37 points . It was a stellar night for the other splash brother as well , as Klay Thompson scored 19 points on 8 - of - 22 shooting . DeMarre Carroll , meanwhile , struggled from the field , scoring just 13 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting . The Raptors shot almost 54 percent from the field as a team and hit 6 - of - 50 shots from beyond the arc . The Warriors also dished out 31 assists on the night . The Raptors ( 7 - 5 ) , meanwhile , received bad news before the game , as reports broke that star forward Derrick Favors will likely miss extended time with a knee injury . Starting point guard Terrence Ross was also absent due to illness , leading the team with a season - high 37 points . However , the team shot an impressive 54 percent from the field , including nine three - pointers . The Raptors , meanwhile , saw struggles from their own star . Draymond Green shot just 3 - of - 6 from the field , but still managed to contribute just nine points , nine rebounds , and five assists .

They were able to out - score the Hornets 28 - 26 in the first quarter , giving them enough of an edge to get the victory on the road in Charlotte . The Hornets were also able to force the Hornets into 6 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . The 28 points were a season - high for Jefferson , while it was also his third double - double in his last four games . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going .
