The Miami Heat defeated the Orlando Magic , 130 - 136 , at American Airlines Arena on Saturday . These are two teams going in opposite directions and this result shows which way they 're heading . The second half is when Miami really turned it on , as they outscored Orlando , 59 - 42 in that 26 - minute span . Prior to that , there were 12 lead changes and six ties , as it was close throughout the first half . Defense was key for the Heat , as they held the Magic to 50 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a decisive statistic as well , with Miami winning that battle , 48 - 47 . The Heat also dominated the assist differential , recording 22 assists to the Magic 's 24 . Miami ( 9 - 20 ) have been playing much better than their record would indicate , so this sort of win can only add to their confidence . Goran Dragic had one of the most efficient games of the season , as he accumulated a season - high 19 points , five assists and four rebounds in the win . Goran Dragic was second on the team , scoring 19 points and dishing out five assists . Justise Winslow was the only other Miami player in double figures , as he tallied 20 points , nine rebounds and two assists . James Johnson was huge off the bench , collecting 12 points , eight rebounds and six assists . Orlando will look to keep rolling on Monday against the Brooklyn Nets .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 109 - 90 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday . The Pistons ( 0 - 1 ) invested heavily into their star two - guard DeMar DeRozan in the offseason , inking the 27 - year old to a five - year , $ 139 million contract . He began paying immediate dividends on that hefty sum Wednesday , tallying a game - high 40 points and adding four rebounds , an assist and a steal . While the stellar showing was n't necessarily a surprise from a player of his caliber , the fact that Jonas Valanciunas , and not Kyle Lowry , checked in as Toronto 's second - leading scorer was a tad more unexpected . The veteran big man dominated in his showdown with Andre Drummond , posting a 32 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included an assist . The dominant Raptors , which outscored Detroit in every quarter , did n't need much else , with Lowry the only other player to hit double digits on the scoreboard . The Pistons ( 0 - 1 ) were led by Tobias Harris ' 22 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , an assist and a steal . Marcus Morris supplied a near double - double with 17 points , nine boards , three assists and a steal , but struggled from long range , draining only a pair of his eight three - point attempts . Drummond tallied 16 points , six rebounds and a steal , while the starting backcourt of Ish Smith and Kentavious Caldwell-Pope only managed 10 combined points on 5 - for - 23 shooting .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 45 - 22 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 43 - 26 ) 91 - 83 on Tuesday at the Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 29 - 20 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 42 percent from the field and 27 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 42 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 33 points ( 13 - 20 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 10 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds , six assists and two steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 8 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding four assists . After taking double - digit shot attempts in all five of his previous playoff games coming into this one , Irving had just nine field goal attempts Wednesday , although he was able to consistently force his way to the free throw line . Irving was able to take a backseat to James , who readily took this game over from the start . So far this postseason , Irving is averaging 24 points and 3 assists over six games . Joe Johnson added 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) of his own , while Joe Johnson chipped in 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and four rebounds as well . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Jazz will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 27 - 50 ) defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves ( 16 - 61 ) , 116 - 111 , in Game 3 on Monday at the Staples Center . The final score would indicate a blowout , but this game was close throughout . In fact , it was a single - digit victory for three quarters of play . The key for the Kings was their defense , as they held the Timberwolves to 48 percent shooting and forced them to commit 10 turnovers . The assisting margin was huge as well , with Sacramento recording 25 assists to the Timberwolves 29 . The Timberwolves have been playing competitively lately , but this was not one of those games . This sort of win exemplifies which directions these franchises are going right now and we should give more credit to Sacramento rather than belittling the Timberwolves . The biggest difference in the game was the passing , as the Kings accumulated 25 assists compared to the Timberwolves 29 . The Timberwolves came into this game as a small favorite , but couldnt muster up enough late to pull out the road win . The bench was the only reason they played so well , as they scored 41 bench points to go along with an impressive 39 rebounds . Derrick Wiggins was the player of the game , as he amassed 26 points and eight rebounds . Zach LaVine was the only other player in double figures , amassing 21 points and five rebounds . Ray McCallum had one of the best games of his career off the bench , as he amassed 13 points , nine rebounds and four assists . The Kings will look to keep up this good form against the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Brooklyn Nets , 99 - 92 , at Barclay 's Center on Sunday . This was a game that meant a lot more to Atlanta than Brooklyn , as they really took control from there . In fact , they led for the entirety of the second half , while holding a double - digit lead for the majority of it . Defense was key , as they held Brooklyn to 46 percent shooting , while forcing them to commit 17 turnovers . Brook Lopez was the player of the game , as he tallied 17 points , 14 rebounds and four blocks in the win . Kyle Korver was second on the team , as he dropped 21 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . Al Horford went just 7 - of - 16 from the field , but finished with 15 points , 10 rebounds and three blocks . Joe Johnson was a nice spark off the bench , providing 13 points , two rebounds and two assists . The Nets ( 0 - 1 ) have been tough at home all season and this win like this shows just how scary they can be . Brook Lopez did all he could to carry the offense though , as he led the team with 17 points , 14 rebounds and four blocks . Deron Williams was second on the team , as he accrued 13 points , four rebounds and two assists . Al Horford finished with 10 points , 10 rebounds and two assists . Atlanta will look to build off this win on Wednesday in a road matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 110 - 85 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Thursday . Indiana came into this game as a sizable favorite and they did n't disappoint . The Nets had just two leads in this game that lasted less than a minute and the final one at the end of the second quarter was followed up by a 33 - 13 run by the Pacers to open things up . The Pacers offense was hot all night , as they shot 51 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Pacers , as it was a double - digit margin for the majority of the second half . Brooklyn ( 13 - 16 ) had to play this game without Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo , as they simply did n't have enough bullets in the arsenal for this matchup . Jarrett Jack carried the load , as he tallied 22 points , six rebounds and eight assists . David West was second on the team , as he provided 17 points and five rebounds off the bench . George Hill was the only other starter in double figures , totaling 12 points , six rebounds and five assists . Luis Scola was a huge spark off the bench , providing 17 points , five rebounds and five assists on 7 - of - 13 shooting . CJ Watson was a nice spark off the bench , scoring 17 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting . Indiana will look to get out of this slide on Friday in a home matchup against the Phoenix Suns .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 140 - 116 , at Toyota Center on Saturday . These are two teams going in opposite directions right now , as the Rockets put it to the Clippers in this blowout win . Not only did they score at least 32 points in every quarter , they shot 56 percent from the field against one of the best defenses in the NBA . The Rockets did have a 26 - point lead that was brought down to six in the fourth quarter , but they responded with a 160 run to take control late . Houston took advantage of a happy whistle , as they went 36 - of - 43 from the free - throw line , while Los Angles took just 16 free - throw attempts . The Rockets also won the rebounding ( 45 - 38 ) and assisting ( 29 - 22 ) differential by seven a piece , as they never trailed after the first quarter . The Clippers ( 22 - 13 ) had to play this game without Chris Paul and Blake Griffin , as they were simply outmatched against a hot Rockets bunch . The frustration hit the fan too , as Austin Rivers and Doc Redick were both ejected in the second quarter . Raymond Felton did all he could to keep them hanging around , as he led the team with 26 points , five rebounds and eight assists off the bench . DeAndre Jordan led the starters in his homecoming game , as he totaled 20 points and 13 rebounds on 9 - of - 11 shooting . Jamal Crawford and J.J. Redick struggled , as they combined for 13 points on 5 - of - 19 shooting . Marreese Speights played well off the bench , accruing 15 points and seven rebounds . Los Angeles will look to play better on Saturday , when they play the Oklahoma City Thunder on the road . The Rockets ( 25 - 9 ) have been dominant on offense all season , but this 140 - spot marked their high of the year . James Harden recorded yet another triple - double , as he accumulated 30 points , 13 rebounds , 10 assists and five steals on 10 - of - 15 shooting . Montrezl Harrell was second on the team , as he dropped a career - high 29 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting off the bench . Trevor Ariza collected 18 points , four rebounds and seven assists , while Patrick Beverley provided 15 points , seven rebounds and three assists of his own . Eric Gordon scored 19 points off the bench on 5 - of - 7 shooting . Houston plays again on Saturday , as they host the New York Knicks for their next game .
The Heat were on fire from the field , hitting 59 percent of their field goal attempts , while they dished 28 assists and scored 64 points in the paint . Hassan Whiteside led the charge for Miami with 30 points on super efficient 14 - of - 17 shooting , to go along with 20 rebounds and three blocked shots , in 27 minutes . Tyler Ilyasova also played well for the Heat , as he finished with 21 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting , including 3 - of - 7 from distance , in 27 minutes off the bench . Goran Dragic led the way for the 76ers , with 21 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting , including 5 - of - 6 from long range , to go along with seven assists , in 26 minutes off the bench . Ersan Ilyasova was the high - point man for the Sixers , with 21 points , along with five rebounds and two assists , in 27 minutes . Tyler Johnson followed up with 16 points , six rebounds , six assists and one steal , in 34 minutes off the bench . T.J. McConnell finished with 11 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal , in 28 minutes . Meanwhile , Hassan Whiteside led the way for the 76ers , with 30 points ( 14 - 17 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , to go along with 20 rebounds , three blocks and one steal , in 27 minutes . Ersan Ilyasova also finished with 21 points , while shooting 3 - of - 7 from long range , to go along with five rebounds and two assists , in 27 minutes .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 30 - 21 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 20 - 33 ) 113 - 86 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 35 - 24 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 35 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were also able to force the Magic into 13 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Paul Millsap led the way , going 7 - for - 14 from the field and 6 - for - 8 from the free throw line to finish with a team - high of 21 points , while adding five rebounds and four assists in just 27 minutes . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 30 points and 8 rebounds per game . Dennis Schroder did n't have his best night shooting the ball , but still finished with 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , marking a new season - high in points . He 's scored in double figures for three straight games now , after only doing it five times previously in the season . In his Sixers debut , Elfrid Payton had arguably his best game of the season . He went 6 - for - 11 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding 4 rebounds . It was his second straight double - double and fourth on the year . Dwight Howard chipped in with 11 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 1 - 3 FT ) and 13 rebounds as well . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 34 - 16 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 24 - 27 ) 110 - 103 on Monday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Trail Blazers 37 - 25 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field , while the Trail Blazers went just 47 percent . The Raptors also out - rebounded the Trail Blazers 45 - 40 , giving them even more of an advantage . In only his second game of the season though , DeMar DeRozan finished with a game - high of 29 points ( 11 - 25 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 9 FT ) , to go along with five rebounds and four assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 22 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 28 points and 20 rebounds on the season . Damian Lillard also had a solid all - around game . He went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 2 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding 11 assists . He 's now averaging 14 points per game on the season . Despite struggling with his shot , Damian Lillard had a huge showing , finishing with 27 points ( 8 - 20 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) , five rebounds and a steal . He 's now combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Trail Blazers ' six - game win streak . McCollum on the other hand finished with 21 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , six rebounds and two assists . It was his third straight double - double , as he 's averaged 10 points and 10 rebounds over that span of games . Coming off the bench , Allen Crabbe added 17 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , three rebounds and two steals in 34 minutes . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Utah Jazz on Friday , while the Trail Blazers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 97 - 79 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Sunday . The Sixers ( 6 - 18 ) came in to the contest short - handed , as Joel Embiid was given the night off to tend to elbow inflammation , while starting point guard Sergio Rodriguez sat out with an illness . That opened the door for Jahlil Okafor and T.J. McConnell to enter the starting five , and both parlayed their opportunities into highly productive performances . McConnell came within an assist of a triple - double , tallying 12 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists , while also adding three steals . Meanwhile , Okafor stepped up with 14 points , nine rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . The two players combined to go 12 - of - 18 from the field , and the Sixers shot an outstanding 56 percent from the field overall , keying what was only their second road win of the season . Robert Covington actually led Philadelphia in scoring , posting 16 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Ersan Ilyasova was right behind with 15 points , eight boards and a pair of steals . Nik Stauskas received some extra run off the bench as a residual effect of Rodriguez 's absence , and he turned in 10 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal to lead the second unit . Nerlens Noel , making his season debut after recovering from a knee injury , was only able to log 10 minutes off the bench before being held to just eight points on 3 - of - 5 shooting .
The Miami Heat ( 26 - 32 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 32 - 25 ) 108 - 90 on Tuesday at Philips Arena in Miami . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Hawks 25 - 24 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters as well , going 40 percent from the field and 46 percent from the three - point line , while the Hawks went 38 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were also able to force the Hawks into 10 turnovers , while only committing 12 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Heat were led by Tyler Johnson , who went 9 - for - 11 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while also adding five rebounds and five assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 38 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 19 points and 16 rebounds on the year . Goran Dragic was another player who had a solid showing of his own . He went 5 - for - 19 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 17 points . He also got to the line 14 times and converted on six of those attempts . The Hawks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Hawks will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Saturday .
The Denver Nuggets blew out the Los Angeles Lakers 129 - 101 at Staples Center on Monday . Denver ( 32 - 35 ) inches closer to a .500 record for the season and more importantly , show cased their ability to blow out the bottom tier teams while also staving off the Portland Trail Blazers for the 8 - seed in the Western Conference playoffs picture . Depth was on display for the Nuggets in the rout , as they went up 67 - 43 at the half and handed over much of the work to the bench , who also flexed their scoring prowess in the win . The Lakers ( 20 - 47 ) were unable to match the shooting efficiency the Nuggets had going , and finished 30 percent from three point range and 43 percent from the field , compared to the lights out 54 percent effort by Denver . Nikola Jokic and Danilo Gallinari each scored 18 points , and combined for 12 rebounds and nine assists . Mason Plumlee scored 15 points and added 10 rebounds across 36 minutes . Jamal Murray and Will Barton each pitched in 22 points and each played 30 minutes , and combined for nine three - pointers . Lakers Ivan Zubac drew the start at center and offered a bright spot in the box score . Zubac scored 25 points , grabbed 11 rebounds and dished out an assist in 30 minutes . Jordan Clarkson added 19 points on 7 - of - 18 shooting , while Brandon Ingram pitched in 14 points , one rebound and two assists . Next up , the Lakers visit the Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while the Nuggets host the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 25 - 49 ) defeated the Minnesota Suns ( 25 - 54 ) 121 - 121 on Friday at the Target Center in Minneapolis . Despite a fierce comeback by the Timberwolves , who out - scored the Timberwolves 58 - 48 in the second half , the Timberwolves were able to hold them off and steal the victory on the road . The Timberwolves were able to out - rebound the Timberwolves 41 - 36 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . The Timberwolves were led by Brandon Wiggins , who went 6 - for - 13 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 32 points , while also adding five rebounds and two assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 26 points and 18 rebounds per game . Coming close to a triple - double , Ricky Rubio finished with 17 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , 11 assists and three steals . He had gone a combined 16 - for - 28 from the field over his last two games , so it was good to see him get things pointed back in the right direction . Getting the start at shooting guard , Mirza Teletovic also was able to shoot a perfect 7 - for - 17 from the floor and 3 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 19 points . LaVine had 19 points of his own , while also adding five rebounds . The Suns ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Timberwolves will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday .
The Portland Trail Blazers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 112 - 94 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . The Blazers were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this dominating victory . The key for Portland was their defense , as they held New Orleans to 40 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . Rim protection killed New Orleans as well , as they failed to record a block in their loss . The assist - to - turnover ratio kept the Trail Blazers hanging around , as they committed 19 turnovers to 19 assists , while the Pelicans committed 11 turnovers to their 22 assists . The Trail Blazers ( 1 - 2 ) have been one of the surprise teams of the league and they took advantage of a disheartened Pelicans team here . Much of the offense was run through Ed Davis , who totaled 25 points , 10 rebounds , two steals and two blocks in the victory . Eric Gordon was a huge spark off the bench , as he accrued 20 points , two rebounds and three assists . Damian Lillard was the only other Pelican in double figures , as he accumulated 21 points , five rebounds and 11 assists . C.J . McCollum led the team in scoring , dropping 20 points on 14 - of - 22 shooting . Ryan Anderson was second on the team , as he scored 21 points on 9 - of - 20 shooting . Portland will look to play better on Sunday in a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans .
The Golden State Warriors ( 25 - 4 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 18 - 11 ) 104 - 74 on Wednesday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Warriors got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 19 - 15 in the first quarter alone . The Jazz were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 36 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Jazz were also able to force the Jazz into 23 turnovers , while only committing 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson , as they were the only players on the team to reach double figures in points . Curry went a ridiculous 8 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding four assists and three steals . He shot a combined 8 - for - 27 from the field over his last two games , so it was refreshing to see him find increased succes during Friday 's matchup . Coming off the bench , Joe Johnson added 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and two rebounds in 22 minutes . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Golden State Warriors , 128 - 119 , at FedEx Forum on Monday . The recent form of these teams would have indicated a closer game , but Memphis took care of business in this wire - to - wire win . In fact , the Grizzlies led by at least seven points for the entirety of the second half , as the final 11 - point margin was their largest lead of the game . Memphis was very efficient on offense , shooting 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . The Grizzlies also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than 16 turnovers , while committing three less turnovers . The Grizzlies ( 23 - 16 ) had a tough task here against a hot Grizzlies team , as they simply did n't have enough in the arsenal to win this game . Stephen Curry was the player of the game , as he collected 40 points , three rebounds and six assists . Marc Gasol finished second on the team , totaling 27 points , 13 rebounds and six assists . Draymond Green went just 3 - of - 6 from the field , but finished with 11 points , eight rebounds and four assists . Mike Conley led the Grizzlies in scoring , collecting 27 points , four rebounds and 12 assists . Marc Gasol was just as good , amassing 23 points , 13 rebounds and four assists of his own . Zach Randolph was great off the bench , amassing 27 points , 11 rebounds and six assists on 12 - of - 17 shooting .
